












































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Dga cho'en dill' nan Jesucrístona' nake' xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Davina' na' dii Abrahama'.
Abrahama' goke' x̱a Isaaca', na' Isaaca' goke' x̱a Jacoba', na' Jacoba' goke' x̱a Judána' len beṉ' bisheeka'.
Na' Judána' goke' x̱a Fáreza' len Zárana', na' xṉeeka' wlie' Tamar. Na' Fáreza' goke' x̱a Esróma', na' Esróma' goke' x̱a Arama'.
Na' Arama' goke' x̱a Aminadaba', na' Aminadaba' goke' x̱a Naasónna', na' Naasónna' goke' x̱a Salmónna'.
Na' Salmónna' len Rahaba' gokgake' x̱axṉa' Booza'. Na' Booza' goke' x̱a Obeda' na' xṉeena' wlie' Rut. Na' Obeda' goke' x̱a Isaína'.
Na' Isaína' goke' x̱a Davina', na' Davina' goke' x̱a Salomónna'. Na' xṉa' Salomónna', beena' bikaa Davina', goke' xool dii Uríaza'.
Na' Salomónna' goke' x̱a Roboama', na' Roboama' goke' x̱a Abíaza', na' Abíaza' goke' x̱a Ásana'.
Na' Ásana' goke' x̱a Josafata', na' Josafata' goke' x̱a Jorama', na' Jorama' goke' x̱a Uzíaza'.
Na' Uzíaza' goke' x̱a Jotama', na' Jotama' goke' x̱a Acaza', na' Acaza' goke' x̱a Ezequíaza'.
Na' Ezequíaza' goke' x̱a Manaséza', na' Manaséza' goke' x̱a Amónna', na' Amónna' goke' x̱a Josíaza'.
Na' Josíaza' goke' x̱a Jeconíaza' len beṉ' bisheeka', ḻegaken' zoa kana' bc̱he'byen beṉ' Babilóniaka' beṉ' Israelka' lalle'ka'.
Na' shlak ni zoagake' Babilóniana' golj Salatiela' xiiṉ Jeconíaza', na' Salatiela' goke' x̱a Zorobabela'.
Na' Zorobabela' goke' x̱a Abiuda', na' Abiuda' goke' x̱a Eliaquima', na' Eliaquima' goke' x̱a Azora'.
Na' Azora' goke' x̱a Sadoca', na' Sadoca' goke' x̱a Aquima', na' Aquima' goke' x̱a Eliuda'.
Na' Eliuda' goke' x̱a Eleazara', na' Eleazara' goke' x̱a Matánna', na' Matánna' goke' x̱a Jacoba'.
Na' Jacoba' goke' x̱a Joséna' beṉ' c̱he Maríana', xṉa' Jesúza', beena' ḻekzka' nsi'gake' Cristo.
Na' ka' gok wzoa shda' diaka' wzololenzan dii Abrahama' na' biyoll-lenan dii Davina'. Na' wde zi shda' diaka' bizzololenan dii Davina' ax̱t ka bc̱he'byengake' beṉ' Israelka' Babilóniana'. Na' wizak zi shda' diaka' bizzolon ka bc̱he'byengake' ḻegake' Babilóniana' ax̱t ka wzoa Crístona', beena' bseḻ' Chioza' iṉabi'e.
Ki gok ka golj Jesucrístona': Xṉee Maríana' ba nakan ikaa Joséna'ne', na' ka zi' soalene'ne' bi'e, ḻa' Espíritu Santo c̱he Chioza' bene' kwenc̱he bi'e.
Na' Joséna' beena' ba nakan ikeene', nake' to beṉ' chon ka cheeni Chioza', na' daa bi goklallee wsi'e Maríana' yeḻ' zto' gokile' c̱hooṉlalleene' ka kono gakbe'i.
Na' shlak chza'lallee gone' dga, to anjl c̱he X̱ancho Chioza' bli'lawe' ḻe' lo bishgal c̱he'na', na' chi'ene': ―José, xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Daví, bi illebo' ikoo Maríana' daa ba no'e, ḻa' Espíritu Sántona' bene' kwenc̱he bi'e.
Na' sane' to bi' byodo' na' wsi'ob' Jesús, ḻa' ḻeban' yislab' beṉ' yell c̱heb'ka' lao saaxya c̱he'ka' kwenc̱he bi kwiayi'gake'.
Gok yog' diiki kwenc̱he gok ka wna dii beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne', chi'e:
To nool wew' wee, na' sane' to bi' byodo', na' wsi'gake'b' Emanuel. Na' Emanuel zejin: Chioza' zoalene' cho'.
Na' ka biban Joséna', bene' kon ka goll anjl c̱he X̱ancho Chioza'ne' na' wkee Maríana'.
Na' bi wdelle'ne' ax̱t ki wxanche' bi'do'na', na' bsi'eb' Jesús.
Jesúza' golje' yell Belénna', daa llia gana' mbani Judeana', kana' chṉabia' Heródeza'. Na'ch baḻ beṉ' sin', beṉ' nsed c̱he beljka', za'gake' ka de gana' chla'lə wbilla', bllintegake' Jerusalénna'.
Na' che'gake': ―¿Gaṉi rey c̱he beṉ' Israelka', bi'na' ba golj? Ṉezinto' ba goljb' ḻa' ka de gana' chla'lə wbilla' ble'into' to belj dii bzajniin neto' nan ba goljb', daan ba za'nto' kwenc̱he we'la'onto'b'.
Na' ka beni Heródeza' daa wnagake', gokshejlallee, na' ḻekzka' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' Jerusalénka'.
Na'ch Heródeza' goxe' yog'ḻoḻ bx̱ozka' chṉabia', na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi ley c̱he dii Moiséza', na' wṉabile' ḻegake' gan chiyaḻ' galj Crístona', beena' wseḻ' Chioza' iṉabi'e.
Na'ch gollgake'ne': ―Yell Belénna' daa mbani Judeanan' galje', ḻa' kan' bzej to beṉ' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻe', chi'e:
Na' li', yell Belén llio' gani mbani Judeani, aga iṉacho nako' dii ḻiizelozi bibi zakii ladj yellka' zakii llia Judeani; ḻa' lawo'ni ichej to beṉ' iṉabi'e, na' gap wwie' beṉ' Israelka', beṉ'ka' nak yell c̱ha'.
Na'ch Heródeza', ka kono gokbe'zi goxe' beṉ' sin'ka' na' wṉabile' ḻegake' batyeṉ'an ble'gakile' belja'.
Na'ch bseḻee ḻegake' Belénna' na' golle' ḻegake': ―Ḻi shaj, na' ḻi lljadiljyoll bi'do'na', na' kat' yillelileb' na' yidṉale nad' kwenc̱he len' sha' llje'lawaab'.
Na' ka biyoll goll Heródeza' ka', na'ch wza'gake'. Na' belja' daa ble'gakile' kana' zi' sa'gake', zejan xan yabana' llialon lawe'ka', na' ka bllinan gana' zoa bi'do'na', na' na'zə wzoan.
Na' ka bizle'i beṉ' sin'ka' belja', ḻe bibagakile'.
Na'ch ka wyoogake' ḻoo yoona' ble'gakile' bi'do'na' len xṉa'b' Maríana'. Na'ch bc̱hek' xibe'ka' na' be'la'ogake'b'. Na' wlejgake' or, na' yal zix̱, na' ḻekzka' len nill' c̱he to yag dii chḻa' zix̱ daa le mirra, na' be'gake'n c̱heb'.
Ka biyoll be'la'ogake'b', Chioza' bsi'nile' ḻegake' lo yel bishgal c̱he'ka' kwenc̱he bich yidegake' gana' zoa Heródeza'. Daan, bikaagake' nez yoblə ziyajgake' lalle'ka'.
Ka wde biza' beṉ' sin'ka', to anjl c̱he X̱ancho Chioza' bli'lawe' Joséna' lo bishgal c̱he'na' chi'ene': ―Wyas, na' bc̱he' bdo'na' len xṉa'baa na' ḻi shaj gana' mbani Egíptona'. Na' na'z soale ax̱t kat'ch iṉia' li' yiza'le. Ḻa' Heródeza' yiyilje' bdo'na' kwenc̱he wite'b'.
Na'ch lii wyaste Joséna' na' bc̱hi'e bdo'na' len xṉa'baa, na' waḻ-lə wza'gake' zejlengake'b' gana' mbani Egíptona'.
Na' wzoagake' na'zə ax̱t ka bllin lla wit Heródeza'. Na' daa gok ka', gok ka goll X̱ancho Chioza' to beṉ' wdix̱jee daa golle'ne', kana' wne': “Nad' biṉia' bi' c̱ha'na' kwenc̱he biza'b' gana' mbani Egíptona'.”
Na' ka gokbe'i Heródeza' bi ben beṉ' sin'ka' ka golle' ḻegake', ḻe bllee. Na' bene' mandad witgake' yog'ḻoḻ bi' byodo'ka' lle' yell Belénna' len yellka' ndiḻ nllagan, bdo' cheeṉka' ax̱t bi' c̱hop yizi, bsakee ka to yizka' ba gok ble'i beṉ' sin'ka' belja'.
Na' daa bengake' ka', gok daa wna dii Jeremíaza', beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻe', ka wne':
Kwe' wbell na' gakyeshii beṉ'ka' lle' yella' le Ramá. Noolka' nak xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Raquela' ni to kono cheengakile' gonxenlall' ḻegake', daa wit bi'do' c̱he'ka'.
Na'ch ka wde wit Heródeza', to anjl c̱he X̱ancho Chioza' bli'lawe' Joséna' lo yel bishgal c̱he'na' shlak ni zoe' Egíptona', na' chi'ene':
―Wyas, bic̱he' bi'do'na' len xṉa'baa na' ḻi yiyaj gana' mbani Israela', ḻa' ba wit beṉ'ka' cheengakile' witgake'b'.
Na'ch wyas Joséna' na' bic̱hi'e bi'do'na' len xṉa'baa na' biyajgake' gana' mbani Israela'.
Na' ka wṉezi Joséna' Arquelawa' ba chṉabi'e lo laz dii x̱e' Heródeza', na' bllebe' yiyajgake' Judéana'. Na' Chioza' wdix̱je'ile'ne' lo yel bishgal c̱he'na' yiyajgake' gana' mbani Galileana'.
Na' ka billingake' Galileana' jazoagake' yell Nazareta'. Na' daa jazoagake' na', gok ka wna dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' kani'yi c̱he Jesúza', wnagake' wsi'gake'ne' beṉ' Nazaret.
Na' do kana', Juan, beena' bchoa beṉ' nisa', wyaje' to latj gana' bibi chashj chḻeb gana' mbani Judeana', na' wdix̱je'ile' beṉ'ka' chdi'a chllag na',
chi'e: ―Ḻi yiyaj yileni dii malka' chonle, ḻa' ba bllin lla iṉabia' Chioza', beena' zoa yabana', ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'.
Na' dii Isaíaza', beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne', wne' c̱he Juanna': To beṉ' gosyee to lo latj ga bibi chashj chḻeb, na' iṉe': “Ḻi se kwas wzenagle c̱he X̱anchona' na' wsalj yic̱hjlall'do'leka' kat' zee.”
Na' Juanna' bene' xe'na' de xa kamey, na' nc̱hej lsineena' to yid. Na' wdawe' bish'zo len shin baser daa de lyix̱aa.
Na' beṉ'ka' lle' yell Jerusalénna', na' doxen gana' mbani Judeana' na' yellka' llia gaoz yao Jordánna' jazenaggake' dillaa cho'e.
Na' bix̱oadoḻ'gake' saaxya c̱he'ka', na' bchoa Juanna' ḻegake' nisa' ḻoo yao Jordánna'.
Na' ka ble'i Juanna' zan fariseoka' na' saduceoka' bllingake' lawe'na' kwenc̱he wchoe' ḻegake' nisa', na' golle' ḻegake': ―¡Le' naklikzle ka beḻ zṉia! ¿Achakile wak wxoṉjile' yeḻ' zak'zi' daa wseḻ' Chioza'?
Ḻi gon ka gakbe'i beṉ' nan dii ḻi ba biyaj bilenile.
Na' bi gakzile bibi yeḻ' zak'zi' ile'ile daa iṉazle: “Neto' naknto' xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Abrahama'.” Dii ḻi nia' le', ax̱t yajki wak gon Chioza' xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Abrahama'.
Yog'ḻoḻ-le shi bi chonle ka chiyoolallii Chioza' na' gak c̱hele ka chak c̱he to yag dii chbia dii zix̱ dii bi chak wen, na' lii chc̱hogtegake' ax̱t xanin na' chzaḻ'gake'n lo yi'na'.
Dii ḻi nad' chchoa' le' nisa' daa chiyaj chilenile, per beena' zi' za' kollaana' napche' yeḻ' wak xench ka nad', na' ni bi zakaa gak' xmose' kwenc̱he galj' xele'na'. Ḻen' gone' ka yidsoa Espíritu Sántona' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena', ka le' chiyaj chilenile', na' beṉ'ka' bi chiyaj chileni wzaḻee ḻegake' lo yi' gabiḻa'.
Na' gone' c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni ka chon beena' nox̱' yag xozaa daa chpa'ile' trígona' na' kooshawee trígona' na' wzeye' beb c̱heyinna' lo yi'na' daa biga yiyolkzə.
Na'ch wza' Jesúza' gana' mbani Galileana' wyaje' cho'a yao Jordánna' kwenc̱he wchoa Juanna'ne' nisa'.
Na' ka blline', bi nan cheeni Juanna' wchoe'ne' nisa', san chi'ene': ―Li'lan chiyaḻ' wcho' nad' nisa', na' li'lə za'zo' kwenc̱he wchoa' li' nisa'.
Per Jesúza' golle'ne': ―Ben goklen bchoa' nad' nisa' ḻa' chiyaḻ' goncho ka nak daa nllia Chioza' bia' goncho. Na'ch bchoe'ne' nisa'.
Na' kon ka biyoll bchoe'ne' nisa' lii bichejte Jesúza' ḻoo nisa' na' lii byaljte yabana' na' ble'ile' Espíritu c̱he Chioza' chetje' ka to palom na' jsoalene' ḻe'.
Na'ch bengakile' shii Chioza' zoa yabana' chi'e: ―Beenin nake' Xiiṉ', beena' chakid', na' ḻe chibaid' ḻe'.
Na'ch Espíritu c̱he Chioza' bc̱hi'e Jesúza' to latj ga bibi chashj chḻeb na' dii x̱iwaa goklalliin kooyeḻa'n ḻe' gone' ka cheenin.
Na' ka wde c̱hoa lla c̱hoa yel bibi wdawe', na' wdone'.
Na'ch bllin dii x̱iwaa kwite'na' gollan ḻe': ―Shi leilo' nako' Xiiṉ Chios, ben ka yiyak yajki yetxtil.
Na'ch goll Jesúza': ―Cho'a xtill' Chioza' nan: “Aga toz yeḻ' wawa' choe'n yeḻ' mban c̱he beṉec̱ha', san ḻekzka' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' choe'n yeḻ' mban.”
Na'ch dii x̱iwaa bc̱he'n ḻe' Jerusalénna' daa nak yell c̱he Chioza' na' bḻepan ḻe' yic̱hj yoodo'na' gana' nak sib wal.
Na'ch gollan ḻe': ―Shi leilo' nako' Xiiṉ Chios, lla bixit'shki ni. Ḻa' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' nan: Wseḻee anjl c̱he'ka' gap wwiagake' li', na' gox̱'gake' li' kwenc̱he ki koo wc̱hewo' yajka'.
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻen: ―Ḻekzka' na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza': “Bi wzo' Chioza' gone' daa nazan c̱ho' kwenc̱hezə x̱enlalloo shi gone' ka ba wne'.”
Na'ch stokzə bizc̱he' dii x̱iwaane' to lo yaa sib wal na' bliin ḻe' yog' yellka' lle' yell-lioni na' yeḻ' zakii c̱heyinka'.
Na' gollan ḻe': ―Yog' diiki chle'ilo' goṉ' li' shi wc̱hek' xibo'na' we'lawoo nad'.
Na'ch goll Jesúza' ḻen: ―Biyaj, Satanás, ḻa' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' nan: “Be'la'o toz X̱ano' Chioza' na' kon daa iṉe', ḻennan' gono'.”
Na'ch biza' dii x̱iwaa kwit Jesúza' na' bllin baḻ anjlka' be'gake'ne' kon bi byalljile'.
Ka beni Jesúza' wloogake' Juanna' lillyana', bizee biyaje' gana' mbani Galileana'.
Na' bizee yell Nazareta' na' jazoe' yell Capernaúma', to yell xen dii llia cho'a nisdo'na' gana' mbani yell-lio c̱he dia c̱he dii Zabulónna' na' dii Neftalína'.
Na' daa jazoe' na', gok ka wna dii Isaíaza', beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne', daa wne':
Ka nak yell-lio daa naki c̱he dia c̱he dii Zabulónna' na' dii Neftalína', daa llia shḻaa yao Jordánna', gana' xoa nez daa zej cho'a nisdo'na' daa llia gana' mbani Galileana', gana' lle' zan beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel,
beṉ'ka' lle' na' gok yic̱hjlall'do'eka' shgasj shc̱hoḻ, na' Chioza' ba bseḻee to beeni' xen lawe'ka'. Lao beṉ'ka' lle' gana' chṉabia' yeḻ' wita' ba chzeeni' beeni' c̱he Chioza'.
Na' wzolo Jesúza' chyix̱je'ile' beṉ' cho'a xtill' Chioza', chi'e: ―Ḻi yiyaj yileni dii malka' chonle, ḻa' ba bllin lla Chioza', beena' zoa yabana', iṉabi'e ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'.
Na' ka zej Jesúza' cho'a nisdo' c̱he Galileana' ble'ile' c̱hop bish' beṉ' wxen beḻ chzaḻ'gake' yix̱ja' ḻoo nisa' chzengake' beḻa'. Toe' le Simón na' ḻekzka' nsi'gake'ne' Pedro, na' beena' sto lie' Andrés.
Na'ch Jesúza' chi'e ḻegake': ―Ḻi da, dino nad', na' kon ka chonle ṉaa chbejle beḻki ḻoo nisi, ka'kzan gonle yibejle beṉ' lao dii mala'.
Na' ka golle' ḻegake' ka', lii bkwaaṉ'tegake' yix̱j c̱he'ka' na' zejlengake'ne'.
Na' zi lat'chga wza'gake' bizle'i Jesúza' zi c̱hop bish' beṉ', beena' to lie' Jacobo na' beena' sto lie' Juan, beṉ'ka' nak xiiṉ Zebedewa', lle'gake' to ḻoo barkw chiyonshao'gake' yix̱ja' daa chzengakile' beḻka'. Na' ḻekzka' goll Jesúza' Jacóbona' len Juanna' shajlengake'ne'.
Na' lii bkwaaṉ'tegake' barkwa' len x̱e'ka' na' janogake' Jesúza'.
Na' wda Jesúza' yog' yellka' llia doxen gana' mbani Galileana', chli' chsedile' beṉ' Israelka' gana' chdop chllaggake' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza', cho'e dill' wen dill' kob c̱he yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza', na' biyone' yog' beṉ' che'i wde wdeli yillwe'.
Na' doxen gana' mbani Síriana' wze dill' daa chon Jesúza', na' jwa'gake' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' che'i wde wdeli yillwe', beṉ' chey chla, beṉ' yoo dii x̱iw', beṉ' chaz shoṉ, na' beṉ' net ṉi'a nee. Na' Jesúza' biyone' ḻegake'.
Na' beṉ' zan inlleb jano ḻe', beṉ'ka' lle' yellka' mbani Galileana' na' yellka' mbani Decápoliza', na' beṉ'ka' lle' yell Jerusalénna' na' yellka' sto mbani Judeana', na' beṉ'ka' lle' yellka' llia shḻaa yao Jordánna'.
Ka ble'i Jesúza' beṉ' zan ba nogake'ne', na'ch wyepe' to lo yaa, na' wchi'e. Na'ch beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen jabig'gake' kwite'na'.
Na' wzolo Jesúza' chli' chsedile' ḻegake', chi'e:
―Chakomba beṉ'ka' chakbe'gakile' chyalljgakile' gaklen Chioza' ḻegake', ḻa' ḻegaken' yillingake' yabana' gana' chṉabia' Chioza'.
’Chakomba beṉ'ka' chbellyesh', ḻa' Chioza' yizoe' ḻegake' mbalaz.
’Chakomba beṉ'ka' nak beṉ' gax̱jlall', ḻa' wllin lla Chioza' wi'e ḻegake' yell-lioni.
’Chakomba beṉ'ka' chzelall' gakgake' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao', ḻa' Chioza' iṉe' nakgake' beṉ' wen lawe'na'.
’Chakomba beṉ'ka' chiyeshii beṉ', ḻa' ka'kzə yiyeshii Chioza' ḻegake'.
’Chakomba beṉ'ka' nxi nyech yic̱hjlall'do'eka', ḻa' ḻegaken' ile'gakile' Chioza'.
’Chakomba beṉ'ka' chon to dii byen soalen ljwellgake' mbalaz, ḻa' iṉa beṉ' dii ḻikzan nakgake' xiiṉ Chios.
’Chakomba beṉ'ka' chiya dii chen chle'i daa chongake' ka cheeni Chioza', ḻa' ḻegaken' yillingake' gana' chṉabi'e.
’Chakomba le' kat' chiya dii na beṉ' c̱hele na' chiya dii chongakile' le', na' kat'ka' chiyiljlall'gake' bittezə dill' wxiye' c̱hele daa chonḻilall'le nad'.
Ḻi yiba yizaki, ḻa' yabana' gaple to dii wen dii shao'. Ḻa' ka chongakile' le' ṉaa, ka'kzan bc̱hi' bsak'gake' kani'yi dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake'.
’Len' nakle ka zedaa ladj beṉ' yell-lioki. Zedaa, shi bich zxi'n, aga wakch yiyonchon zxi' ni bich gak wc̱hinchon, na' chchooṉchon gana' wlej wshoshj beṉ' ḻen.
’Len' nakle ka to beeni' ladj beṉ' yell-lioki. To yell dii llia to lo yaa, zit'lə nḻa'n, na' bi ngashaan.
Ni biga zoa to beṉ' chxene' kandila' na' chdose'n to dii wkwashaan ḻen, san chzoe'n sibə kwenc̱he wzeeni'n doxen ḻoo yoona'.
Ka'kzan le', ḻi gon to dii byen gonle daa nak wen kwenc̱he ile'i beṉ' na' we'la'ogake' X̱acho Chioza' zoa yabana'.
’Bi gakzile bid' kwenc̱he yikwas' ley daa bzej dii Moisézan' wa daa bli' bsedi dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegaken'. Bi nakan ka', san bid' kwenc̱he yiyoll gak yog'ḻoḻ ka na leya' na' daa bli' bsedi beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake'.
Dii ḻi nia' le', shlak biṉ' te c̱he yabana' len yell-lioni, bi init ni shc̱ho'a dill' daa nllia ley c̱he Chioza' bia' gak, ax̱t ki gakch yog'ḻoḻ daa bllie' bia' gak.
Daan, nottezə beṉ' chyishje' to daa nllia Chioza' bia' goncho, ḻa'kzi dii bi llialotek, na' shi wliile' beṉ' yoblə gone' ka chone', bitek bi zakee yabana' gana' chṉabia' Chioza'. San beena' gon daa nllia Chioza' bia' goncho na' wliile' beṉ' yoblə gone'n, beenan' gake' to beṉ' zakii yabana' gana' chṉabia' Chioza'.
Na' nia' le', aga wak yillinle gana' zoa Chioza' chṉabi'e shi toz ka chonlenle fariseoka' na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya', chiyaḻ' wzenagchle c̱he Chioza' aga ka ḻegake'.
Na' ḻekzka' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ṉezkzile goll dii Moiséza' dii x̱ozxto'choka': “Bi chiyaḻ' wito' beṉ'. Ḻa' beena' wit to beṉ' chiyaḻ' guete' daa bene' ka'.”
Per nad' nia' le', nottez beena' chllee bish' ljwelle'na' chidoḻee tie' lo yeḻ' zak'zi'na'. Na' ḻekzka' beena' chzoazi'yee bish' ljwelle'na', beṉ'ka' chṉabia' chiyaḻ' wwiagake' nak gongake' c̱he'; na' beena' chṉie' bish' ljwelle'na' dill' zibia', chidoḻee wzaḻ' Chioza' ḻe' lo yi' gabiḻa'.
’Daan, shi ka zjoo daa chzanilo' wi'o Chioza' na' ka illino' gana' chzeygake'n lljadinilo' ngoolall' to bish' ljwello'na' li',
na'z bkwaaṉ daa nox̱oo, zigaate chiyaḻ' lljaye'xeno' bish' ljwello'na', na'tech wak wi'o Chioza' daa chzanilo' wi'one'.
’Shi no cheeni lljtao xya c̱ho' lao josc̱hiska', ben byen yiyoe'xeno'ne' shlak ni de xḻatjin. Ḻa' shi ba bllino' lao beena' wc̱hogbia' c̱ho', na' gone' li' lo na' beena' wseje' li' lillyana'.
Dii ḻi nia' li', aga wibeje' li' lillyana' ax̱t ki c̱hixjo' doxen daa chiyaḻ' c̱hixjo'.
’Ṉezkzile wna dii Moiséza': “Bi chiyaḻ' iṉeleno' nool bi nak nool c̱ho'.”
San nad' nia' le', nottez beena' chwia to noolə na' chza'lalleene' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena', daa chone' ka' ba benkze' ka chon beena' zoate xoole'na' na' chṉelene' nool yoblə.
’Shi jalawo' de shḻina' chonan ka gono' dii mala', naklan wen wtoḻjo'n na' c̱hooṉo'n. Ḻa' wenchan soa tḻaaz jalawo'na' aga ka daa yiyaj doxentio' lo yi' gabiḻa'.
Na' shi noo de shḻina' chonan ka gono' dii mala', naklan wen wc̱hogo'n na' c̱hooṉo'n, ḻa' wenchan soa tḻaaz noona' aga ka daa yiyaj doxentio' lo yi' gabiḻa'.
’Ṉezkzile wna dii Moiséza': “Nottez beena' yiḻaa nool c̱he'na' chiyaḻ' c̱has to yish we'n dill' nan bilaagake'.”
San nad' nia' le' shi to beṉ' byo yiḻee xoole'na' ḻa'kzi xoole'na' bi chṉelene' beṉ' yoblə, daa yiḻeene' chone' ka yikaa noola' beṉ' yoblə na' gake' ka to noolə zoalentie' beṉ' c̱he'na' na' chṉelene' beṉ' yoblə. Na' beena' yikee noola' nḻaa beṉ' c̱he'na', ḻekzka' chone' ka chon beena' chṉelen xool beṉ' yoblə.
’Ḻekzka' ṉezkzile golle' dii x̱ozxto'leka': “Bi wkwaaṉzo' ka'zə daa ba bc̱hebo' lao X̱ancho Chioza' shi bzoatio' bi bzo' de tasc̱hiw.”
San nad' nia' le', bibi wzoale de tasc̱hiw kat' wc̱heble lao Chioza'. Bi wzoazle yabana' de tasc̱hiw, ḻa' yabana' nakan gana' zoa Chioza'.
Na' ni bi wzoale yell-lioni de tasc̱hiw, ḻa' nakan ka gana' nzoa ṉi'a Chioza'; na' ni Jerusalénna', ḻa' ḻennan' yell c̱he beena' chṉabia' doxen.
Na' ni bi wzoazle yic̱hjlena' de tasc̱hiw, ḻa' aga wak gonle ka yiyak ni to yish' yic̱hjlena' yish' bez' shi nakan dii gasj wa gonle ka yiyakan dii gasj shi nakan yish' bez'.
San kon iṉale “wakan” wa iṉale “bi gakan”, ḻa' shi chzoale de tasc̱hiw bichlə wa nochlə, dii malan' chonan chonle ka'.
’Ḻekzka' ṉezkzile' wna dii Moiséza': “Shi to beṉ' wshoshje' tḻaa jalawo'na' ḻekzka' yiyono' c̱he'. Na' shi to beṉ' wx̱ope' ḻeyo'na', ḻekzka' yix̱opo' ḻeye'na'.”
San nad' nia' le': Bi yizi'o wzon c̱he beṉ' mala'. Shi no kap' x̱agoona' tḻaa, bi'e daa zi shḻaa.
Shi to beṉ' chbagoo dii chbagoo c̱he' na' cheenile' ikee xkamiso'na', be'shaze' lente daa nx̱oa kolloona'.
Na' shi to beṉ' wwee li' yoa' c̱he'na' na' gone' byen woon to kilómetro, wza'lentegan c̱hop kilómetro.
Na' nottezə beṉ' shi bi iṉabe' c̱ho', be'n. Na' shi no iṉabi li' wi'one' shloll bi de c̱ho', bi wllonilo'ne'n.
’Na' ḻekzka' ṉezile wnagake': “Goki bish' ljwello'na' na' bwiyi beṉ'ka' chakzi' chakzbangakile' li'.”
San nad' nia' le': Ḻi gaki beṉ'ka' chakzbangakile' le', ḻi iṉabi Chioza' gak wen c̱he beṉ'ka' chsak'zi'gake' le'.
Shi gonle ka', na'ch iṉezi beṉ' nakle xiiṉ X̱acho Chioza', beena' zoa yabana'. Ḻa' ḻe' chone' ka chla' wbilla' lao beṉ' mal na' lao beṉ' wen, na' chone' ka chak yeja' lao beṉ' chon wen na' lao beṉ' chon mal.
Na' shi to beṉ'ka' nllagzile chakile, aga bi zjanayin, ḻa' ka'klen chon beṉ' wic̱hixjka' beṉ'ka' chakile ḻe beṉ' mal nakgake'.
Na' shi to beṉ'ka' nllagzile chwaple chiox, ¿garan de dii wenna' chonle? Ḻa' ka'klen chon beṉ'ka' bi nombia'gake' Chioza'.
Ḻi gak dowalj beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' ka nak X̱acho Chioza' zoa yabana', nake' dowalj beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao'.
’Bi wli' wzez c̱hele ladj beṉ' nan nakle beṉ' wen. Ḻa' shi kwenc̱hezə ile'i beṉaan chonle daa nak wen, bibi laxjle goṉ X̱acho Chioza', beena' zoa yabana'.
Na' kat' chaklenle beṉ'ka' chyallj chc̱hini, bi wzelen dill', ka chon beṉ' wxiye'ka' gana' chdop chllagcho choe'ḻwillcho Chioza', wa do yawi nez. Choe'gake' dill' c̱he daa chongake' kwenc̱he we'la'o beṉ' ḻegake'. Dii ḻi nia' le', daa choe'la'o beṉ' ḻegake', ḻennan' laxje'ka'.
San le', kat' choe'le beṉ' bi dii choe'lene', bi gonlen ka ile'i beṉ'. Na' ni to beṉ' bi ye'lene' bin chonle.
San ḻi gaklen beṉ' ka kono gakbe'i. Na' X̱achona', beena' chen chle'i daa chonle, goṉe' laxjle.
’Na' kat' choe'ḻwill-le Chioza', bi gonle ka beṉ' wxiye'ka'. Ḻegake' choolall'gake' sechagake' we'ḻwillgake' Chioza' gana' chdop chllagcho choe'ḻwillchone' wa ga lle' lla' beṉ' kwenc̱he ile'gakile' ka chongake'. Dii ḻi nia' le', daa chle'i beṉ' ka chongake', ḻezannan' laxje'ka'.
San le', kat' we'ḻwill-le Chioza', ḻi yiyoo ḻoo lill-lena' na' ḻi wsej puerta', na' ḻi we'ḻwill X̱achona', beena' kono chle'i. Na'ch X̱achona', beena' chen chle'i daa chonle, goṉe' laxjle.
’Na' kat' choe'ḻwill-le Chioza' aga ḻiḻezi dill'ka' iṉale ka chon beṉ'ka' bi nombia'gake'ne', ḻa' chakgakile' daa choe'gake' dill' zan na' wzenague' bin che'gake'ne'.
Bi gonle ka chongake', ḻa' X̱acho Chioza' ba ṉezkzile' bi daa chyalljile ka zi' iṉabləlen.
Kat' we'ḻwill-le Chioza', kin iṉale: X̱anto' Chios, beṉ' zoa yaba, we'la'oshga yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' li'.
Na' iṉabia'gacho' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ', kwenc̱he gak lo yell-lioni ka chaklalloo, ka chak yabana'.
Ka nak daa choṉo' cheej chaonto' yog' lla, beṉgachan ṉaanlla.
Wxi'xen c̱hento', ka chon neto' chzi'xennto' bittezə dii choni beṉ' neto'.
Bi we'gacho' latj ibix̱nto' gonnto' daa bi nak wen, san bislagach neto' lo ṉi'a na' dii mala'. Ḻa' lin' napo' yeḻ' wṉabia', na' yeḻ' wak, na' lin' chidoḻoo shoo balaaṉ xen zejḻi kaṉi. Kan' nakan.
’Ḻa' shi le' chzi'xenle c̱he beṉ' shi bi chongakile' le', ka'kzə X̱acho Chioza' zoa yabana' si'xene' c̱hele.
San shi le' bi chzi'xen c̱he ljwell-le, ka'kzə Chioza', beena' nak X̱ale, bi si'xene' dii malka' chonle.
’Kat' zoale wbas', bi gonzle cho'alaolena' nyesh' ka chon beṉ' wxiye'ka', ḻa' ḻegake' chon cho'alawe'ka' nyesh' kwenc̱he gakbe'i beṉ' bi neej naogake'. Dii ḻi nia' le', daa gakbe'i beṉ' daa chongake', ḻezannan' laxje'ka'.
San le', kat' soale wbas', ḻi wpaa yic̱hjlena' na' ḻi c̱hib ḻi wx̱is cho'alaolena'
kwenc̱he bi gakbe'i beṉ' nan zoale wbas'. San toz X̱acho Chioza', beena' kono chle'i, ile'ile' daa chonle na' goṉe' laxjle.
’Bi wtop wshagle yeḻ' wni'ana' yell-lioni, ḻa' baḻ diika' chaljan baka' chlliayi'gakban, na' baḻan chibia leyin na' chbiayi'gakan, wa choo wbanka' na' chkaagake'n.
San ḻi gon ka gat' yeḻ' shao' c̱hele yabana', ḻa' daa de yabana' bi galjan bado' wlliayi'ban, ni bi yibia leyin, ni bi gak sho' wbanna' ikeen.
Ḻa' gana' de yeḻ' shao' c̱helena', na'kzan se yic̱hjlall'do'lena' wṉeyi.
’Jalaochoki nakgakan beeni' c̱he kwerp c̱hechoni. Shi jalaochoki chle'gakin kwasḻoḻ, doxen kwerp c̱hechoni zoan lo beeni'na'.
Per shi bi chle'i jalaochoki, kwerp c̱hechoni zoan lo yel c̱hoḻa'. Ka'kzan chak c̱he yic̱hjlall'do'choni. Shi bi chzenagcho c̱he Chioza', nc̱hoḻi yic̱hjlall'do'choni.
’Aga ga zoa to beṉ' wḻane' xshin c̱hop beṉ', ḻa' wakzbanile' beena' to, na' gakchile' beena' sto, wa gone' xshin beena' to do yic̱hj do lallee na' xshin beena' sto gone'n do ki do lallee. Na' ka'kzan chak c̱hecho len Chioza', aga wak goncho ka cheenile' shi we'techo latj iṉabia' yeḻ' wni'ana' cho'.
’Daan nia' le': Bitek kwek yic̱hjle daa yeej gaole kwenc̱he ibanle, ni xalaanle. Ḻa' zak'techlə yeḻ' mban c̱hechona' aga ka daa cheej chaocho, na' zak'tech kwerp c̱hechona' aga ka xalaanchona'.
Ḻi wwiakachi byiṉdo'ka' chda xan yabana', ḻa'kzi bi chaz chaaṉgakb na' bibi chizi' chilapgakb, ni bi zoa ga chgooshao'gakb dii gaogakb, len chweej chwaokz X̱acho Chioza' zoa yabana' ḻegakb. ¿Alechlin le', zak'techle aga ka bado'ka' ze lo llazə?
Na' ni tole bi gak yisc̱hooch yeḻ' mban c̱helena' zi shloll ḻa'kzi nall inlleb zele wṉeyi c̱heyin.
’Na' ¿bic̱he chi' yic̱hjzle xalaanlena'? Wwiakachile ka chgol yejdo'ka' ze lyix̱aa, len aga bi llin chongakan ni bi choḻgakan do.
Per nia' le', ni dii Salomónna', beena' wdapchga yeḻ' shao'ka', bi bllin gak xe'na' xochi ka yejdo'ka'.
Na' shi Chioza' none' yejdo'ka' ze lyix̱aa xochi, ḻa'kzi nakan de toldezə na'tech chtop beṉ' ḻen na' chzeye'n, ¿alechla le', gontechle' wen c̱hele goṉe' xalaanle ḻa'kzi bitek chajḻe'le gaklene' le'?
Na' bi kwek yic̱hjzle iṉazle: “¿Bin yeej gaocho?” wa “¿Nak goncho gat' xalaancho?”
Ḻa' beṉ'ka' bi nonḻilall'gake' Chioza' to daazə chi' yic̱hjgake'. Per X̱achona', beena' zoa yabana', ṉezkzile' chyalljile yog' diiki.
Na' daa llialote chiyaḻ' wzenagle c̱he Chioza' kwenc̱he iṉabi'e le', na' gonle kon daa cheenile', na' goṉkze' yog' daa chyalljile.
Bitek kwek yic̱hjle shi wyaj wdele llaka' zi za' ḻa' to to lla nsa' dii zed c̱heyin.
’Bi yiya yiyiljle beṉ', kwenc̱he bi yiya yiyilj Chioza' le'.
Ḻa' kon ka chiya chiyiljle beṉ', ka'kzan yiya yiyilj Chioza' le', na' kon ka gonile beṉ', ka'kzan goni Chioza' le'.
¿Bic̱he chwiazo' bic̱ha' yoo ḻoo jalao bish' ljwello'na' na' bi chile'ilo' kwagaa yoo ḻoo jalawo'na'?
Shi bi chle'ilo' kwagaa yoo ḻoo jalawo'na', ¿nakra gono' yoo bish' ljwello'na': “Beṉshki yibej' bic̱ha' yoo ḻoo jalawo'na'”?
¡Beṉ' wxiye'! Zigaate bwia c̱ho'na' na'tech wwio' c̱he bish' ljwello'na'.
’Na' bi gonzle byen we'lenle xtill' Chioza' beṉ'ka' bi chazlall'gake'n, kwenc̱he ki gongakile' le' zṉia ka chon bekw'ka' chxoxj chtingakb kat' no chonḻegakib. Ni bi we'lenle xtill' Chioza' beṉ'ka' bi cheengakile' wzenaggake'n kwenc̱he ki wlej wshoshjgake' dillaa ka chon kushka' chlej chshoshjgakb daa bi choolall'gakb gaogakb.
’Ḻi iṉabi Chioza' bin cheenile na' goṉe'n. Ḻi yiyilj daa cheenile na' yillelilen. Ḻi iṉe cho'a puerta', na' wsalje'n.
Ḻa' beena' chṉabile' beṉ' daa cheenile', we'kze'n; na' beena' chiyilje' daa cheenile', willelkzile'n; na' beena' chṉe cho'a puerta', wsaljkzgake' sho'e.
’Le' zoa xiiṉle, shi iṉabib' le' to yetxtil aga we'leb' to yaj.
Wa shi iṉabib' le' to beḻ yaa, aga we'leb' to beḻ zṉia.
Shi le' naktele beṉ' mal chak we'le xiiṉleka' daa nak dii wen, ¿alechli X̱acho Chioza' zoa yabana' ki goṉe' le' dii wen dii shawaa shi iṉabilene'n?
’Kon ka cheenile goni beṉ' le', ka'kzan chiyaḻ' gonilene', ḻa' kan' na leya' na' librka' bzej dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake'.
’Ḻi gon byen sho'le cho'a puerta' daa nshop'. Ḻa' nḻag' puerta' na' zlag' nak neza' daa zej gana' chbiayi' beṉ', na' beṉ' zan choogake'n.
Per ka nak neza' daa zej yabana' gana' lljazoalencho Chioza', nakan to nez les, na' to c̱hopchga beṉ' chillelgakile'n.
’Ḻi wsak' kwenc̱he bi shajḻe'le c̱he beṉ'ka' chonz ka chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza' ḻegake', na' chonz kwingake' beṉ' wen beṉ' gax̱jlall', per beṉ' malzgakan na' chlliayi'gake' beṉ', ka chon to ba zṉia.
Ka ile'ile ka nsa' c̱hegake' na' gakbe'ile non nakgake'. Ḻa' ṉezkzile aga wishibcho uvana' to lo yag yesh' na' ḻekzka' aga wishibcho yix̱wewa' to lo yag yesh' yaa.
Ka'kzan yag wenna' chbian dii wen, na' yaga' daa bi nak wen chbian dii bi nak wen.
Ḻa' yaga' daa nak dii wen aga wbian dii bi nak wen, na' yaga' daa bi nak dii wen aga wbian dii nak wen.
Yog' yag dii chbia dii bi nak wen, chc̱hoggake'n na' chzeygake'n.
Daan, wakbe'kzile ka nsa' c̱he beṉ'ka'.
’Aga yog' beṉ'ka' na nad': “X̱an', X̱an'”, yillingake' yabana' gana' chṉabia' Chioza', ḻete beṉ'ka' chongake' ka cheeni X̱a' Chioza', beena' zoa yabana'.
Kat'ka' illin llana' yizia' kwent c̱he ben', zangake' iṉagake' nad': “X̱an', X̱an', neto' wdix̱jeento' daa wno', na' kon yeḻ' wak c̱ho'na' bibejnto' dii x̱iw'ka' yoo beṉ' na' bennto' dii zan yeḻ' wak.”
Na'ch yepgakee: “Biga bembi'a le'. Ḻi kwas ka'lə, le' beṉ' wen dii mal.”
’Daan, nottez beena' chzenag cho'a xtillaani na' chone' ka nia', nake' ka to beṉ' sin', beena' ben lille'na' to lo yaj.
Na' ka gok yejsiwaa, bgol yaoka', na' wzechga be'na' nan wllig'gakan yoona', per bi billeen daa chi'cha leninna' lo yaja'.
Per beena' cheni cho'a xtillaani na' bi chone' ka nia', nake' ka beena' bi chajnii, beena' bx̱e lille'na' lo yoxa'.
Na' ka gok yejsiwaa, bgol yaoka', na' wzechga be'na' na' bllig'gakan yoona' na' wlliayi'tekzan.
Na' ka biyoll be' Jesúza' dillii, bibani beṉ'ka' ka chli' chsedile',
daa bli' bsedile' ḻegake' ḻega beṉ' za'len yeḻ' wṉabia', aga ka chli' chsedi beṉ'ka' chzajnii ḻegake' leya'.
Na' ka biyetj Jesúza' lo yaana', beṉ' zan zinogake'ne'.
Na' kwite'na' bllin to beṉ' che'ile' lepra', na'ch bc̱hek' xibe' lawe'na', chi'ene': ―X̱an', ṉezid' wak yikwaso' yillwe'ni chak' sheḻ' gueenilo'.
Na'ch Jesúza' bx̱oa neena' yic̱hje'na', chi'ene': ―Cheenid'x. Na' ṉaate yikwasa'n. Na' kon ka golle' ka', lii biyakteyi beena'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Ni to kono yoo ka nak daa ba ben' c̱ho'. Ḻete wyaj lao bx̱oza' kwenc̱he ile'ile' ba biyakilo', na' jwa' daa chiyaḻ' lljoo lao Chioza' ka nllia dii Moiséza' bia' goncho kwenc̱he iṉezi beṉ' ba biyakilo'.
Ka billin Jesúza' yell Capernaúma' lii bllinte to x̱an soldad lawe'na', na' got'yoile'ne',
chi'ene': ―X̱an', xmosaa die' lillaa, na' net tḻaa kwerp c̱he'na' na' ḻe chey chle'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Na' sa' yiyonee.
Na' che' x̱an soldadka'ne': ―X̱an', aga zakii nad' kwenc̱he shoo ḻoo yoo lillaa. Kon ben mandad yiyakile' na' wiyakkzile'.
Nia' ka' ḻa' zoa beṉ' chṉabia' nad', na' nad' ḻekzka' chṉabia' soldad c̱ha'ka'. Kat' chep' toe': “Wyaj ni'”, na' chaje'; na' kat' chep' stoe': “Da ni”, na' chide'; na' kat' chizep' xmosaa: “Ben dga”, na' chone'n.
Ka beni Jesúza' cho'a xtilleena', bibanile' na' chi'e beṉ'ka' nogake' ḻe': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', bigaṉ' lljtia' to beṉ' Israel beṉ' gonḻilallee nad' ka chonḻilall' beeni nad'.
Na' nad' nia' le', beṉ' zan beṉ' zaak doxen yell-lioni gonḻilall'gake' nad' na' lljazoalengake' txen dii Abrahama', dii Isaaca' na' dii Jacoba' yabana' gana' chṉabia' Chioza'.
Na' ka nak beṉ'ka' wlej Chioza' nan lljazoagake' gana' chṉabi'e, zane' wzaḻee gana' shgasj shc̱hoḻ, gana' kwellyesh'gake' na' gaoyaax̱ax̱j ḻeye'ka' daa ḻe gakshejlall'gake', daa bi goongakile' iṉabi'e ḻegake'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' x̱an soldadka': ―Biyaj lillo'na', na' gak ka cheenilo' daa chajḻi'o c̱ha'. Na' lo lla lo gorzə biyaki xmose'na'.
Na'ch wyaj Jesúza' lill Pédrona', na' ble'ile' de tobiiṉ c̱he'na' yo'e dii ḻana'.
Na' bex̱' Jesúza' neena' na' bicheje' dii ḻana'. Na' lii wyastie' bene' dii wdaogake'.
Na'ch ka ba chxoa wbilla', jwa'gake' beṉ' zan gana' zoa Jesúza', beṉ' yoo dii x̱iw'ka', na' shcho'azə dillaa bi'e bichejgakan. Na' ḻekzka' biyone' yog' beṉ' bi shao'.
Gok ka' kwenc̱he gok ka wna dii Isaíaza', beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne', daa wne': “Ḻe' bikee yillwe'ka' che'icho na' bene' ka bigaa yeḻ' chey chla c̱hechona'.”
Na' ka ble'i Jesúza' beṉ' zan inlleb ba nec̱hjgake'ne', bene' mandad telene' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen shḻaa nisdo'na'lə.
Na' wbig' to beṉ' chli' chsedi leya', chi'ene': ―Maestro, cheenid' sa'len' li' gattezə shajo'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Bez'ka' nongakb yech ga chiyoogakb, na' byiṉdo'ka' non lilldo'gakb, san nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, bibi lill' de.
Na' bchej sto beṉ' nake' Jesúza' txen na' chi'ene': ―X̱an', wza'len' li' gattezə shajo' ka yiyoll guet x̱a'na'.
Na'ch goll Jesúza'ne': ―Da, dino nad'. Wikwash'kzə ljwell beṉ' wetka'.
Na'ch wyoo Jesúza' ḻoo barkwa' len beṉ'ka' ba nakgake'ne' txen.
Na' shlak zej barkwa' wtese'. Na' wzolo wzechga be'na' lo nisdo'na', na' wzolo chas chataan na' biyoll nisa' ḻoo barkwa'.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen jasbangake'ne', na' che'gake': ―¡X̱an', bisla cho'! ¡Ba chbe'cho yel!
Na'ch che' Jesúza': ―¿Berac̱he chlleblikzle? ¿Bic̱he bi nx̱enilall'le nad' kwasḻoḻ? Na'ch wyase' bsheshlene' be'na' len nisdo'na', na' wlezgakan.
Na' beṉ'ka' lle'len Jesúza' ḻoo barkwa' bibangakile' ka bene', na'ch che' ljwellgake': ―¿Noran nak beeni, lla? Ax̱t be'na' na' nisdo'na' chzenaggakan c̱he'.
Na' ka bllin Jesúza' yell-liona' mbani Gadárana' daa llia shḻaa nisdo'na', c̱hop beṉ' yoogake' dii x̱iw'ka' bchejgake' ḻoo kapsanta' jatiḻgake'ne'. Na' daa ḻe zṉiagake' aga no chak te lo neza' chde gana' zoagake'.
Na' besyaagakan che'gakan Jesúza': ―¿Bic̱he za'zo' gani zoanto', Jesús, Xiiṉ Chios? ¿Aba za'zelo' zidsak'zi'o neto' ḻa'kzi biṉ' illin lla sak'zi'nto'?
Na' gaoz lle' ba zan kush chaogakb.
Na'ch got'yoi dii x̱iw'ka' Jesúza', che'gakan ḻe': ―Shi yibejo' neto' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ'ki, we'gacho' latj yiyoonto' kushka'.
Na'ch goll Jesúza' ḻegakan: ―Wakkzan. Ḻi yiyoo shka'. Na'ch bichej dii x̱iw'ka' na' biyoogakan kushka', na' kushka' lii bxoṉjtegakb na' jabix̱gakb to cho'a yaa na' bxoptegakb ḻoo nisdo'na' na' wche'gakb yel.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' chap kushka' bixoṉjdogake', na' ka billingake' lalle'ka' gollgake' beṉ' yellka' doxen ka gok c̱he beṉ'ka' yoo dii x̱iw'ka'.
Na'ch wza' yog' beṉ' yellka' zjatiḻgake' Jesúza', na' ka ble'gakile'ne' got'yogakile'ne' yiyaje' gan yoblə.
Na' biyoo Jesúza' to ḻoo barkw, na'ch biḻag'gake' shḻaa nisdo'na' na' billine' yell c̱he'na' gana' wzee.
Na' bllinlengake' to beṉ' net ṉi'a neena' lawe'na', nx̱oagake'ne' to lo daa. Na' gokbe'i Jesúza' ḻe nonḻilall'gake'ne', na'ch golle' beṉ' we'na': ―Btiplalloo, xiiṉ', ba biyakxen xtoḻoona'.
Na'ch baḻ beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' che' ljwellgake': “Ba chonz kwin beeni ka Chioza' daa ne' ka'.”
Na' gokbe'i Jesúza' daa wza'lall'gake', na' chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Bic̱he chza'lall'zle ka'?
¿Achakile chyalljchid' yeḻ' wak xench yep' beeni: “Ba bizi'xen' saaxya c̱ho'na'”, ka daa yepee: “Biyas na' bigoo nez”?
Na' wliid' le', nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza', nap' yeḻ' wṉabia' yell-lioni kwenc̱he yizi'xen' saaxya c̱he beṉ'. Na'ch golle' beena' net ṉi'a neena': ―Biyas, bitob daa c̱ho'na', na' biyaj lillo'na'.
Na'ch biyas beena' net ṉi'a neena' na' ziyaje' lille'na'.
Na' ka ble'i beṉ'ka' ka gok, bibangakile', na' be'la'ogake' Chioza' daa bi'e yeḻ' wak xenna' to beṉ' yell-lio.
Ka biza' Jesúza' na', ble'ile' to beṉ' wic̱hixj, lie' Mateo, chi'e gana' chc̱hixje'. Na' chi'ene': ―Da, dino nad'. Na'ch lii wzolla'te Matewa' janoe'ne'.
Na' shlak chi' Jesúza' lill Matewa', bllin beṉ' zan wic̱hixjka' na' zan beṉ' zeyi c̱heyi bi nsa' c̱hegake' wen, wche'gake' cho'a mesa' wdaolengake' Jesúza' len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen.
Na'ch ka ble'i fariseoka' chaolen Jesúza' beṉ'ka', na'ch wṉabgakile' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen, che'gake': ―¿Bic̱he chaolenz maestro c̱heleni beṉ' wic̱hixjki len beṉ'ki bi nsa' c̱heyin wen?
Na' beni Jesúza' daa goll fariseoka', na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―Aga beṉ'ka' shawaan chyalljgakile' wen rmecha' san beṉ'ka' bi shawaan chyalljgakile'ne'.
Ḻi yiyaj na' ḻi lljased bin zeji Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' nan: “Nad' cheenchid' yiyeshii ljwell-le, aga ka daa witle bayix̱'ka' kwenc̱he we'la'ole nad'.” Aga bid' ni c̱he beṉ'ka' nak beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao', san bid' ni c̱he beṉ' saaxyaka'.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nak Juanna' txen jabig'gake' kwit Jesúza' na' wṉabgakile'ne' che'gake': ―Neto' na' fariseoka' zeyi c̱hento' chzoanto' wbas'. Na' ¿bic̱he beṉ'ka' nakgake' li' txen bi chzoagake' wbas'?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Kat' chak to wishagna' beṉ'ka' chdi'a chllag lill beṉ' byona' aga chdagake' nyesh', san cheej chaogake'. Na' ka'kzan beṉ'ki nakgake' nad' txen, cheej chaogake' ṉaa zoalen' ḻegake', per wllin lla wkwas beṉ' nad' kwite'ka', kana'chan soagake' wbasaa.
’Ni to kono chida' lat' lech' kob ḻee lech' gola', ḻa' kat' shechan na' yibe' lech' koba' na' wsho'chan dii gola' na' gana' nllo' gakchan dii xench.
Na' aga no chgaa vino daa zi' bchejte ḻoo yid gola', ḻa' wchez' yid gola' na' ḻaljə vinona', na' ka vinona' ka yida' kwiayi'gakan. San chiyaḻ' sholl vino daa zi' bchejte ḻoo yid koba' kwenc̱he ni ton bi kwiayi'.
Na' ni choe'te Jesúza' dill', ka bllin to beṉ' wṉabia' na' bc̱hek' xibe'na' lao Jesúza', chi'ene': ―Shintg wit to bi' nool c̱ha'; per shi li' sa'gacho' na' wx̱oa noona'b' na' yibam'.
Na'ch lii wzolla'te Jesúza' zejlene' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen lill beṉ' wṉabia'na'.
Na' ka zejgake' lill beṉ' wṉabia'na' jano to noolə ḻegake', na' ba gok shlliṉ yiz chzoe' wbaa. Na'ch wbiguee koll' Jesúza' bex̱ee xe'na',
ḻa' chakile': “Kon sheḻ' ba bex̱aa xe'na' wiyakkzid'.”
Na' biyec̱hj Jesúza' na' ka ble'ile' noola' chi'ene': ―Btiplalloo, xiiṉ', ba biyakilo' daa chonḻilalloo nad'. Na' lii biyakteyi noola'.
Na' ka bllin Jesúza' lill beṉ' wṉabia'na' ba lle' beṉ'ka' chkwell blleja' na' beṉ' zan ba chosyaagake' chbellgake'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' beṉ'ka': ―Ḻi yillesh ni. Aga witba'n san cheszbaan. Per bxill-ligake'ne'.
Na' ben Jesúza' byen billeshgake', na' wyo'e na' bex̱ee na' bi' nool weta' na' lii biyasteb'.
Na' yog' yellka' llia gaoz wze dill' daa bene'.
Na' ka biza' Jesúza', c̱hop beṉ' lc̱hoḻ janogake'ne'. Na' chosyaagake' zilljə che'gake': ―¡Biyesh'lall'gachi neto', xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Daví!
Ka biyoo Jesúza' ḻoo yoona', beṉ' lc̱hoḻka' jabig'gake' kwite'na'. Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Achajḻe'le wak gon' ka ile'ile? Na'ch goll beṉ' lc̱hoḻka'ne': ―Awe, X̱annto', wak gono' ka ile'into'.
Na'ch bex̱' Jesúza' jalawe'ka' na' golle' ḻegake': ―Daa chonḻilall'le nad' na' gak ka cheenile.
Na'ch bile'gakile'. Na' Jesúza' golle' ḻegake': ―Ḻi gon byen kono ye'le ka'.
Per ka biza'gake' kwite'na' lii wzolotegake' choe'gake' dill' doxen gana' mbani yella' daa ben Jesúza' c̱hegake'.
Shlak chiza' beṉ'ka' gok beṉ' lc̱hoḻ, bllin beṉ' yoblə lao Jesúza' nc̱he'gake' to beṉ' bi chak iṉe daa yo'e dii x̱iwaa.
Na' kon ka bibej Jesúza' dii x̱iwaa yoo beena' na' biṉie'. Na' bibani beṉ'ka' lle' na', nagake': ―Ni shlin biṉ' ile'icho yell Israeli to yeḻ' wak ka dga ba ben beeni.
Per fariseoka' che'gake': ―Beeni chibeje' dii x̱iw'ka' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he daa chṉabia' ḻegakan.
Na' wda Jesúza' yog' yellka', ka yell xen ka yelldo', chli' chsedile' to to gana' chdop chllag beṉ' Israelka' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza'. Wdix̱je'ile' ḻegake' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' na' biyone' beṉ' che'i bittezə yillwe'.
Na' ble'i Jesúza' beṉ' zan zejlengake'ne' na' biyeshile' ḻegake', ḻa' gokbe'ile' ka nyesh'lazan chak c̱hegake', ka xil' ba kono x̱anin zoa.
Na'ch golle' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―Dii ḻi nia' le', beṉ'ka' zi' gonḻilall'gake' Chioza' zaklebgakile' to dii wlliachga to lo yell-lio, na' chyallj no yizi' yilapan, per to c̱hopchga wen llinka' zoa.
Na' ḻi iṉabi X̱ancho Chioza' wzanche' beṉ'ka' wtopgake' beṉ'ka' gonḻilall'gake'ne'.
Na'ch biti'a Jesúza' beṉ'ka' shlliṉ wleje' na' bi'e ḻegake' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he gak yibejgake' dii x̱iw'ka' yoo beṉ', na' yiyongake' beṉ' che'i bittezə yillwe'.
Na' kin le postlka' shlliṉ: zigaate wleje' Simónna', beena' ḻekzka' che'gake' Pedro, len beṉ' bishee Andréza', na'tech Jacóbona' len beṉ' bishee Juanna', beṉ'ka' nak xiiṉ Zebedewa',
na'ch Felípena', Bartoloména', Tomáza', Mateo, beṉ' wic̱hixja', Jacobo xiiṉ Alfewa', Tadewa',
Simón, beena' bsi'gake' Zelote, na' Jud Scariota', beena' bene' Jesúza' lo na' beṉ' malka'.
Na'ch bseḻ' Jesúza' beṉ'ka' shlliṉ je'gake' cho'a xtill' Chioza', na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Bi shajle yellka' gana' zoa beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel, ni bi shajle yellka' llia gana' mbani Samáriana'.
San ḻi shaj gana' lle' beṉ' Israelka', beṉ'ka' nak ka xil' ba wnit.
Ḻi shaj ḻi lljtix̱jee ba zoa gaoshosh iṉabia' Chioza' beena' zoa yabana' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ'.
Ḻi yiyon beṉ'ka' bi shao' na' beṉ'ka' che'i lepra, ḻi yisban beṉ' ba wit, na' ḻi yibej dii x̱iw'ka' yoo beṉ'. Na' ka beṉ Chioza', beṉe' le' yeḻ' waka' ka'z, ka'kzan le' bibi wc̱hixjle yiyonle beṉ'.
’Na' bi wa'le mech de or, de plat ni de cobre.
Na' ni bi gaḻ'le no yix̱j les, ni bi gox̱'le zi shkwe' xale, ni zi shkwe' xel-le, ni bi gox̱'le yag bar, ḻa' to wen llin chidoḻee yeej gawe'.
’Na' kat' illinle to to yell xen wa yelldo'zə, c̱hiljle to beṉ' nsa' c̱he' wen, na' yigaaṉle lille'na' na' na'tezə soale ax̱t ka illinch lla yiza'le.
Na' ka sho'le lille'na' ye'lene': “Chioza' wzoe' le' mbalaz.”
Na' shi dii ḻi beṉ'ka' lle' na' nakgake' beṉ' wen, wakkzə daa ye'le ḻegake'; san shi bi nakgake' beṉ' wen, na' aga wakan.
Na' gattezə illinle shi kono wleb le' na' ni bi wzenaggake' c̱hele, na' yiza'le lill beena' wa yella' gana' gongakile' le' ka' na' yishible bishtena' llia ṉi'aleka'.
Dii ḻi nia' le', kat' illin lla wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he beṉ', yeḻ' zak'zi' xench ile'chi beṉ' yellka' gana' gongakile' le' ka' aga ka beṉ' yell Sodómana' na' yell Gomórrana'.
’Nad' chseḻaa le' ka xildo' ladj ba zṉiaka'. Na' chiyaḻ' gakle beṉ' sin' na' beṉ' wen.
Wsak'gale, ḻa' wchej beṉ' lljwee le' lao beṉ'ka' chṉabia' na' wit c̱hingake' le' gana' chdop chllagcho choe'ḻwillcho Chioza'.
Na' lljwa'gake' le' lao beṉ' wṉabia' xenka' daa chonḻilall'le nad', na' ka' gak we'lenle ḻegake' cho'a xtillaana' na' ka'kzə beṉ'ka' bi nakgake' beṉ' Israel.
Na' kat' gongake' le' lo na' beṉ'ka', bi sele wṉeyi naklə iṉale wa bi iṉale, ḻa' ka gaḻ' iṉele, Chioza' wx̱oe' dillaa cho'a ḻoll'leka'.
Ḻa' aga len' iṉele, san Espíritu c̱he X̱acho Chiozan' gone' ka iṉele.
’Beena' zoa beṉ' bishee ḻeteze' gone'ne' lo na' beṉ'ka' witgake'ne', na' beena' zoa xiiṉe' gone'b' lo na' beṉ' wite'b'. Na' soa beṉ' yizoshyi'e x̱axṉeena' na' gone' ḻegake' lo na' beṉ'ka' witgake' ḻegake'.
Yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' gakzbangakile' le' daa nonḻilall'le nad', per beena' so sakile' bittezə daa yen ile'ile' ax̱t kat' guete', beenan' gat' yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi.
Shi to yell yilaggake' le', ḻi yiyaj yell yoblə. Ḻa' dii ḻi nia' le' bilaṉ' yiyoll tale yog'ḻoḻ yellki mbani Israeli kat' illin lla yiyed' nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza'.
’To beṉ' chsed aga zak'che' ka beena' chli' chsedi ḻe', na' ka'kzə to wen llin aga zak'che' ka x̱ane'na'.
Na' beena' ni chsed yibaile' gake' ka beena' chli' chsedi ḻe', na' ka'kzə wen llinna', yibaile' gake' ka x̱ane'na'. Nad' nak' x̱anle, na' shi nagake' c̱ha' non' txen dii x̱iwaa daa le Bezlo, ¿alelə ki iṉagake' c̱hele ka'?
Bi illeble beṉ'ka' biya dii wc̱hi' wsak'gake' le'. Ḻa' daa kono ṉezi ṉaa, wllin lla ila'lawin, na' aga ga de to dii ngash' dii bi illin lla ila'lawin.
Diika' chli' chsedid' le' do ngash'zə, ḻi we'n dill' ladj lkwe' beṉ'. Na' diika' nia' le' to le'zə, ḻi wzenin yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'.
Bi illeble beṉ'ka' cheengakile' witgake' le', ḻa' kwerp c̱hele na'zan witgake', aga bi gak gongakile' yic̱hjlall'do'lena'. San Chiozan' chiyaḻ' illeble, ḻa' ḻen' wakə wlliayee kwerp c̱helena' len yic̱hjlall'do'lena' lo yi' gabiḻa'.
’Ḻa'kzi wak si'cho c̱hop byiṉdo' kon to sintabdo', ni tob bi guet shi X̱acho Chioza' bi wi'e latj.
Na' ka nakle le', ax̱t yish' yic̱hjlena' nḻabe'.
Daan bi chiyaḻ' illeble, ḻa' zak'ch le' aga ka ba zan byiṉdo'ka'.
’Beena' we' dill' lao beṉ' iṉe' nake' nad' txen, ka'kzə nad' yep' X̱a'na' zoa yabana' nake' nad' txen.
Na' beena' bi chc̱heb lao beṉ' nan nake' nad' txen, ka'kzə nad' yep' X̱a'na' zoa yabana' bi nake' nad' txen.
’Bi gakzile bid' lo yell-lioni kwenc̱he gon' ka soalen ljwell beṉ' mbalaz. Aga daan bid', san bid' kwenc̱he wx̱ia' wdiḻ.
Daa bid' na' yidiḻ-len beṉ' byona' x̱e'na' na' noola' yidiḻ-lene' xṉeena', na' beena' zoa xoolille' yidiḻ-lene' ḻe'.
Na' beṉ'ka' zoa toz yoo gakzbani ljwelle'.
’Beena' chakchile' x̱e'na' wa xṉeena' aga ka nad', bi chidoḻee gake' nad' txen, na' ka'kzə shi chaktechile' xiiṉe'na' ka nad', ḻekzka' bi chidoḻee gake' nad' txen.
Beena' bi chzani yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' yen ile'ile' bittezə kwenc̱he gone' ka nia', bi chidoḻee gake' nad' txen.
Na' beena' chakile' sheḻ' kono wc̱hi' wsak' ḻe', beenan' kwiayee. San beena' chzani yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' yen ile'ile' bittez daa nonḻilallee nad', beenan' gat' to yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi.
’Beena' wlebe' le', nad'kzan chlebe'. Na' beena' wlebe' nad' ḻekzka' Chioza', beena' bseḻ' nadaan, chlebe'.
Beena' wlebe' to beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne', lenkzen' ikee ka laxj beena' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne'. Na' ḻekzka' beena' wlebe' to beṉ' chone' daa nak shḻi daa chibaile' nake' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao', ḻekzka' lene'n ikee ka laxj beena' chon daa nak shḻi.
Na' beena' we' ḻa'c̱h' lat' nis yeej beṉ'ki nakgake' nad' txen, dii ḻi nia' le', de laxje'.
Na' ka biyoll goll Jesúza' beṉ'ka' shlliṉ bin chiyaḻ' gongake', na'ch bizee na', na' jali' jasedile' beṉ' na' jtix̱je'ile' ḻegake' cho'a xtill' Chioza' yellka' llia gana' mbani Galileana'.
Na' Juanna' beena' chchoa beṉ' nisa', ba die' lillyana'. Ka wṉezile' daa chon Crístona', na'ch bseḻee c̱hop beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen gana' zoe'.
Na' jaṉabgakile'ne' che'gake': ―¿Alin' beena' ba llia bia' yid?, ¿anti chiyaḻ' kweznto' sto beṉ' yoblə?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi yiyaj na' ḻi lljayell Juanna' daa chenile nia' na' daa chle'ile chon'.
Ḻi lljayelle' chon' ka chle'i beṉ' lc̱hoḻka', na' chiza' beṉ'ka' bi chak sa', na' chiyaki beṉ'ka che'i lepra, na' chiyeni beṉ' kwellka', na' chisban' beṉ'ka' ba wit, na' chyix̱je'id' beṉ' yesh'ka' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Chioza'.
Chakomba beena' chajḻe' c̱ha' na' bi chakc̱hoplallee.
Na' ka biza' beṉ'ka' bseḻ' Juanna', na'ch wzolo Jesúza' be'lene' beṉ'ka' lle' na' xtill' Juanna', chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Nakran nsa' c̱he beena' jawiale latja' gana' bibi chashj chḻeb? ¿Anake' to beṉ' chakc̱hoplallii c̱he dill'ka' cho'e?
Shi bi nakan ka', ¿nakran nak beena' jawiale? ¿Ato beṉ' nakw xalaane' dii ḻe nakə? Bi nakan ka'. Ḻa' ṉezkzile beṉ'ka' nakw xalaangake' dii ḻe nak zoagake' ḻoo yoo lill beṉ' wṉabia'ka'.
¿Nakrakzan nak beena' jawiale? ¿Ato beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne'? Dii ḻi kan' chone', na' chontechle' ka beṉ'ka' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza' ḻegake'.
Ḻa' c̱he beenin cho'e Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' dill' daa nan: Wseḻaa beena' kwialo lawo'na', na' c̱hix̱ji'e xtilloona' kwenc̱he soa beṉ' wzenaggake' c̱ho' kat' illino'.
Dii ḻi nia' le', ladj yog' beṉ' yell-lioki, ni toe' biṉ' ichej gake' beṉ' zak'chi' aga ka Juanna' beena' chchoa beṉ' nisa'. Per nottezə beena' choe' latj iṉabia' Chioza' yic̱hjlall'do'ena', zak'teche' aga ka Juanna'.
’Kon ka wzolo Juanna' bchoe' beṉ' nisa' ax̱t ṉaanlla, zoa beṉ' chsej chllongake' kono wleb yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza'.
Librka' daa bzej dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' na' leya' bzej dii Moiséza' wdix̱jeegakan c̱he yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza', na' ḻekzannan' cho'e Juanna' dill' ṉaa blee.
Na' shi cheenile shajḻe'le dga nia' le', ḻekzen' Elíaza', beena' nagake' yid kwenc̱he c̱hix̱ji'e cho'a xtill' Chioza'.
Ka le' chenile dga nia', ḻi sen wṉeyi.
’¿Bera ka wsaklebid' le' mbanle ṉaa? Le' chonle ka bi'do'ka' lle' gana' chak yaana' na' chosyaagakb' che' ljwellb':
“Bkwellnto' blleja' na' bi byaale, na' beḻnto' daa chon nyesh' na' ni bi wchellkzle.”
Ḻa' Juanna' bi weej wdawe' dii wen dii shao', na' wnagake' c̱he': “Dii x̱iwaan yo'e.”
Na'ch wdena' bid' nad' nak' Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, na' cheej chaw', na' nagake' nak' to beṉ' waox̱at na' to weezo, na' ḻekzka' nagake' non' txen beṉ' wen dii malka' na' beṉ' wic̱hixjka'. Per yeḻ' sin' c̱he Chioza' chli'lawin ka chsa' c̱he beṉ'ka' chzenaggake' c̱he'.
Na'ch wzolo Jesúza' bsheshlene' beṉ' yellka' gana' bli'che' yeḻ' waka', daa bi biyaj bilengakile' xtoḻeeka'. Na' wne':
―¡Nyesh'laz gak c̱hele, le' beṉ' yell Corazín! ¡Nyesh'laz gak c̱hele, le' beṉ' yell Betsaida! Ḻa' sheḻ' beṉ'ka' lle' yell Tírona' na' yell Sidónna' ble'gakile' yeḻ' wakka' ba ble'ile, lii biyaj bilenteljagakile' xtoḻeeka', na' gokwljagake' lech' zeshaa na' bllaagake' dena' yic̱hje'ka' daa ḻe gokyesh'gakile', sheḻ'ka'.
Na' daa bi biyaj bilenile, ba nia' le', llana' wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he ben', dii walch sak'zi'le aga ka beṉ' Tíroka' na' beṉ' Sidónka'.
Na' le' beṉ' Capernaúm, ¿achakile willinle yabana'? Aga willinle na', san latj gana' sak'zi'len yillinle. Ḻa' sheḻ' beṉ' Sodómaka' ble'gakile' yeḻ' wakka' daa ba ble'ile, balja biyaj bilengakile' saaxya c̱he'ka' na' ni ndia yella', sheḻ'ka'.
Daan nia' le', kat' illin lla wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he beṉ', dii walch sak'zi'le aga ka beṉ' Sodómaka'.
Na' lo gora' wṉe Jesúza', chi'e: ―X̱a, li' nako' x̱an yabana' na' yell-lioni, choe'lawaa li' daa bkwashilo' beṉ' sin'ka' diika' ba bliilo' beṉ'ka' bibi chajnii.
Beno' ka', X̱a, ḻa' kan' wyazlalloo.
Na'ch goll Jesúza' beṉ'ka': ―X̱a'na' bene' lall' na' yog'ḻoḻ daa chon'. Na' ni to kono nombia'yeṉ' nad' ḻete X̱a'na', na' ḻekzka' kono nombia'yeṉ' X̱a'na' ḻete nad' nak' Xiiṉe' len beṉ'ka' cheenid' gon' ka gombia'gake'ne'.
Ḻi gonḻilall' nad', yog'le le' ba chjshiaile na' nakle ka beṉ' ntakw nc̱hej to dii zii dii zshab, na' nad' gon' ka yizi'lall'le.
Ḻi gon ka nia', na' ḻi wzenag daa chzajniid' le', ḻa' nad' nak' beṉ' gax̱jlall' na' gon' ka gat' yeḻ' wixi'lall' c̱hele.
Daa nia' le' gonle aga nakan dii bi gak gonle, na' daa chli' chsedid' le' bi nakan dii bi so sakile.
To lla sabd, llana' chombaaṉ beṉ' Israelka', wdelen Jesúza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen to ga naz to beṉ' trígona', na' beṉ'ka' zejlengake'ne' wzolo wdishjgake' trígona' na' wdaogake'n.
Na' ka ble'i fariseoka' daa chon beṉ'ka', na'ch che'gake'ne': ―Bwia ka chon beṉ'ki nakgake' li' txen, chongake' daa bi chiyaḻ' goncho llani chombaaṉcho.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Abiṉ' wlable ka ben dii Davina' len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen ka wdongake'?
Wyo'e ḻoo lill xḻatj Chioza' na' wdoyoe' yetxtilka' daa naki c̱he Chioza' daa toz bx̱ozka' de lsens gaogake'.
¿Abiṉ' wlable leya' gana' nan aga bi xya nakan c̱he bx̱ozka' ḻa'kzi chongake' llinna' ḻoo yoodo'na' llaka' chombaaṉcho?
Na' nia' le', ladjleni zoa to beṉ' zak'che' aga ka yoodo'na'.
Bilja wyajniile bi zeji Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' daa na: “Nad' cheenchid' yiyeshii ljwell-le, aga ka daa witle bayix̱'ka' kwenc̱he we'la'ole nad'.” Ḻa' sheḻ' le' wyajniilen, aga waole xya c̱he beṉ' bi nap doḻ', sheḻ'ka'.
Nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, chṉabi'a lao llani chombaaṉcho.
Na'ch biza' Jesúza' latja', na' biyaje' gana' chdop chllag beṉ' Israelka' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza'.
Na' ladj beṉ'ka' len to beṉ' net tḻaa neena'. Na' fariseoka' chwiagake' naklə ka si' sengake' kwenc̱he gaogake' xya c̱he Jesúza', na'ch wṉabgakile'ne', che'gake': ―¿Beran na leya'? ¿Ade lsens yiyoncho to beṉ' bi shao' llani chombaaṉcho?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Shi nole zoa to xil' c̱hele na' ixopb to ḻoo yech llaki chombaaṉcho, ¿abi yibejleb?
Na' ¡zak'techlə beṉec̱ha' aga ka xilaa! Daan de lsens goncho daa nak wen llaki chombaaṉcho.
Na'ch golle' beena' net tḻaa neena': ―Bḻi noona'. Na' ka bḻi neena' lii biyakten ka nak daa zi shḻaa.
Na' ka biza' fariseoka' gana' chdop chllaggake', be'gake' dill' nak sho' xṉezi witgake' Jesúza'.
Ka gokbe'i Jesúza' daa cheengakile' gongake', na' bizee ziyaje' gan yoblə. Na' beṉ' zan inlleb janoe'ne' na' biyone' yog' beṉ'ka' bi shao'.
Na' golle' beṉ'ka' biyone' bi we'gake' dill' daa chone'.
Daa bene' ka', billinin ka wna dii Isaíaza', beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne', kana' wne':
Beenin nake' wen llin c̱ha', beena' ba wlej', na' ḻe chakidee na' chazlallaa ka chone'. Na' wzoa' Espíritu c̱ha'na' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena', na' c̱hix̱je'ile' beṉ'ka' lle' yell-lioni ka cheenid' gongake'.
Bi gakdiḻ-lene' beṉ', na' ni bi gosyee wi'e dill' yawi nez.
Aga wisyoll wistoe' c̱hishje' yax̱tila' daa ba chashjə. na' aga wisole' mesha' daa ba chiyol, ax̱t ki gone' gan wli'lao yeḻ' ḻi yeḻ' shao' c̱he'na'.
Na' beṉ' lle' doxen yell-lioni gongake' lez ḻen' gaklene' ḻegake'.
Jwa'gake' lao Jesúza' to beṉ' yo'e dii x̱iw' na' bi chle'ile' ni bi chak iṉie'. Na' bibej Jesúza' dii x̱iwaa yo'e, na' bile'ile' na' gokte biṉie'.
Yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' bibangakile' ka nak daa bene', na' chisne': ―¿Aaga beenin xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Davina', beena' chbezcho, lla?
Ka beni fariseoka' dillaa choe' beṉ'ka', na' che'gake': ―Aga bi yeḻ' wak nap beeni. San yeḻ' wak c̱he Bezlona', daa chṉabia' dii x̱iw'ka'zan, chibejile' diika'.
Na' gokbe'i Jesúza' daa chza'lall' fariseoka', na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―Shi gana' chṉabia' to beṉ' na' tiḻgake' to ḻezgake' na' gakgake' c̱hoplə, na' kwiayi' gana' chṉabi'e, na' ka'kzə shi to yell wa beṉ' lle' toz yoo gakgake' c̱hoplə aga wdiagake'.
Ka'kzə Satanáza', shi yibej ljwell dii x̱iwiinka' yoo beṉ', aga wdia yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱heyinna', sheḻ'ka', ḻa' to ḻezgakannan' chidiḻ-len kwingakin.
Le' nale chibej' dii x̱iwaa yoo beṉ' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he Bezlona' daa chṉabia' ḻegakan. ¿Shera beṉ'ka' nakle txen? ¿Aḻekzka' ḻennan' chibejlengake' dii x̱iw'ka' yoo beṉ'? Daa bi nakan ka', na' chli'n nakllejile.
Na' shi nad' chibej' dii x̱iw'ka' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he Espíritu c̱he Chioza' zejin ladjleni ba bla' yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza'.
’Aga no gak sho' lill to beṉ' wal na' kwane' dii de c̱he' shi bi wc̱heje'ne' zigaate. Na'chan gak kwane' lille'na'.
’Beena' bi chone' nad' txen, ḻen' chakzbanile' nad'; na' beena' bi chaklene' nad' kwenc̱he wzenag beṉ' c̱he Chioza', ḻen' chsej chllone' wzenaggake'.
’Na' nia' le', wizi'xen Chioza' yog' saaxya c̱helena' na' yog'te dii mala' daa chbell chṉele, san shi iṉele zban c̱he Espíritu Sántona' na' c̱heyi diika' chone', aga wizi'xen Chioza' c̱hele.
Na' shi no iṉe c̱ha', nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, ḻekzka' wizi'xen Chioza' c̱he', san beena' iṉe c̱he Espíritu Sántona', aga wizi'xene' c̱he' ṉaa zoe' yell-lioni ni kat' illin llana' wc̱hogloe' c̱he beṉ'.
’Ṉezicho yaga' daa nak wen chbian dii wen, na' yaga' daa bi nak wen aga bi dii wen chbian. Kon ka nak yaga', ka'te nak daa chbian.
¡Le' beṉ' wen dii mal! ¿Nakra gonle iṉele daa nak dii wen daa nakle beṉ' mal? Ḻa' yog' dill' daa chchej cho'a ḻoll'chona' za'n ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'chona'.
Beena' nak beṉ' wen cho'e dill' wen, daa yoo dii wenna' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena'; na' beena' nak beṉ' michian bi cho'e dill' yejni'alallii, daa yoo dii michianna' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena'.
Na' nad' nia' le', kat' illin lla yizi' Chioza' kwent c̱he yog' beṉ', kanan' yidele kwent c̱he yog'te dill'ka' konteḻe wṉele.
Ḻa' shi le' choe'le dill' wen, na'ch iṉa Chioza' bibi doḻ' naple; per shi le' bi choe'le dill' wen, na' wc̱hogloe' c̱hele sak'zi'le.
Na'ch baḻ fariseoka' na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' che'gake' Jesúza': ―Maestro, cheeninto' ile'into' gono' to yeḻ' wak kwenc̱he gakbe'into' shi Chiozan' bseḻee li'.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Le' nakle beṉ' mal na' beṉ' bi chzenag c̱he Chioza' chṉable ile'ile' yeḻ' waka' kwenc̱he wli'n shi Chiozan' bseḻee nad', per aga wliid' le' daa cheenile. Ḻete ile'ile to dii nak ka yeḻ' wak daa ben Chioza' c̱he dii Jonáza'.
Ḻa' Jonáza' wyo'e shoṉə lla shoṉə yel ḻoo ḻee beḻ xenna', na' ka'kzə nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, shoṉ lla shoṉ yel igaaṉa' ḻoo bana'.
Kat' illin lla wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni, kanan' dii beṉ' Níniveka' gaogake' xya c̱hele, le' zoale ṉaa, ḻa' ḻegake' biyaj bileni saaxya c̱he'ka' kana' wdix̱je'i dii Jonáza' ḻegake' cho'a xtill' Chioza'. Na' nad', zak'techid' aga ka dii Jonáza' na' bi chzenagle c̱ha'.
Na' ḻekzka' llana' kat' wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni, noola' wṉabia' yellka' lle' do lli'lə gawe' xya c̱hele, le' zoale ṉaa, ḻa' ḻen' wzee zit' nlleb bidzenague' dill' sin' daa wṉe dii Salomónna'. Na' nad', zak'techid' aga ka dii Salomónna' na' bi chzenagle c̱ha'.
’Kat' chichej dii x̱iwaa yoo beṉ', na' chdan gana' bibi chashj chḻeb chyiljan gana' yizi'lalliin. Na' kat' bi chllelin gana' yizi'lalliin,
na'ch chakin: “Yiyaach' dii yoblə gana' bichejkz'.” Na' kat' yillinan gana' bichejan, nakan ka to yoo desh dii nxi nḻoa.
Na'ch lljaxi'n zi gall dii x̱iw'ka' nakch dii malch aga ka ḻen, na' sho'gakan beena'. Na' gaktech mal c̱he beena' aga ka gok c̱he' dii nech. Ka'kzan gak c̱he beṉ' malka' lle' ṉaa.
Ni choe'lente Jesúza' beṉ'ka' dillaa ka bllin xṉeena' len beṉ' bisheeka' goklall'gake' wshaljlengake'ne' na' wzegake' lesh' chyoona'.
Na' goll to beṉ' Jesúza': ―Xṉoona' len beṉ' bishooka' zegake' lesh' chyoona' cheengakile' wshaljlengake' li'.
Na' che' Jesúza' beena' golle'ne' ka': ―¿Noran xṉa'na' na' noran beṉ' bishaaka'?
Na'ch bli'e beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen na' chi'e: ―Beṉ'kin xṉa'na' na' beṉ' bishaaka'.
Ḻa' nottezə beena' chon ka cheeni X̱a'na' zoa yabana', beenan' nake' beṉ' bishaa, beṉ' zan' na' xṉa'.
Na' lo llana'tezə wza' Jesúza' yoona' gana' zoe' na' jc̱hi'e cho'a nisdo'na'.
Na' daa bdop beṉ' zan gana' chi'e, na' wyepe' jshie' to ḻoo barkw. Na' yog' beṉ'ka' bdop bllag wzegake' cho'a nisdo'na'zə.
Na'ch bseesee zan jemplka' kwenc̱he bli' bsedile' ḻegake', chi'e: ―To beṉ' goz gooṉ wzee zeje' goza'.
Na' ka zej chzaḻee biṉna', bxop baḻan cho'a neza' na' bllin byiṉka' wdaogakban.
Na' zi baḻan bxop ladj yajka' gana' bitek chi' yona', na' ḻobe' bilaan daa bi wyazan zitj.
Na' ka wṉa'n wbilla', bkwedan na' wbillten daa bitek bde loinna'.
Na' zi baḻan bxop ladj yag yesh'ka', na' bgol yag yesh'ka' na' bi be'gakan latj igolgakan.
Na' zi baḻan bxop lo yo wenna', na' wlliachgan. Baḻan wllia to guiyoa, na' zi baḻan wllia guiyon na' zi baḻan wllia shichoa.
Ka le' chenile dga nia', ḻi sen wṉeyi.
Na' beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen jabig'gake' kwite'na', wṉabgakile'ne': ―¿Bic̱he chseesoo jemplka' kat' chli' chsedilo' beṉ'?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Chioza' cho'e latj iṉezile ka nak yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he'na' daa kono ṉezi. Na' beṉ'ka' bi nak nad' txen, bi cho'e latj iṉezgakile'n.
Ḻa' beena' ze wṉeyi shajniile' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza', zizikli shajni'chile'n. Na' beena' bi se wṉeyi shajniile'n, na' gaḻ-lallee daa ba wyajniile' lat'.
Daan chseesaa jemplka' kat' chzajniid' ḻegake'. Ḻa' beṉ'ka' chwiategake' na' bi chakbe'gakile' bin zeji daa chon', na' chengakile' daa chṉia' na' bi chajni'gakile' bin zejin, daa bi chajḻe'gake' c̱ha'.
Na' daa chongake' ka', chillinin ka wna dii Isaíaza' ka wdix̱ji'e daa goll Chioza'ne', daa na: Ḻa'kzi yengakile', aga wyajni'gakile' bi zeji daa yengakile'. Na' ḻa'kzi ile'gakile', aga wakbe'gakile' bi zeji daa ile'gakile'.
