Na' beena' bid yell-lioni, ḻekzen' biyepe' yabana' gana' zoe' chṉabi'e lao yog'ḻoḻte dii de.
Na' ḻen' bzoe' beṉ' nak postl c̱he', na' beṉ' chyix̱jee daa chi'ene', na' beṉ' chyix̱jee dill' wen dill' kob c̱he'na', na' beṉ' chap chwie' beṉ'ka' ba nonḻilall' ḻe', na' beṉ' chli' chsedi cho'a xtilleena',
kwenc̱he beṉ'ka' nak lall' nee gak gongake' xshine'na', na' yiyoll yido gakcha yog' beṉ'ka' nak Crístona' txen,
ax̱t ki yog'cho gakcho toz gonḻilall'cho Xiiṉ Chioza' na' gombia'chchone'. Na' gakyeṉ'cho ka chiyaḻ' gakcho, na' yiyoll yido gakcho dowalj beṉ' wen doxen ka nak Crístona'.
Na' bich gakzcho ka bi'do' na' shajḻe'tezcho bittezə daa chyiljlall' beṉ', na' ni bi gak gon beṉ' wxiye'ka' gan siye'gake' cho' kwenc̱he shajḻe'cho daa bi nak dii ḻi.
San shajlencho dill' ḻi c̱he Chioza' na' gapcho yeḻ' chaki c̱he'na', na' ka' zej gakchcho beṉ' wen ka nak Crístona', beena' chṉabi'e cho', ka chon yic̱hjchoni chṉabia'n kwerp c̱hechoni.
Ka nak kwerp c̱hechoni, tkwen tkwen wejan nox̱' ljwellin na' chaklen ljwellin bittezə llin gonan. Ka'kzan cho' nakcho Crístona' txen nakcho ka toz kwerp kwenc̱he to tocho goncho daa noṉe' cho', na' yog'cho zejch chakchacho na' zejch chakchi ljwellcho.
Nia' le' dga kon yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he X̱ancho Crístona': bich soale gonle ka chon beṉ'ka' bi chonḻilall'gake' Chioza', beṉ'ka' kon chyiljlall'gake' daa bibi zakii,
na' nc̱hoḻ nṉiti yic̱hjlall'do'eka' na' bi ntegakile', na' bi napgake' yeḻ' mban daa noṉ Chioza' cho', ni bi nombia'gake' daa nak c̱he Chioza', daa nakgake' beṉ' lall'do' wal.
Bichkzə bi yeḻ' zto' nombia'gake', na' biga chjshyagakile' chongake' yog' diika' nak zban.
San le', ṉezile aga kan' cheeni Crístona' goncho,
shi dii ḻikzə ba benile xtill' Jesúza' na' ba nzedile soale gonle ka cheenile' kon ka nak dii ḻi c̱he'na'.
Na' chiyaḻ' wsanle bich gonle dii malka' benle, na' kwej yic̱hjle yeḻ' mban gol c̱helena', ḻa' daa wxiye' beli chenna' len', bx̱iṉj bḻenan le'.
Chiyaḻ' yikob yic̱hjlall'do'leka' na' bich bi dii mal sa'lall'le.
Na' chiyaḻ' yikob yeḻ' mban c̱helena' kwenc̱he yiyakle dowalj beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' ḻega beṉ' nak xiiṉ Chios.
Daan, bich chiyaḻ' siye'le, san to tole chiyaḻ' we'len ljwell-le dill' ḻi, ḻa' yog'cho ba nakcho toz, ka kwerp c̱hechona' nakan toz, ḻa'kzi zan diika' ndiḻ nllagan.
Kat' illaale, bi wx̱iṉj wḻenle ni bi koolall'zle,
kwenc̱he bi we'le latj c̱he dii x̱iwaa.
Na' beena' chzi' chban, bich gone' ka', san wc̱hine' ṉi'a neena' gone' llin kwenc̱he gape' dii wi'e beṉ'ka' bibi de c̱heyin.
Na' bi chiyaḻ' we'le dill' zban, san chiyaḻ' we'le dill' wen dill' shao' dii gonan ka soatip soashoshch beṉ'ka' chzenag bin nale na' gaklenan ḻegake'.
Na' bi gonle ka soayesh' Espíritu Santo c̱he Chioza', beena' ba nzoe' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'chona' kwenc̱he chakbe'icho ba nakcho lall' na' Chioza' shlak illin lla yikee cho', cho' ba biya'o bizi'e.
Chiyaḻ' kwej yic̱hjle yog'ḻoḻ dii malki: bich koolall'le, bich illaa ilokle, bi koole beṉ' beḻ ban, bibi gon iṉale c̱he beṉ' na' ni sto dii malka' bich gonle.
Ḻi gak beṉ' wen beṉ' shao' na' beṉ' chiyesh'lalli bish' ljwellin. Chiyaḻ' yizi'xen c̱he ljwell-le, ka ben Chioza' bizi'xene' c̱hele daa nonḻilall'le Crístona'.
Daa ba nakle xiiṉ Chios na' chakile' le', ḻi wsed gonle wen ka chone'.
Chiyaḻ' soale gakile beṉ', ka chaki Crístona' cho'. Daa chakile' cho', bzani kwine' wite' ni c̱hecho, na' bibayi Chioza' daa bene' ka', ka bibaile' shii xḻa' bayix̱'do'ka' bzeygake' lawe'na' kana'.
Bi chiyaḻ' selall'le iṉelen ljwell-le wa gonle bichlə dii zban, ni bi selall'le gat' kwe'ile dii xen wal. Ni to diiki bi chiyaḻ' gak ladjlena' daa ba nakle lall' na' Chioza'.
Bi we'le dill' zban, ni dill' dii bi zakii ni dill' dii bi yejni'alallii, ḻa' aga dill' ka diikin chiyaḻ' we'le, san chiyaḻ' we'le Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken.
Ḻa' ba ṉezkzile ni to beṉ' chṉelen ljwellin, wa beṉ' chon bichlə dii zban, wa beṉ' chzelall' gat' kwe'ile' dii xen, bi yilline' yabana' gana' chṉabia' Crístona' len Chioza'. Beena' chzelallii gat' kwe'ile' dii xen, toz ka chone' ka beena' choe'la'o daa nak yaj yag.
Bi we'le latj no siye' le' we'lenze' le' dill' dii bi zakii, ḻa' beṉ'ka' chon chiya dii malki, ile'gakile' yeḻ' zak'zi' xen c̱he Chioza' daa bi chzenaggake' c̱he'.
Daan, bi chiyaḻ' ḻenle beṉ'ka' chon ka'.
Kanan', nc̱hoḻ nniti yic̱hjlall'do'lena', san ṉaa daa ba nakle X̱ancho Jesucrístona' txen, ba yoo beeni' c̱he'na' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena', na' chiyaḻ' soale gonle ḻega beṉ' ba yoo beeni' c̱he'na'.
Ḻa' beeni' c̱he'na' chaklenan cho' gakcho beṉ' wen, na' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao', na' beṉ' choe' dill' ḻi.
Ḻi se wṉeyi kwenc̱he iṉezile bi daa chazlalli X̱anchona' gonle.
Bi gonle txen diika' chon beṉ'ka' nc̱hoḻ nniti yic̱hjlall'do'eka', ḻa' bibi zakii daa chongake', san ḻi gon ka yiyakbe'gakile' bi chongake' wen.
Ḻa' ax̱t chiyii chido'icho we'cho dill' c̱heyi diika' chongake' do ngash'zə.
Per yog'ḻoḻ diika' choncho, chli'laogakin lo beeni' c̱he Chioza' nak nakgakan.
Ḻa' beeni' c̱he'na' chili'n lao yog'te diika' choncho. Daakzan ne': Ḻi yiban, le' nakle ka beṉ' ches; na' ḻi yiyas ladj beṉ' wetka'. Na' Crístona' kwee beeni' c̱he'na' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'.
Na' ḻi se wṉeyi wsa' c̱hele wen, na' bi gonzle ka beṉ' bi nteyi, san ḻi gakto ka beṉ' sin'.
Ḻi gon ka dii le gonle dii wenna' kat' de xḻatjin, ḻa' llaki zoacho ḻe ba chi'chga dii mala'.
Daan, bi chiyaḻ' gonle ka beṉ' bi nteyi, san chiyaḻ' shajniile daa cheeni X̱ancho Jesucrístona' goncho.
Bi soll ṉitile, ḻa' beena' chzoll chniti chone' chiya dii bi yejni'alallii. San ḻi we' latj soa Espíritu Sántona' iṉabi'e ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'.
Chiyaḻ' we'len ljwell-le dill' c̱he sálmoka', na' goḻ-le dii koon X̱anchona' balaaṉ na' bichlə dii iṉa Espíritu c̱he Chioza' goḻ-le. Na' ḻi goḻ iṉe we'la'ole X̱ancho Crístona' do yic̱hj do lall'le.
Na' daa nakcho X̱ancho Jesucrístona' txen, toshiizi chiyaḻ' we'le X̱acho Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken daa chaklene' cho' lao yog'ḻoḻte.
Chiyaḻ' wzex̱j yic̱hjle wzenag c̱he ljwell-le, daa chaple Crístona' balaaṉ.
Na' ka le' noolə zoa beṉ' c̱hele, chiyaḻ' wzex̱j yic̱hjle wzenagle c̱hegake', ka chonle chzenagle c̱he X̱ancho Crístona'.
Ḻa' beṉ' byonan' chṉabi'e nool c̱he'na', ka chon Crístona' chṉabi'e cho' nonḻilall'chone', cho' ba bisle' kwenc̱he bi kwiayi'cho. Chṉabi'e cho', cho' zaklebicho kwerp c̱he'na', ka chon yic̱hjchoni chṉabi'an kwerp c̱hechoni.
Na' ka cho' nonḻilall'cho Crístona' na' chzex̱j yic̱hjcho lawe'na', ka'kzan chiyaḻ' gon noolka' wzex̱j yic̱hje'ka' lao yog'ḻoḻ daa iṉa beṉ' c̱he'ka'.
Na' ka le' beṉ' byo zoa nool c̱hele, ḻi gaki nool c̱heleka', ka chon Crístona' chakile' cho' nonḻilall'chone' na' bzani kwine' wite' ni c̱hecho
kwenc̱he biyakcho beṉ' nxi nyech lawe'na'. Bix̱is biyibe' yic̱hjlall'do'chona' ka wyajḻe'cho xtilleena'
kwenc̱he yibaile' cho' nakcho lall' nee kat' yillincho lawe'na' na' bibi nda' nchen yic̱hjlall'do'chona', san gakcho beṉ' nxi nyech, beṉ' bibi xtoḻiin de.
Na' ka'kzə le' beṉ' byo, le' zoa nool c̱hele, chiyaḻ' gapshiile nool c̱heleka' ka chapshii kwinle. Beena' chakile' nool c̱he'na', kwinkzen' chakile'.
Biga zoa beṉ' chwiile' kwerp c̱he'na', san chweej chwawe'n na' chapshi'en, ka chon Crístona' chapshi'e cho' nakchone' txen,
ḻa' to tocho nakcho ka tkwen wej kwerp c̱he'na'.
“Daan, wḻaa beṉ' byona' x̱axṉeena' kat' ikaa c̱he', na' soalene' xoole'na' gakgake' toz.”
Dill'ki ba wnia' chzajniin le' to dii zak'chgayi daa biṉ' iṉezile', ḻa' chzajniin cho' ka chon Crístona' daa chakile' cho' ba nakchone' toz.
Na' ka le' beṉ' byo, to tole chiyaḻ' gakile' nool c̱heleka' ka chaki kwinle. Na' le' noolə, chiyaḻ' gaple balaaṉ beṉ' c̱heleka'.
Na' le' bi'do', ḻi wzenag c̱he x̱axṉa'leka' ḻega bi' chzenag c̱he X̱ancho Crístona', ḻa' kan' chiyaḻ' gonle.
Dga bllia Chioza' bia' goncho gokan dii nech daa nsa' to dii bc̱hebe' gone' c̱hecho shi goncho ka ne', na' nan: “Ḻi gap balaaṉ x̱axṉa'leka',
kwenc̱he gak wen c̱hele na' ibanle ssha lo yell-lioni.”
Na' le' zoa xiiṉle, bi gonle ka gakshejlall'b', san ḻi yisgolgakb' xochi na' ḻi wzajni'gakib' kwenc̱he wzenaggakb' c̱he X̱ancho Crístona'.
Na' le' ndoo lla yel-le chonle xshin beṉ', ḻi gon daa na beṉ'ka' nak x̱anle yell-lioni. Ḻi gapgake' balaaṉ, ḻi illebgake' na' ḻi gon xshine'ka' do yic̱hj do lall'le. Ḻi gaktezi c̱he Crístona'kzan chzenagle.
Aga kat' chwiazə x̱anlena' yilaḻ yizodile' kwenc̱he ile'shi'gakile' le', san ḻi gonan do yic̱hj do lall'le ḻega beṉ' nak wen llin c̱he Crístona', ḻa' kan' cheeni Chioza' goncho.
Chiyaḻ' gonle llinna' do yic̱hj do lall'le, na' ḻi gaktezi xshin Crístonan' chonle, aga c̱he beṉ' yell-lion.
Ḻa' ṉezkzile nottezə nakcho, ḻaa beṉ' ndoo lla yele' chone' xshin beṉ' wa beṉ' chon xshinkze', X̱anchona' gone' ka yizi'cho banez c̱he dii wenna' ba bencho.
Na' le' nzi'le beṉ'ka' chon xshinlena', ḻekzka' ḻi gonigake' wen. Bi wwall wsheble ḻegake', ḻa' ṉezkzile, ka le' na' ka ḻegake', yabana' zoa to beṉ' nak X̱anle, na' ḻe' aga nakzi beṉ' chakile'.
Na' ḻekzka' nia' le' beṉ' bish'dawaa na' le' beṉ' zandawaa, ḻi gak wal kon yeḻ' wak choo yeḻ' wak xen c̱he X̱anchona'.
Ḻi wc̱hin yog' diika' noṉ Chioza' gaklenan cho' kwenc̱he gakchale na' so sakile gonle gan dii x̱iwaa kat' za'lenan yeḻ' wxiye' c̱heyinna'.
Ḻa' aga beṉ' de beli chenzan chdiḻ-lencho, san chdiḻ-lencho dii x̱iw'ka' bi chle'icho, diika' ze lo llazə na' napgakan yeḻ' wak na' yeḻ' wṉabia', diika' chṉabia' lo yell-lioni gani dechga dii mala'.
Na' daan, ḻi goni c̱hele yog' daa noṉ Chioza' gaklenan le' kwenc̱he so sakile dii mala' lla'na' wtiḻ-len, na' ka yiyoll wtiḻ-len ni zec̱hec̱hkzle.
Ḻi soac̱hec̱h na' ḻi we' daa nak dill' ḻi, ḻa' ḻennan' gaklenan le' gonan ka bachḻeena' daa chc̱heḻ ḻeelena'. Na' ḻi soa ḻi gon daa nak dii ḻicha, ḻa' ḻennan' gaklenan le' gonan ka daa chbin soldadka' chkweejan lc̱ho'eka'.
Na' ḻi se kwas we'lenle beṉ' xtill' Crístona' daa wzoan ḻegake' mbalaz, ka chon to soldad ze' kwase' nḻej xele'na' kwenc̱he shaje' lo wdiḻa'.
Na' daa llialote lawi diiki, ḻi soac̱hec̱h gonḻilall'le Chioza' kwenc̱he gaklenan le' na' wsol wṉitan yog'ḻoḻ de wxiye' c̱he dii x̱iwaa, na' gonan llin ka daa nox̱' soldada' chkweejan ḻe' kwenc̱he bi chcheḻe' daa chzaḻ' beena' chdiḻ-lene'.
Na' ḻi wzoa yic̱hjle daa bisla Chioza' le' lao dii mala', na' gonan llin ka lap' ya c̱he soldadka' daa chkweej yic̱hje'ka'. Na' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gakan ka to yesya daa choṉ Espíritu Sántona' le' kwenc̱he tiḻ-lenle dii mala'.
Toshiizi ḻi we'ḻwill Chioza', na' iṉabilene' kon ka chzajnii Espíritu c̱he'na' le'. Na' toshiizi ḻi se wṉeyi, na' bi lljx̱akile iṉabilene' c̱he yog' beṉ'ka' ba nak lall' nee.
Na' ḻekzka' ḻi iṉabi Chioza' kwenc̱he wx̱oe' cho'a ḻollaani dill'ka' we'len' beṉ', na' bi illeb' wzajniid' beṉ' ka nak dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' daa kono wyajnii kani'yi.
Ḻa' Chioza' nseḻee nad' lo laze' kwenc̱he we'len' beṉ' cho'a xtilleena', na' ni c̱heyinnan' dia' lillyani. Ḻi iṉabi Chioza' gaklene' nad' kwenc̱he bi gall illeb' wi'a cho'a xtilleena'.
Tíquiconi, beṉ' bish'choni ḻe chakid', nake' to beṉ' toshiizi chaklene' lo xshin Chioza', na' yidzajniile' le' yog'ḻoḻ ka chak c̱ha' na' daa chon'.
Chseḻaane' yide' laolena' kwenc̱he iṉezile ka chak c̱hento', na' kwenc̱he wtipe' lall'le.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', chṉabid' X̱acho Chioza' na' X̱ancho Jesucrístona' gongake' ka soale mbalaz, na' gonḻilall'chle ḻegake', na' gaki ljwell-le.
Chioza' gaklenshgue' yog'ḻoḻ-le, le' zoale chakchgaile' X̱ancho Jesucrístona'. Kan' gakan.
Nad' Pablo na'ch Timotewi naknto' wen llin c̱he Jesucrístona', chwapnto' chiox yog'le, le' lle'le yell Filípoza', le' nakle lall' na' Chioza' daa nonḻilall'le Cristo Jesúza'. Na' ḻekzka' chwapnto' chiox beṉ'ka' chgoo xṉezi xshin Chioza' ladjlena' na' beṉ'ka' chaklen ḻegake'.
Chios, beena' nak X̱acho len X̱ancho Jesucrístona' gaklenshgagake' le' na' wzoagake' le' mbalaz.
Ka ka chjadinid' le' cho'a Chios c̱ha'na' yeḻ' chox̱ken.
Na' toshiizi choe'ḻwillee kon yeḻ' xaba kat' chṉabidee gaklene' yog'le,
daa lenle chonle nad' txen, dezd ka wyajḻe'le ax̱t ṉaa, kwenc̱he ides dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Jesucrístona'.
Ṉezyeṉ'id' Chios, beena' wzolo chone' to dii wen ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena', gone' kwenc̱he yiyoll yido yiyakle ka chazlallee kat' illin lla yila' Jesucrístona'.
Na' chiyaḻ'kz yibaid' ka chjadinid' le', ḻa' toshiizi yoole ḻoo yic̱hjlall'dawaani. Na' ḻa'kzi dia' lillyani wa choe'len' beṉ' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Jesucrístona' kwenc̱he gakbe'gakile' nakan dill' ḻi na' shajḻe'gake' c̱heyin, ṉezid' toshiizi chaklenle nad' lo llinna' daa ben Chioza' lall' na' gon' yeḻ' beṉ' wen c̱he'na'.
Chioza' ṉez nḻe'ile' ka chakid' yog'le kon ka chaki Cristo Jesúza' le'.
Kat' choe'ḻwill' Chioza', chṉabidee zizikli yisgolche' yeḻ' chaki c̱helena', na' goṉche' le' yeḻ' sin'na' len yeḻ' chajniina'
kwenc̱he gakbe'ile daa nakch wen na' ka' soale do yic̱hj do lall'le na' bibi doḻ' gaple kat' yiyed Crístona'.
Na' Jesucrístona' gaklene' le' gonle ḻega beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' kwenc̱he sho' Chioza' balaaṉ na' we'la'o beṉ' ḻe'.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', cheenid' iṉezile diiki ba gok c̱ha' goklenlan kwenc̱he bdesch dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Jesucrístona', na' bi bizogakin wsej wllongakan.
Ḻa' ṉaa yog'ḻoḻ soldadka' lle' ni na' nochlə beṉ' yoblə lle' do ni ṉezgakile' dia' lillyani daa chonḻilallaa Crístona'.
Na' daa dia' lillyani, zan beṉ' bish'choka' ba wloolall'gake' chongake' lall'chog choe'gake' xtill' Chioza' na' bi chllebgake'.
Dii ḻi baḻgake' choe'gake' xtill' Crístona' daa chakxe'zgakile' nad' na' daa cheenzgakile' gonchgake' ka nad'. Per zoakz beṉ' chone'n do yic̱hj do lallee.
Beṉ'kin chongake'n daa chakgakile' nad' na' daa ṉezgakile' Chioza' ba nzoe' nad' kwenc̱he wi'a dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Jesucrístona'.
Na' beṉ'ka' zi shkwen choe'gake' xtill' Crístona' daa cheenzgakile' gonchgake' ka nad', na' aga chongake'n do lall'gake'. Na' chakzgakile' daa chongake' ka' gakyeshid' daa nej' lillyani.
Per aga bi chon daa c̱ha' shi do lall'gaken' chongake'n wa aga do lall'gaken'; kon daa choe'lgake' xtill' Crístona', daalan chibaid'. Na' zizikli yibachid'
daa ṉezid' wichej' wen lao yog' diiki chak c̱ha' daa chṉable c̱ha' lao Chioza' na' daa chaklen Espíritu c̱he Jesucrístona' nad'.
Na' toshiizi non' lez Chioza' gaklene' nad' kwenc̱he bi sia' yeḻ' zto', san ṉaa na' toshiizi gon' kwenc̱he sho' Crístona' balaaṉ, ḻaa ibanch' wa ḻaa guet'.
Ḻa' shi ibanch', gonchkz' daa cheeni Crístona'; na' shi guet', de to banez c̱ha'.
Shi dech yeḻ' mban c̱ha', gonchkz' xshin Crístona' kwenc̱he beṉ' zanch gombia'gake'ne'. Na' bi ṉezid' non nakch wen.
Chonan lallj iṉia' non nakch wen: to cheenid' guet' kwenc̱he lljazoalen' Crístona', na' naktechlan wen.
Per chonchan byen ibanch' ni c̱hele.
Chakid' nakchan wen ibanch' kwenc̱he gaklench' le' gakchachle gonḻilall'le Crístona' na' yiba yizakchile daa nonḻilall'lene'.
Na' kat' ile'ile nad' ladjlena' sto shii, ḻe yiba yizakile we'la'ole Cristo Jesúza'.
Naktez gak, ḻi se wṉeyi wsa'to c̱hele wen ḻega beṉ' chajḻe' c̱he dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' kwenc̱he ḻaa yidwia' le' wa ḻaa yenzid' xtill'le, iṉezid' ni zoac̱hec̱hle nx̱enilall'le Crístona' na' nakle toz chonle ga zeelo chakle kwenc̱he shajḻe' beṉ' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he'na',
na' bi gall illebzle beṉ'ka' chakzi' chakzbani le'. Na' daa gonle ka', wli'n kwiayi'chokzgaken', na' le' yilale, ḻa' Chioza' bi wi'e latj kwiayi'le.
Ḻa' Chioza' goklene' le' kwenc̱he beṉlilall'le Crístona', na' ḻekzka' chaklene' le' lo yeḻ' zak'zi'ka' chen chle'ile daa nonḻilall'lene'.
Ba chsak'zi'gake' le' ka ble'ile bsak'zi'gake' nad' daa chyix̱ji'a xtill' Crístona', na' ṉezkzile ka'kzə ni chak c̱ha'.
Daa nakle Crístona' toz, yeḻ' goklen c̱he'na' chtipan lall'le, na' yeḻ' chaki c̱he'na' chonan ka soale mbalaz, na' Espíritu c̱he'na' zoalenkze' le', na' lall'do'lena' nakan lall'do' yesh'.
Daan, ḻi gak toz, ḻi gaki ljwell-le ganga, na' toz ka dii sele wṉeyi, na' toz ka dii selall'le, kwenc̱he yiba yizakchid' ni c̱hele.
Bibi sele wṉeyi c̱he tozle wa kwenc̱he gon kwinle beṉ' choo beṉ' xen, san ḻi gonan kon yeḻ' gax̱jlall', ḻi goni beṉ' ka beṉ' zak'chi ka le'.
Ni tole bi chiyaḻ' c̱hiljzle dii nak to banez c̱hezle, san ḻekzka' ḻi gon ka si' beṉ' yoblə banez.
Ḻi se wṉeyi gonle ka ben Crístona'.
Ḻa'kzi nake' Chios, bzanile' yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he'na' na' balaaṉ c̱he'na' daa naplene' X̱e' Chioza',
na' bzoe' ka'lə daa naki c̱he', na' ben kwine' ka to beṉ' bi zakii, na' golje' goke' to beṉ' de beli chen.
Na' ka ba nake' beṉ' yell-lio, bḻex̱j yic̱hje' bene' kon ka wna Chioza' ax̱t bi'e latj betgake'ne' ḻee yag cruza'.
Daan, Chioza' wlo'ene' to balaaṉ xen inlleb daa ḻiizelozi zak'chi, na' bzoe'ne' nake' x̱an yog'ḻoḻte dii de,
kwenc̱he yog' beṉ' lle' yabana', na' lo yell-lioni, na' xan yell-lioni kat' yengakile' le Jesúza' wc̱hek' xibe'ka' lawe'na'.
Na' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' we'gake' dill' nan Jesucrístona' nake' X̱ancho na' daa gongake' ka' sho' X̱acho Chioza' balaaṉ.
Daan, le' beṉ' bish'dawaa na' le' beṉ' zandawaa, kon ka ba benkzle toshiizi bzoale dill' kana' wzoalen' le', ḻi we'ḻ-lall'ch gakchle beṉ' wizoa dill' ṉaa bich zoa' ladjlena'. Ḻi gall illeb Chioza', beena' bisla le', na' ḻi gon ka dii le gonle daa cheenile'.
Ḻa' Chioza'kzan chone' kwenc̱he chalj ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena' gonle dii wenna' daa chaklallee gonle, na' ḻekzka' chaklene' le' kwenc̱he chonlen.
Na' yog'ḻoḻ daa gonle, ḻi gonan do yic̱hj do lall'le, na' bi gaklleshile ni bi gakguedzle,
kwenc̱he beṉ' malka' lle' yell-lioni, beṉ'ka' nxiṉj yic̱hjlall'do'eka', gakbe'gakile' bibi dii mal chonle, na' kono bi gak iṉa c̱hele. Na' gaktole beṉ' bibi doḻ' c̱heyin de, ḻega beṉ' nak dowalj xiiṉ Chios. Na' gakle to beeni' lawe'ka', ka beljdo'ka' chey cheeni',
daa chzoac̱hec̱hle chzenagle c̱he cho'a xtill' Chioza' daa nsa' yeḻ' mban. Na' shi ka' gonle, kat'ka' yila' Crístona' de dii gonan ka yibaid' daa bi bendadz' xshin Chioza' ladjlena'.
Daa chzani kwinle sak'zi'le kwenc̱he gonle daa cheeni Chioza' ṉaa nonḻilall'le Crístona', zaklebin daa chzani beṉ' choe' Chioza' kwenc̱he choe'laweene'. Na' daa chzanid' kwin' witgake' nad' daa chon' xshin Crístona', zaklebin ka daa chlaljgake' lao daa chzani beṉ' choe' Chioza'. Na' ḻa'kzi ax̱t witgake' nad', chiba chizakid' na' cheenid' yiba yizaklenile nad'.
Ḻi yiba yizakleni nad', na' ḻi soa mbalaz ka zoa'.
Non' lez X̱ancho Jesúza' wi'e latj yobzə wseḻaa Timotewa' gana' zoale, kwenc̱he yibaid' ka yiyede' iṉe' chak wen c̱hele.
Kochno zoa sto c̱ha' ka ḻe', ḻa' tochga ḻen' zelene' nad' wṉeyi do yic̱hj do lallee gak wen c̱hele.
Ḻa' beṉ'ki sto zoalen nad', c̱he kwinzgake' zegake' wṉeyi na' bi zegake' wṉeyi daa cheeni Jesucrístona'.
Per ba ṉezkzile ka wen nsa' c̱he Timotewa' na' ka ba goklene' nad' ba be'nto' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona'. Ba goklene' nad' ka beṉ' chaklen x̱ayin.
Daan, kat' ba ṉezid' nakan gak c̱ha', lii wseḻ'tia'ne' gana' zoale.
Na' nx̱enlallaa X̱anchona' ḻekzka' yob yidwia' le' kwinkz'.
Na' ṉaa chakid' chonan byen yiseḻaa beṉ' bish'cho Epafrodítoni, beeni nonlene' nad' txen chdiḻ-lennto' dii mala' daa chonnto' xshin Chioza', beeni bseḻ'le kwenc̱he gaklene' nad' lao dii chyallj chc̱hinid'.
Cheenchgaile' ile'ile' le', na' ḻe chakyeshile' daa wṉezile we'ile'.
Na' dii ḻicha zi lat'zə ki wite', per Chioza' biyesh'lallile'ne' biyakile'. Na' aga tozen' biyesh'lallile', san lenan' kwenc̱he bi gakyesh'chid'.
Daan chiseḻaane' laolena' dopiyenzə kwenc̱he yibaile' daa yile'ilene' sto shii, na' nad' bich gakyesh'tekid' c̱hele.
Ḻi yilebgache' kon yeḻ' chiba chizaki daa nake' cho' txen nonḻilall'cho X̱anchona'. Na' ḻi gap balaaṉ yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' chon ka chone'.
Ḻa' zi lat'zə ki wite' daa chone' xshin Crístona'. Bzoe' dii nxoll yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' goktgui bidyaklene' nad' bidyene' diika' bi gok gonle.
Na' ṉaa, le' beṉ' bish'dawaa na' le' beṉ' zandawaa, ḻi yiba yizaki daa ba nonḻilall'le X̱anchona'. Nad' bi chak zedid' wzej' le' dii yoblə diika' ba wniakz' le' daa ṉezid' waklenan le'.
Ḻi wsak' bi wzenagle c̱he beṉ' malka', beṉ'ka' nazə chonan byen wc̱hogtekzə kwerp c̱hechona' sho'cho seṉ daa le circuncisión.
Ḻa' cho'yeṉ'lan nakcho dowalj beṉ'ka' yoo seṉ, cho' choe'la'ocho Chioza' daa yoo Espíritu c̱he'na' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'chona' na' chiba chizakicho daa nakcho Cristo Jesúza' txen. Na' bi noncho lez daa goni kwerp c̱hechoni gaklenan gakcho beṉ' wen lao Chioza'.
Nia' ka' ḻa'kzi de dii zan dii gak wx̱enilallaa c̱he kwin' daa gonan ka ile'shii Chioza' nad'. Shi no chakzi de dii gak wx̱enilallee c̱he kwine' daa gonan ka ile'shii Chioza'ne', ¿alechlin nad'?
Ka gokid' x̱on' lla, wloogake' kwerp c̱ha'ni seṉ daa le circuncisión. Nak' beṉ' Israel, na' golj' lo dia c̱he dii Benjamínna', na' nak' dowalj beṉ' hebreo ka x̱axṉa'ka', na' bsedyeṉaa ley c̱hento'na' na' bzenag' c̱heyin, na' benlen' fariseoka' txen.
Daa ḻe wzechga' wṉeyi ley c̱he Chioza', ax̱t gokid' chon' ka cheeni Chioza' daa bc̱hi' bsakaa beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'gake' Jesúza'. Na' ben' kon ka na leya', na' aga no gok iṉa bi ben' ka nan.
Kana'n gokid' ḻe zak'chgayi yog' diika', per ṉaa, daa ba nonḻilallaa Crístona', chakbe'id' bibi zak'gakan.
Na' dii ḻi ṉezid' bibi de dii zak'chi ka daa ba nombia' Cristo Jesúza', beena' nak X̱an'. Na' daa ḻe chakidee, bich nx̱enilallaa yog' diika' gokid' ḻe zak'chga, san ba nongaka'n ka beb kwenc̱he gombia'ch' Crístona'
na' gakee txen. Aga daa chon' daa na leyan' nak' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' lao Chioza', san daa nonḻilallaa Crístonan', ḻa' beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'gake' Crístona', Chioza' chiyone' ḻegake' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao'.
Cheenid' gombia' Crístona' na' yeḻ' wak c̱he'na' ka daa bli'e kana' bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka', na' cheenid' izanid' kwin' gak c̱ha' ka gok c̱he' daa wdie' yeḻ' zak'zi'ka' na' wite'.
Na' ka', non' lez idoḻaa yisban Chioza' nad' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Bi nia' ba nombi'ane' kwasḻoḻ wa ba chon' kwasḻoḻ ka chazlallee. Per ni chon' ka dii le kwenc̱he gak gona'n, ḻa' ni c̱he ḻennan' gox wṉab Cristo Jesúza' nad'.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', bi nia' ba chon' kwasḻoḻ ka chazlallee. Per de to dii chon', bich zia' wṉeyi c̱he diika' ba wde, san chon' to dii byen kwenc̱he idoḻid' dii wenna' zi' za'.
Ni chon' ka dii le kwenc̱he yillin' gana' ikaa daa goṉ Chioza' nad'. Ḻa' ni c̱heyinnan' gox wṉabe' nad' kwenc̱he nak' Crístona' txen.
Na' kan' chiyaḻ' secho wṉeyi yog'ḻoḻcho, cho' ba nakchacho chonḻilall'chone'. Na' shi bi zelen wṉeyi Chioza'kzə wzajniile'n le'.
Na' daa llialote chiyaḻ' soatezi soacho goncho kon ka ba bzajnii Chioza' cho'.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', ḻi wsa'to c̱hele ka nsa' c̱ha', na' ka nsa' c̱he beṉ'ka' chon kon ka ba bliinto' le' gonle.
Zan shii ba wnia' le', na' ṉaa ax̱t chakyeshid' nia' le' dga sto shii, zan beṉ' chongake' ka bibi zakii daa wit Crístona' ḻee yag cruza' daa bi nsa' c̱hegake' wen.
Wllin lla kwiayi' beṉ'ki daa choe'la'ogake' toz daa chṉab beli chen c̱he'ka', na' chep cha'lall'lgake' c̱heyi daa chongake' lwaayi dii nan yido'gakile'. Kon lillinzi daa de yell-lioni zegake' wṉeyi.
San cho', yabanan' nak lallcho. Na' nan' ziza' X̱ancho Jesucrístona', beena' chbezcho yisle' cho' kwenc̱he bi kwiayi'cho.
Ḻen' yishee kwerp c̱hechoki, diiki gooll' iteb, kwenc̱he yiyakan ka kwerp c̱he'na' daa ḻe zakii. Na' gone'n kon yeḻ' wak c̱he'na' daa chṉabia'lene' lao yog'ḻoḻte dii de.
Le' beṉ' bish'dawaa na' le' beṉ' zandawaa, ḻe chakid' le', na' chzelall'chgaid' ile'id' le', na' chiba chizakid' daa nonḻilall'le Crístona', na' ni c̱hele le' de to dii yizi'a banez. Ḻi soac̱hec̱h gonḻilall'le X̱anchona'.
Chat'yoid' Evódiana' len Síntiquena' yizoagake' wen daa nakgake' X̱anchona' txen.
Na' li' nako' nad' txen do yic̱hj do lalloo choncho xshin Chioza', chat'yoid' li', gaklengacho' beṉ' zanchoki. Ḻa' ḻe ba bllaglogaken' goklengake' nad' be'nto' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Jesucrístona', len Cleméntena' na' beṉ'ka' sto benlench nad' xshin Chioza'. Ba da' lie'ka' ḻee libr c̱he Chioza' gana' da' le beṉ'ka' napgake' yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi.
Ḻi yiba yizaki toshiizi daa nakle X̱ancho Crístona' txen. Na' sto shii nia' le': ¡ḻi yiba yizaki!
Ḻi wsa' c̱hele xochi kwenc̱he yog' beṉ' gakbe'gakile' nakle beṉ' wen. Ba zoa gao yiyed X̱anchona'.
Bi kwekzə yic̱hjle bittez dii chak c̱hele, san ḻi we'ḻwill Chioza' na' ḻi gonan lall' nee, na' ḻi wi'e yeḻ' chox̱ken.
Na' gone' ka soale mbalaz ax̱t kono shajniikzi bic̱he zoale ka'. Na' yeḻ' zoa mbalaza' wsol wṉitan dii zeda' de ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'leka' daa nakle Cristo Jesúza' txen.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', daa zeelote ṉaa, ḻi se wṉeyi c̱heyi daa nak dii ḻi, c̱he yog'ḻoḻte dii chidoḻ' gapcho balaaṉ, c̱he yog'ḻoḻ daa nak dii ḻi dii shao', c̱he yog'ḻoḻ dii bibi dii mal nsa'n, c̱he yog' dii wenka' chon ka yibaicho, na' c̱he yog'ḻoḻ dii zeyi c̱heyin nakan wen. Ḻi se wṉeyi c̱he yog'ḻoḻ diiki nak wen, diiki chidoḻ' we'cho xtilliin.
Ḻi gon daa ba bli' bsedid' le' na' daa benile wnia', na' daa ble'ile chon'. Ḻennan' ḻi gon, na' Chios, beena' chon ka soacho mbalaz, soalene' le'.
Chiba chizakchgaid' lao X̱ancho Jesucrístona' daa bachga chizele wṉeyi c̱ha' dii yoblə. Bi nia' ba goḻ-lall'le nad', san bi got' xḻatjinnan' gaklentole nad'.
Aga daa chyallj chc̱hinida'n nia' ka', ḻa' ba nzedid' gon' banez ka'k' dii de c̱ha'.
Ba ṉezid' bi daa ne' soe' lo yeḻ' yesh', na' ḻekzka' ba ṉezid' bi daa ne' soe' lo yeḻ' wnia'. Ba nzedid' gon' banez bittez dii chak c̱ha', shi neḻj nlla'id' wa shi chbiḻ chdon', shi dechga daa chyallj chc̱hinid' wa shi shlas bibi dekzə.
Chzoid' yog'ḻoḻte dii chtiḻ' daa chaklen Crístona' nad'.
Per ḻe wen benle daa goklenle nad' lo dii lalljki chtiḻ'.
Na' ṉezkzile kana' bizaa Macedóniana' na' wzoloa' cho'a dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona', totgui le' lle'le Filipoza' beṉle daa byalljid' kwenc̱he ji'a cho'a xtill' Chioza'. Ḻa' ni to beṉ'ka' ba nonḻilall' Crístona' yellka' sto bi goklengake' nad'.
Na' kana' wzoa' yell Tesalónicana', zan shii bseḻ'le dii byalljid'.
Aga iṉacho chyilj' bi goṉle nad', san cheenlid' gat'ch yeḻ' shao' c̱hele yabana'.
Epafrodítoni ba beṉe' nad' daa bseḻ'lenlene', na' ṉaa ba nap' yog'te daa chyalljid' ax̱t ba chichooṉlan. Na' chibayi Chioza' daa bseḻ'len, ka chibaile' diika' chzani beṉ' choe'gake'ne', diika' chḻa'ile' zix̱ sia kat' chzeygake'n lawe'na'.
Chios c̱ha'na', beena' nap yog'ḻoḻte dii wen dii shao'ka', goṉe' le' yog'ḻoḻ daa chyalljile daa nakle Cristo Jesúza' txen.
Toshiizi chiyaḻ' koocho X̱acho Chioza' balaaṉ. Kan' nakan.
Ḻi wwapsha chiox yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' Chioza' daa nongake' Cristo Jesúza' txen. Na' ḻekzka' beṉ' bish'choki zoalen nad' ni, chwapgake' le' chiox.
Na' yog'ḻoḻte beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' Chioza' ni chwapgake' le' chiox, na' beṉ'ka' chon xshin beṉ' wṉabia' Césara', ḻeyeṉ'gake' chwapgake' le' chiox.
X̱ancho Jesucrístona' soalenshgue' le' na' gaklene' yog'ḻoḻtele. Kan' gakan.
Nad' Pablo nak' postl c̱he Jesucrístona' kon ka goklall' Chioza'. Na' len beṉ' bish'cho Timotewi
chwapnto' le' chiox, ka le nakle lall' na' Chioza', le' zoale yell Colósaza', na' nakle bish' ljwellnto' daa nonḻilall'le Crístona' do yic̱hj do lall'le. X̱acho Chioza' len X̱ancho Jesucrístona' gaklenshgagake' le' na' wzoagake' le' mbalaz.
Toshiizi ka chṉabnto' c̱hele, choe'nto' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken, beena' nak X̱a X̱ancho Jesucrístona'.
Ḻa' ba beninto' dill' ba nonḻilall'le Cristo Jesúza' na' ba chakile yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' Chioza'.
Ba nsa' c̱hele ka' daa nonle lez lljazoale yabana' gana' zoa Chioza'. Na' wzolo benlen lez ka wzolo bzenagle dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' daa nak dill' ḻi c̱he Chioza'.
Na' dill' wen dill' kobi daa ba bzenagle ba blliljan doxen yell-lioni na' ba chon xshinin ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ', kon ka benan ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena' ka benilen na' wyajniile nan dii ḻi Chioza' chakile' cho'.
Dgan blii Epáfraza' le', beena' chonlene' neto' xshin Crístona' na' ḻe chakinto'ne', na' zoatezi zoe' chone' xshin Crístona' ladjlena'.
Na' Epáfraza' wne' neto' ka ba chaki ljwell-le daa zoa Espíritu c̱he Chioza' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'leka'.
Na' daan, ka wṉezinto' ka ba chonle, toshiizi chṉabinto' Chioza' gaklenche' le'. Na' chṉabinto'ne' goṉe' le' do ka nak yeḻ' sin' c̱he'na' na' yeḻ' chajnii c̱he'na' kwenc̱he shajniile kwasḻoḻ daa chaklallee gonle,
na' gak wsa' c̱hele ḻega beṉ' nonḻilall' X̱anchona', na' toshiizi gonle daa chazlallee, na' gak gonle yog'ḻoḻte daa nak wen, na' zejch gombia'chle Chioza',
na' gakchachle kon yeḻ' wak c̱he'na' daa zeelo nak yeḻ' wak choo yeḻ' wak xen kwenc̱he ka' gaple yeḻ' chxenlall' na' so sakile lao bittezə dii chak c̱hele, na' yibaile
we'tezi we'le X̱acho Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken. Ḻa' ḻen' bene' kwenc̱he lljazoalenle yog' beṉ'ka' nak lall' nee yabana' gana' chṉabi'e, gana' de beeni' c̱he'na'.
Chioza' bibeje' cho' lo yel c̱hoḻa' gana' chṉabia' dii x̱iwaa na' ba bizoe' cho' lo na' Xiiṉe'na', beena' ḻe chakile', kwenc̱he iṉabi'e cho'.
Ḻa' ḻen' bisle' cho' lao yeḻ' zak'zi'na' chidoḻ'cho daa blalj xc̱hene'na' wite' ni c̱hecho kwenc̱he biyakxen saaxya c̱hechoka'.
Crístona' bli'e ka nak X̱e Chioza', beena' kono chle'i, na' Crístona' ba chṉabia'kze' kana' zi' x̱e silte yog'ḻoḻ dii de.
Ḻa' ḻen' bx̱e bsile' yog'ḻoḻte dii de: diika' de yabana' na' diika' de yell-lioni. Bene' dii chle'icho na' bentie' dii bi chle'icho, ka no anjlka' na' len anjlka' biyak dii x̱iw' diika' chṉabia' lo yell-lioni. Bene' yog'ḻoḻte dii de, na' bene'n kwenc̱he sho'e balaaṉ.
Ba zoakz Crístona' kana' zi' x̱e sil yog'ḻoḻte dii de, na' ḻe' chone' ka chongakan daa bllie' bia' gongakan.
Na' ḻen' chṉabi'e cho' nakcho lall' nee, daa nakchone' txen. Ḻen' bx̱ie' yeḻ' mban daa nak zejḻi kaṉi daa nake' beṉ' nech beṉ' biban toshiizi ladj beṉ' wet'ka'. Daan, nake' ḻiizelozi beṉ' choo beṉ' xen na' chṉabi'e lao yog'ḻoḻte dii de.
Ḻa' Chioza' wyazlallee gap Crístona' doxen yeḻ' wṉabia', yeḻ' wak na' yog' ka diika' nape',
na' bene' ka yog'ḻoḻte dii bx̱e bsile' yabana' len yell-lioni bizoalengakan ḻe' wen daa wit Crístona', blalj xc̱hene'na' ḻee yag cruza'.
Na' le', kanan' nḻaala'ole Chioza' ni c̱he dii malka' chonle na' gokzi' gokzbanilene'.
San ṉaa, ba bene' kwenc̱he bizoalenlene' wen daa bseḻee Crístona' wite' ḻee yag cruza' kwenc̱he gakle beṉ' nxi nyech, beṉ' bibi nda' nchen na' beṉ' bibi xtoḻiin de lawe'na'.
Per chonan byen toshiizi soac̱hec̱hle gonḻilall'le Crístona', beena' ba wyajḻe'le c̱he', na' bi gakc̱hoplall'le c̱heyi daa benle lez gaki c̱hele ka bzenagle dill' wen dill' kob c̱he'na'. Na' dga ba benile, ba choe'gake'n dill' doxen yell-lioni, na' nad' Pablo, chaklen' cho'an dill'.
Na' ṉaa chiba chizakid' daa chllagloa' yog' yeḻ' zak'zi'ki ni c̱hele. Ḻa' daa chak c̱ha' ki, chen chle'id' ka yeḻ' zak'zi'ka' ben ble'i Crístona' ni c̱hecho, cho' ba nonḻilall'chone' na' zaklebicho ka kwerp c̱he'na'.
Chioza' bzoe' nad' gak lo na' gaklen' le' ba chonḻilall'lene' na' wliid' le' kwasḻoḻ cho'a xtilleena'.
Kani'teyi kono wṉezi daa wlo'e xṉezin gone', per ṉaa ba bliile'n beṉ'ka' nak lall' nee.
Chioza' chaklallee iṉezi beṉ'ka' nak lall' nee dga kono wṉezi kana', na' nakan to dii zakii nlleb nan Crístona' zoalene' le' bi nakle beṉ' Israel, le' chonḻilall'lene', na' nonle lez lljazoalenle Chioza' gana' de balaaṉ xen c̱he'na'.
Neto' chyix̱je'into' beṉ' xtill' Crístona', na' chat'yointo' yog' beṉ' wzenaggake'n. Na' chc̱hinnto' do ka nak yeḻ' sin'na' daa ba ngwee neto' ka chli' chsedinto' ḻegake' kwenc̱he yog' beṉ'ka' gak Crístona' txen yiyakgake' kwasḻoḻ ka cheeni Chioza'.
Daan, choe'ḻ-lallaa chyix̱ji'a cho'a xtilleena' kon ga zeelo chizoid', na' Crístona' chaklene' nad' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he'na'.
Cheenid' iṉezile' dii xen dii chen chle'id' ni c̱hele na' ni c̱he beṉ' bish'choka' lle' Laodiceana', na' ni c̱he yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' bish'choka' biṉ' gombia' nad',
kwenc̱he yog'le wtip' lall'le na' gakle toz gaki ljwell-le, na' shajniile kwasḻoḻ daa wloo Chioza' xṉezin daa kono wṉezi kani'yi. Na' ḻennan' daa bidyen Crístona',
beena' blii cho' doxen ka nak yeḻ' sin' na' yeḻ' chajnii c̱he Chioza', diika' nak dii zakii nlleb.
Nia' le' ka' kwenc̱he kono siye' le' we'lenze' le' dill' xochi na' gakile nakan dill' ḻi.
Ḻa'kzi bi zoalen' le', chi' yic̱hjkz' le' na' chiba chizakid' daa ṉezid' nsa' c̱hele wen na' zoac̱hec̱hle chonḻilall'le Crístona'.
Na' daa ba nonle Jesucrístona' X̱anle, chiyaḻ' wsa' c̱hele ḻega beṉ' ba nake'ne' txen.
Ka zoac̱hec̱h to yag dii ba nde loinna' zitj, ka'kzan le', ḻi soac̱hec̱h gonḻilall'le Crístona', kon ka ba bli' bsedinto' le', na' toshiizi ḻi we' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken.
Ḻi wsak', bi we'zle latj no siye' le' kon yeḻ' sin' daa chaljlall' beṉ' yell-lioni daa bibi zakii. Ḻa' aga xtill' Crístonan' chli' chsedgakile' san c̱he diika' chṉabia' lo yell-lionin.
Crístona', beena' golje' goke' beṉ' de beli chen, nape' doxen yeḻ' wṉabia', yeḻ' wak na' yog' ka diika' nap Chioza'.
Na' le', daa nakle Crístona' txen, yeḻ' wak c̱he'na' ba chonan llin lo yeḻ' mban c̱helena', ḻa' Crístona' napche' yeḻ' wṉabia' na' yeḻ' wak aga ka yog' anjlka' wa dii x̱iw'ka' chṉabia'.
Na' ḻekzka' daa naklene' txen wak iṉacho yoo to seṉ ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena' daa chli'n nakle lall' na' Chioza', per bi nakan ka seṉna' daa chgoo beṉ' kwerp c̱he'ka' daa le circuncisión, san seṉna' chgoo Crístona' nakan daa chikobe' yic̱hjlall'do'chona' kwenc̱he dii mala' daa chzelallii beli chenna' bich iṉabia'n cho'.
Ka wchoale nisa' wak iṉacho witlenle Crístona', na' bgash'lenlene' ka bgashee, na' ḻekzka' bibanle ka bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka' daa wyajḻe'le Chioza' bisbane' Crístona' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he'na'.
Na' le', gokle ka beṉ' net lao Chioza' ni c̱he saaxya c̱heleka' daa biṉ' c̱hooṉlall'le daa cheeni beli chen c̱helena'. San ṉaa, Chioza' ba beṉe' to yeḻ' mban kob c̱hele daa nakle Crístona' txen, na' bizi'xene' yog' saaxya c̱heleka'.
Chioza' bikwase' daa wdao xya c̱hecho, na' bsol bṉite'n kana' wda' Jesucrístona' ḻee yag cruza'.
Na' bikwase' yeḻ' wak c̱he dii x̱iw'ka', diika' chṉabia' beṉ' yell-lioki, kana' wit Crístona' ḻee yag cruza'. Na' daa bli'e bene' ḻegakan gan, bsi'e ḻegakan yeḻ' zto' lao lkwe' beṉ'.
Daan, bi wzenagle c̱he beṉ'ka' nagake' bi gak yeej gaole bittez yeḻ' wao, wa nagake' chonan byen gonle lṉika', na' koole balaaṉ llana' chize beo' cheeṉa', na' gombaaṉle lla sabdka'.
Yog'ḻoḻ diiki nakan daa wzajniin cho' lat' c̱he daa zi' gon Chioza' na' benan llin kana' zi' wseḻee Crístona', na' ṉaa daa bide' bich chongakan llin.
Bi we'le latj no siye' le' kwenc̱he bi wṉitle daa ba nonle lez ikaale. Bi wzenagle c̱he beṉ'ka' chonzə ka ḻe chzex̱j yic̱hjin lao Chioza', na' choe'la'ogake' anjlka', na' nazgake' chle'dogakile' na' chep cha'lall'lengake' daa chyiljlall'zgake'.
Beṉ'ka' chon ka' bi nakgake' Crístona' txen, beena' zaklebi yic̱hjchona' daa chṉabi'e cho' nonḻilall'chone'. Na' cho' nakchone' txen, chakchacho ka cheeni Chioza', ka chak c̱he tkwen wej kwerp c̱hechoni ndiḻ nllagan bec̱hj bnia'ka' nox̱' ljwellin kwenc̱he ka' chgolgakan txen.
Daa ba nakcho Crístona' txen daa wite' ḻee yag cruza', wak iṉacho ba netcho lao diika' chyiljlall' beṉ' yell-lioni na' bich chiyaḻ' iṉabia'n cho'. Na' ¿berac̱he ni chonzle txen diika' chyiljlall' beṉ' yell-lioni,
kachaka' daa nagake': “Bi wc̱hino' dga, bi gawo' dga, na' bi gox̱oo dga”?
Yog'ḻoḻ diiki chwaḻ' beṉ' yell-lioni nakchozgakan dii chibill chido na' dii chde c̱heyin ka zej chc̱hinchogakan.
Dii ḻi, diika' nagake' chontekzgakan ka dii ḻe zakii, ḻa' kat' chongake'n chontekzgake' ka beṉ' ḻe chapshii daa nak c̱he Chios, na' ka beṉ' ḻe chzex̱j yic̱hjin lao Chioza', na' ka beṉ' ḻe chdezi' beli chen c̱heyin, per yog' diika' chongake' bi gak yikwasgakan daa chibayi beli chenna'.
Daa ba nakle txen Crístona' na' nakle ka beṉ' bibanlene' txen ka bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka', chiyaḻ' kwe' yic̱hjle c̱heyi daa nak c̱he yabana', gana' llia Crístona' shḻaa de shḻi c̱he Chioza'.
Ḻi se wṉeyi daa nak c̱he yabana', na' bich kooz yic̱hjle daa nak c̱he yell-lioni.
Ḻa' ba nakle ka beṉ' ba wit daa nakle Crístona' txen, na' yeḻ' mban c̱helena' ba nakan toz kon Crístona' lao Chioza'.
Na' ka yiyed Crístona', beena' noṉe' le' yeḻ' mban daa nak zejḻi kaṉi, ḻekzka' sho'lenlene' balaaṉ xen daa chidoḻee.
Daan, chiyaḻ' kwej yic̱hjle yog'ḻoḻ dii mala' daa chiba chizaki beli chen c̱helena': bi iṉelenzle xiiṉ xool beṉ' wa xiiṉ xyo beṉ', bi gonle bichlə dii zban, bich we'le cho'a xbayi beli chen c̱helena', bich sa'lall'zle gonle dii mala', ni bi selall'le bi gat' kwe' c̱hele. Ḻa' beena' chzelall' gat' kwe'ile' dii xen, toz kan chonlene' beena' choe'la'o daa nak yaj yag.
Chioza' wsak'zi'e beṉ'ka' chon diika' daa bi chzenaggake' c̱he'.
Na' le', ḻekzka' benle diika' kana' biṉ' wzenagle c̱he Chioza'.
Per ṉaa, chiyaḻ' kwej yic̱hjle yog'ḻoḻ diiki: yeḻ' chllaa chlok, yeḻ' wen dii mal, yeḻ' chyilj chzan xtill' beṉ', na' yeḻ' chbell chṉe ka nḻa' ka nte.
Bich siye' ljwell-le, ḻa' ba wlej yic̱hjle yeḻ' mban gol c̱helena' na' bich gonle dii malka' benle kana'.
Ba biyakle beṉ' kob, na' Chios, beena' bx̱e bsil le', chone' ka gombia'chlene' na' gakchle dowalj ka cheenile'.
Aga bi zakii shi nakcho beṉ' Israel wa shi bi nakcho, shi yoocho seṉ daa le circuncisión wa shi bi yoochon, shi nakcho beṉ' nsed wa beṉ' bi nsed, shi nakcho beṉ' ndoo lla yel chone' xshin beṉ' wa nakcho beṉ' chon xshinkzin. Daa llialoten, gakcho Crístona' txen, ḻa' nottezə nakcho ḻekzen' zoalene' cho'.
Chioza' ḻe chakile' le' na' ba wleje' le' kwenc̱he gakle lall' nee. Na' daan, chiyaḻ' yiyesh'lallile beṉ' na' gonile ḻegake' wen, na' bi gakle beṉ' cha'sib, san gakle beṉ' gax̱jlall', na' gaple yeḻ' chxenlall'.
Chiyaḻ' gonle banez ljwell-le, na' chiyaḻ' si'xen c̱he ljwell-le shi no bi chon c̱hele. Ka ben Crístona' wxi'xene' c̱hele, ḻekzka' le' chiyaḻ' si'xenle c̱he beṉ'.
Na' daa llialote chiyaḻ' gaki ljwell-le, ḻa' shi chaki ljwell-le, ḻennan' gonan ka gonle yog' diiki.
Ḻi we' latj iṉabia' yeḻ' mbalaz c̱he Crístona' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena', ḻa' kwenc̱he soalen ljwell-le mbalazan ba gox wṉabe' le' gakle toz. Na' tlizi chiyaḻ' we'lene' yeḻ' chox̱ken.
Ḻi kooshao' do ka nak xtill' Crístona' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'. Ḻi wli' wsedi ljwell-le na' ḻi wtip lall' ljwell-le, ḻi wc̱hin do ka nak yeḻ' sin'na' daa ba beṉe' le'. Ḻi goḻ no salmo, no himno, na' bichlə daa na Espíritu c̱he Chioza' goḻ-le, na' ḻi we' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken ka goḻ-le.
Na' yog'ḻoḻ daa gonle wa daa iṉale, chiyaḻ' gonlen ḻega beṉ' nak X̱ancho Jesúza' txen na' we'le X̱acho Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken daa ba nonḻilall'le Jesucrístona'.
Le' noolə, ḻi wzenag c̱he beṉ' c̱helena', ḻa' kan' chiyaḻ' gonle daa ba nx̱enilall'le X̱anchona'.
Na' le' beṉ' byo, ḻi gaki xool-lena' na' bi gonile ḻegake' zid' zṉia.
Na' le' bi'do', ḻi wzenag yog'ḻoḻ daa na x̱axṉa'leka', ḻa' kan' chazlall' X̱anchona'.
Na' le' chisgol chischoole, bi wsheshlenle xiiṉleka' konteḻe, kwenc̱he bi gakyesh'gakib'.
Na' le' ndoo lla yel-le chonle xshin beṉ', ḻi wzoa dill', ḻi gon yog'ḻoḻ daa na beṉ'ka' nak x̱anle lo yell-lioni. Aga kat'ka' chwiazgake' gonle ka chilaḻi kwenc̱he ile'shi'gakile' le', san do yic̱hj do lall'le ḻi gonan daa ba chall chlleble X̱ancho Crístona'.
Yog'ḻoḻ daa gonle, ḻi gonan do yic̱hj do lall'le na' ḻi gaktezi xshin X̱ancho Crístonan' chonle na' aga c̱he beṉ' yell-lion.
Ḻa' ṉezkzile X̱ancho Crístona', beena' nak dowalj X̱anle, gone' ka yizi'le banez c̱he dii wenna' chonle.
San beena' chon mal, ḻekze' ikee laxji dii mala' chone', nottezə nake'.
Le' nzi'le beṉ'ka' chon xshinlena', ḻi gongakile' wen. Ḻi lljadini ḻekzka' le' zoa to X̱anle yabana'.
Ḻi we'ḻ-lall' we'ḻwill-le Chioza', na' ḻi se kwas we'ḻwill-lene' na' we'lene' yeḻ' chox̱ken.
Na' kat' we'ḻwill-lene', iṉabgachile'ne' gaklene' neto' kwenc̱he wsaljche' xṉeznto' llje'chnto' xtill' Crístona' daa kono wṉezi kana', ḻa' ni c̱heyinnan' dia' lillyani.
Ḻi iṉabi Chioza' gaklene' nad' kwenc̱he gak wi'a dill' kwasḻoḻ, ka chiyaḻ' wi'an.
Ḻi wsak' ḻi gon wen ladj beṉ'ka' bi nombia' Crístona', ḻa' ṉaayeṉ'nan de latj wli'le non nakle txen.
Dill'ka' choe'le chiyaḻ' gakan sia mbalaz toshiizi, na' ḻekzka' gak yilliile xochi xtill' beṉ' kat' no bi iṉabi le'.
Beṉ' bish'cho Tíquiconi, beeni ḻe chakicho, we'lene' le' dill' ka nak yog'ḻoḻ diika' chak c̱ha'. Ḻen' do yic̱hj do lallee chonlene' nad' xshin X̱ancho Crístona'.
Daan, chseḻaane' laolena' kwenc̱he wi'e dill' nakan chak c̱hento' na' wtipe' lall'le.
Na' ḻekzka' beṉ' wlall c̱hele Onésimoni ziza'lene'ne', beeni ḻe chakinto' na' nake' dowalj bish' ljwellcho. Ḻegake' we'gake' dill' c̱he yog'ḻoḻ daa chak c̱ha' ni.
Aristárconi, beeni nak' txen dento' lillyani, chwape' le' chiox; na' ḻekzka' Márcona', beṉ' bish' Bernabéna'. Ba wniakz' le' shi yidwia Márcona' le', ḻi gonshaile' wen.
Ka'kzə Jesúzi, beeni che'gake' Justo, chwape' le' chiox. Ladj yog' beṉ' Israelka' nonḻilall' Crístona', beṉ'kichgan chaklengake' nad' chonnto' xshin Chioza', na' ḻe ba btipgake' lallaa.
Beṉ' wlall c̱hele, Epáfrazi, ḻekzka' chwape' le' chiox. Nake' to beṉ' chon xshin Crístona', na' toshiizi choe'ḻwille' Chioza' ni c̱hele kwenc̱he gakchale lo xṉeze'na', na' soac̱hec̱hle we'ḻ-lall'le gonle ka cheeni Chioza'.
Ṉezid' ka wṉeyi nlleb zie' c̱hele na' c̱he beṉ'ka' lle' yell Laodicéana' na' yell Hierápoliza'.
Lúcazi, beeni chon rmech, beeni ḻe chakid', chwape' le' chiox, na' ḻekzka' Démazi.
Ḻi wwap chiox bish' ljwellchoka' lle' yell Laodicéana', na' ḻekzka' Nínfana' na' beṉ'ka' chdop chllag lille'na' choe'la'ogake' Crístona'.
Ka yiyoll wlable yishi bzej', ḻi wseḻaan lao beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' yell Laodicéana' kwenc̱he ḻekzka' lengake' wlabgake'n, na' ḻegake' goṉgake' le' yisha' daa bseḻaa lawe'ka' kwenc̱he wlablen.
Ḻi ye' Arquípona' gone' to dii byen gone' kwasḻoḻ daa ba non Chioza' lall' nee gone'.
Nad', Pablo, kwin' chzej' gani chwap' le' chiox. Ḻi lljadini lillyan dia'. Chioza' gaklenshgue' le'.
Nad' Pablo na' Silvánoni len Timotewi chwapnto' le' chiox, le' chdop chllagle choe'la'ole Jesucrístona' Tesalónicana', le' nakle lall' na' X̱acho Chioza' len X̱ancho Jesucrístona'. Chṉabinto' ḻegake' gonshgagake' ka gak wen c̱hele, na' wzoagake' le' mbalaz.
Toshiizi choe'nto' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken c̱he yog'ḻoḻ-le kat' choe'ḻwillnto'ne'.
Toshiizi ka choe'ḻwillnto' Chioza', beena' nak X̱acho, chjadininto' ka choe'ḻ-lall'le chonle dii wenna' daa nonḻilall'lene' na' chakile'ne', na' daa zoac̱hec̱hle nonle lez X̱ancho Jesucrístona'.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', le' nakle beṉ' chaki Chioza', ṉezinto' ba wleje' le'.
Ḻa' ka be'lennto' le' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Jesucrístona', aga de cho'a dill'zan be'lennto'n le', san kon yeḻ' wak c̱he Chioza' na' c̱he Espíritu Sánto c̱he'nan' be'nto' dill' do yic̱hj do lall'nto'. Na' ṉezkzile ka wen bsa' c̱hento' ladjlena' kwenc̱he goklennto' le'.
Na' le' bsedle chonle ka neto' na' ka ben X̱ancho Jesucrístona', ḻa' Espíritu Sántonan' bene' ka bibaile bleble Cho'a xtill Chioza' ḻa'kzi dii zan yeḻ' zak'zi'ka' ben ble'ile.
Na' daa bizo bizakile yeḻ' zak'zi'ka', bliile beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' yellka' mbani Macedóniana' na' Acáyana' ka chiyaḻ' gongake'.
Na' daa benle ka', Cho'a xtill' Chioza' ba wisḻesan aga to Macedóniana'zə, ni aga to Acáyana'zə, san doxente. Na' ḻekzka' ba bengakile ka nonḻilall'le Crístona', na' bi chonan byen we'nto dill' c̱hele.
Ḻa' kwingake' choe'gake' dill' ka wen benle bleble neto', na' bsanle bich be'la'ole lwaa lsak' diika' bi nak chios kwenc̱he benḻilall'le beena' nak dowalj Chios yaa Chios ban,
na' chbezle yiyetj Xiiṉe' Jesúza' yabana', beena' bisbane' ladj beṉ' wetka'. Na' Jesúza' yisle' cho' lao yeḻ' zak'zi'na' ziza' daa we' Chioza' beṉ'ka' bi bzenag c̱he'.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', ṉezkzile daa bidwianto' le' bi biddadznto'.
Na' ḻekzka' ṉezile ḻe wxak'zi'nto' yell Filípoza' na' biya dii wnagake' neto', per Chioza' goklene' neto' na' bi bllebnto' wdix̱je'into' le' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Jesucrístona' ḻa'kzi biya dii btiḻnto'.
Na' ka wdix̱je'into'n le', do yic̱hj do lall'nto' be'lennto' le' daa nak dill' ḻi, na' kono wxiye'nto'.
Ḻa' Chioza' wleje' neto' na' bzoe' neto' we'nto' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he'na'. Na' aga chonnto'n kwenc̱he c̱hazlall' beṉaan, san kwenc̱he c̱hazlall' Chiozan', beena' nombia' yic̱hjlall'do'nto'ni.
Ṉezkzile, na' Chioza' ṉez nḻe'ile', ni shlin bigaṉ' we'la'o we' dill'nto' le' daa chzelall'nto' bi de c̱hele.
Bi cheeninto' no koo neto' balaaṉ, ni le' ni beṉ' yoblə. Daa naknto' postl c̱he Crístona', zak' wṉabinto' le' goṉle daa chyallj chc̱hininto' sheḻ'ka', per bibi wnanto' le'.
San kana' wzoalennto' le' bennto' c̱hele ka chon to noolə chap chwie' bi'do' c̱he'ka' xochi.
Na' daa ḻe chakinto' le', aga to daa be'lenznto' le' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístonan' bibainto', san ḻekzka' bennto' ax̱t ga zeelo bizointo' goklennto' le'. Ḻa' ḻe chakinto' le'.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', chjadinkzile ka bdezi' kwinnto' shlak wzoalennto' le' kana' be'lennto' le' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona'. Ka tella ka waḻ bennto' llinna' kwenc̱he ni tole bi beninto' zed.
Chioza' ṉez nḻe'ile', na' ḻekzka' le' nonḻilall'le Crístona', ṉezile do yic̱hj do lall'nto' wzoanto' ladjlena', na' bennto' daa nak shḻi na' bsa' c̱hento' wen kwenc̱he kono biz gon iṉe c̱hento'.
Ḻekzka' ṉezile beninto' to tole ka choni to beṉ' xiiṉe'ka'
daa btipnto' lall'le, na' beṉnto' le' yeḻ' chxenlall', na' ba be'lennto' le' dill' ka chiyaḻ' wsa' c̱hele, le' nonḻilall'le Chioza', beena' gox le' kwenc̱he iṉabi'e le' na' lljazoalenlene' gana' ile'ile ka nak balaaṉ xen c̱he'na'.
Na' ḻekzka' toshiizi choe'nto' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken daa bleble cho'a xtilleena' be'lennto' le', ḻa' gokbe'ile' nakan cho'a xtill' Chioza' na' aga cho'a xtill' beṉ' yell-lionizan. Na' dii ḻi nakan cho'a xtill' Chioza' daa chisha'n yic̱hjlall'do'chona', cho' chonḻilall'chone'.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', kana' bsak'zi' beṉ' wlall c̱heleka' le', gok c̱hele ka gok c̱he beṉ' Judeaka', beṉ'ka' chdop chllag choe'la'ogake' Crístona', ḻa' beṉ' wlall c̱he'ka', beṉ' Israelka', bsak'zi'gake' ḻegake' daa nonḻilall'gake' Crístona'.
Ḻekzgaken' betgake' X̱ancho Jesúza' na' betgake' dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' kani'yi, na' ḻekzka' blaggake' neto'. Bi chongake' ka chazlall' Chioza' na' chle'zbangakile' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ',
ḻa' chsej chllongake' c̱hix̱je'into' beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel cho'a xtill' Chioza' kwenc̱he yilagake' na' bi kwiayi'gake'. Na' daa chongake' ka', chzanchgake' saaxya c̱he'ka', na' daan, ba nakten ile'gakile' yeḻ' zak'zi' wala' we' Chioza'.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', kana' bi wzoalennto' le' shloll, ḻa'kzi bi ble'into' le', toshiizi jadininto' le' na' ḻe goklall'nto' yidwianto' le'.
Dii ḻi goklall'nto' yidwianto' le', na' nad'yeṉ' zan shii goklallaa yidwia' le', per Satanáza' bsej bllonan yid'.
Daa chonḻilall'le X̱ancho Jesúza' na' zoale chonle wen daa be'lento' le' xtilleena', nonnto' lez gonle ka yibainto' lawe'na' kat' yiyede'.
Dii ḻi, chibainto' ka chonle na' zoanto' mbalaz ni c̱hele.
Na' ka bich bi rson c̱hele de, bi wzoanto' wen na' be'nto' dill' yigaaṉnto' to neto'zə Aténaza'
na' bseḻ'nto' beṉ' bish'cho Timotewa', beena' chonlene' neto' xshin Chioza' daa chyix̱je'nto dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona'. Bseḻ'nto'ne' kwenc̱he yidtipe' lall'le na' gone' ka soac̱hec̱hle gonḻilall'le Crístona',
kwenc̱he ni tole bi gakllejile ni c̱he yeḻ' zak'zi'ka' chen chle'ile. Ḻa' ṉezkzile kan' llia bia' gak c̱hecho.
Na' kana' ni zoalennto' le', bsi'ninto' le' nan wle'icho yeḻ' zak'zi'ka', na' ṉezile ba gok ka wnanto' le'.
Na' daa ḻe gokshejlallaa ni c̱hele, bseḻaa Timotewa' kwenc̱he iṉezid' shi ni nonḻilall'kzle Jesucrístona', ḻa' gokid' dii x̱iwaa gonan ka gonc̱hoplall'le na' gakdadz xshin Chioza' daa bennto' ladjlena'.
Per ṉaa ba bila' Timotewi gani zoanto' na' cho'e dill' ni nonḻilall'kzle Jesucrístona' na' chaki ljwell-le. Ḻekzka' cho'e dill' toshiizi chjadinile neto' daa ḻe chakile neto', na' ḻe cheenile ile'ile neto'. Na' ka'kz neto', ḻe cheeninto' ile'into' le'.
Daan, le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', ḻa'kzi chiya dii chen chle'into', ax̱t bixenlall'nto' ka wṉezinto' ni zoac̱hec̱hle nonḻilall'le Crístona'.
Daa ba ṉezinto' ni zoac̱hec̱hle chonḻilall'le X̱anchona', ax̱t biyakshao'lall'nto'.
Na' bichkz bi dill' chillelinto' kwenc̱he we'nto' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken c̱he yeḻ' xabana' daa napnto' ni c̱hele.
Ka tella ka waḻ chṉabinto' Chioza' wi'e latj yidwianto' le' dii yoblə kwenc̱he yiyoll yido wzajniinto' le' daa ni chyalljile shajniile kwenc̱he gonḻilall'chlene'.
Na' chṉabid' X̱acho Chioza' na' X̱ancho Jesúza' gaklengake' neto' kwenc̱he bibi wsej wllonan yidwianto' le'.
Na' X̱anchona' gonshgue' ka zizikli gakchi ljwell-le na' gakile yog'ḻoḻ beṉ', ka chakinto' le'.
Na' gonshgue' ka gakchach yic̱hjlall'do'lena' kwenc̱he gakle beṉ' nxi nyech na' bibi xtoḻ'le gat' lao Chioza', beena' nak X̱acho, kat'ka' X̱ancho Jesucrístona' ziza'lene' beṉ'ka' nak lall' nee.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', kon yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he X̱ancho Jesucrístona', chat'yointo' le' soatezi soale gonchle ka chazlall' Chioza', kon ka bsedinto' le' gonle na' kon ka ba chonkzle.
Ba ṉezkzile diika' wnanto' le' gonle, na' nakgakan diika' bllia X̱ancho Jesúza' bia' goncho.
Chioza' cheenile' soale gonle daa chazlallee. Na' bi iṉelenzle xiiṉ xool beṉ',
san to tole chiyaḻ' gaple balaaṉ xool-lena' ḻega beṉ' nak lall' na' Chioza',
na' bi' we'zle cho'a xbayi beli chen c̱helena', ka chon beṉ'ka' biṉ' gombia'gake' Chioza'.
Na' ni tole bi gonḻe'ile xool ljwell-le ḻa' ba bsi'nkzinto' le' X̱anchona' wsak'zi'e yog' beṉ'ka' chon ka'.
Chioza' aga gox wṉabe' cho' kwenc̱he goncho dii zbanki, san gox wṉabe' cho' kwenc̱he gakcho beṉ' nxi nyech.
Daan, beena' bi chzenague' diiki chli' chsedinto' aga c̱hento'n bi chzenague', san c̱he Chiozan', beena' beṉe' le' Espíritu Sánto c̱he'na'.
Na' ka nak c̱heyi daa chaki ljwellcho, bi chonan byen wzajni'chinto'n le', ḻa' kwin Chioza' ba bsedile' le' gaki ljwell-le.
Na' chakile yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona', beṉ'ka' zoa doxente Macedóniana'. Na' chat'yointo' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', zizikchli gakchi ljwell-le.
Ḻi gon to dii byen soalen ljwell-le wen, na' ḻi se wṉeyi c̱he ḻoo yoo lill-lena', na' ḻi gon llin kon ṉi'a na'leka' ka ba wnakznto' le'
kwenc̱he beṉ'ka' bi nonḻilall' Crístona' iṉagake' ḻe wen nsa' c̱hele, na' ḻekzka' bibi zed lljenle lill beṉ'.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', cheeninto' iṉezile nak gak c̱he beṉ'ka' ba wit kwenc̱he bi gakyeshile ka chakyeshii beṉ'ka' bi nongake' lez lljazoalengake' Chioza'.
Daa chajḻe'cho wit Jesúza' na' bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka', ḻekzka' chajḻe'cho Chioza' yisbane' beṉ'ka' nonḻilall'gake'ne' ka witgake'.
Na' daan, nanto' le' kon ka wna X̱ancho Jesúza': Cho' ni mbancho kat' zizee, aga chon' yibialocho lao beṉ'ka' ba wit.
Ḻa' kwin X̱ancho Jesúza' zizee yabana', na' iṉie' zillj gone' mandad yiban beṉ' wetka', na' anjla' chṉabia' iṉie' na' yenicho kwell trompet c̱he Chioza', na' beṉ'ka' benḻilall' Crístona' yibangake' nech.
Na'tech, ka cho' ni mbancho, yigoyo Chioza' cho' yiyakchogake' txen ladj bejka' kwenc̱he lljatiḻcho X̱anchona', na' soalenchone' zejḻi kaṉi.
Na' daan, ḻi wtip lall' ljwell-le kon dill'ki.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', bi chyalljin wzejnto' le' iṉanto' bi lla bi goran' gak diiki.
Ḻa' ba ṉezkzile kwasḻoḻ llana' ziza' X̱anchona' tokonganzi zizee, ka chon to wban kat' lljḻane' waḻ chel.
Kat'ka' beṉ' yell-liona' iṉe': “Asi ṉaa zoachgacho mbalaz. Bikzbi chak c̱hecho”, kana'lan tokonganzi kwiayi'gake' na' aga wilalat'gake'. Gak c̱hegake' ka chak c̱he noola' tokonganzə chzolo chaz bes c̱he'na' kat' sane'.
San le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', ba ṉezile diiki kwenc̱he ki sha c̱hel-lə chon llana' zizee tokonganzə.
Yog'le ba nombia'le Chioza' ba chdale lo beeni' c̱he'na', na' bich chdale lo yel c̱hoḻa' daa chzaklebi dii mala'.
Daan, ḻi se kwas na' ḻi gakto beṉ' nyeeṉ nyeeniyi na' bi gonle ka chon beṉ'ka' bi nombia'gake' Chioza'.
Beṉ'ka' chda lo yel c̱hoḻa' bi nombia'gake' Chioza', nakgake' ka beṉ' ches wa ka beṉ' chzoll chniti na' bi chakbe'gakile' bin chak.
Per cho', lo beeni'nan' chdacho. Daan, chiyaḻ' gakcho beṉ' nyeeṉ nyeeniyi, na' gonḻilall'chcho Chioza', na' gakicho yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' na' goncho lez lljazoalencho Chioza'. Shi goncho yog' diika', na' gakcho ka to soldad beena' nyaz diika' chkweejan ḻe' lo wdiḻa'.
Ḻa' aga gox wṉab Chioza' cho' kwenc̱he techo lo yeḻ' zak'zi'na' zizan', san gox wṉabe' cho' kwenc̱he gat' yeḻ' mban c̱hecho zejḻi kaṉi daa wit X̱ancho Jesucrístona'.
Wite' ni c̱hecho kwenc̱he ḻa'kzi shi ni mbancho wa shi ba witcho, lljazoalenchone'.
Na' daan, ḻi wtip lall' ljwell-le na' ḻi gaklen ljwell-le soac̱hec̱hchle wzenagle c̱he Chioza' kon ka ba chonkzle.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', chṉabinto' le' gaple balaaṉ beṉ'ka' chilaḻi chongake' xshin X̱anchona' ladjlena', beṉ'ka' ngoo lall' na' le' na' chli' chsedgakile' le' nakan chiyaḻ' gonle.
Ḻi gapgake' balaaṉ na' ḻi gaki ḻegake' ni c̱he llinna' daa chongake'. Na' ḻi soalen ljwell-le mbalaz.
Ḻekzka' chat'yointo' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', ḻi we'lensha beṉ' liaka' dill' kwenc̱he gongake' llin. Na' ḻi wtipsha lall' beṉ'ka' chidiṉji, na' ḻi gaklen beṉ'ka' biṉ' gakcha lo xṉez Chioza', na' ḻi gap yeḻ' chxenlall' c̱he yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'.
Wsak'gale ni tole bi yizi'zle wzon c̱he beṉ' shi bi gone' c̱hele, san ḻi gon ka dii le gonle dii wenna', aga to ladjle na'zə, san kon yog'ḻoḻte beṉ'.
Toshiizi ḻi yibayi.
Ḻi soatezi soa we'ḻwill-le Chioza'.
Ḻi we' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken lao bittezə dii chak, ḻa' kan' cheenile' goncho cho' nonḻilall'cho Cristo Jesúza'.
Bi wsej wllonle daa cheeni Espíritu Sántona' gone'.
Bi gonzile nakzi xtill' beena' iṉa: “Ki ba wna Chioza' nad'.”
San ḻi wsedyeṉ'an shi dii ḻi nakan daa goll Chioza' ḻe' na' ḻi ikaa dii wenna'.
Bi gonle txen bittez dii mal.
Na' Chioza'kzə, beena' chzoe' cho' mbalaz, gone' ka yiyoll yido gakle ka chazlallee. Na' gap wwie' do ka nakle kwenc̱he bibi doḻ' naple kat' ziza' X̱ancho Jesucrístona'.
Chioza', beena' gox wṉabe' le', toshiizi chone' daa ba wne' gone', na' ḻen' gone' dga.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', ḻi iṉabshayi Chioza' gaklene' neto'.
Ḻi wwapgach chiox yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' bish'choka' na' beṉ' zanchoka' ḻega beṉ' chaki ljwellin daa nakle lall' na' Chioza'.
Na' nia' le' kon yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he X̱anchona' wlabshale dga lao yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' bish'choka' na' beṉ' zanchoka'.
X̱ancho Jesucrístona' gaklensgue' le'.
Nad' Pablo, na' Silvánoni len Timotewi chwapnto' le' chiox, ka le' chdop chllagle choe'la'ole X̱acho Chioza' na' X̱ancho Jesucrístona' Tesalónicana'.
Na' chṉabinto' ḻegake' gonshgagake' ka gak wen c̱hele na' wzoagake' le' mbalaz.
Dii ḻicha toshiizi chiyaḻ' we'nto' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken ni c̱hele, le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', daa zejch chonḻilall'le Jesucrístona' na' daa to tole zejch chakile beṉ'.
Daan, choe'nto' xtill'le lao beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' to to gana' chdop chllaggake' choe'la'ogake' Chioza' ka nak daa zoac̱hec̱hle toshiizi noṉlilall'le Crístona' ḻa'kzi chen chle'ile yeḻ' zak'zi'ka'.
Na' yog'ḻoḻ dga chli'n ka wen ben Chioza' wleje' le' gakle lall' nee, na' chli'n dii ḻi nakle beṉ' chidoḻ' lljazoa gana' chṉabi'e, ḻa' ni c̱heyinnan' chzak'zi'le.
Na' Chioza', beena' chc̱hoglo c̱he beṉ' ka chiyaḻ', wsak'zi'e beṉ'ka' chsak'zi'gake' le'.
Na' le' chzak'zi'le ṉaa, Chioza' gone' ka soale mbalaz, na' ka'kz gone' c̱hento' kat'ka' ziza' X̱ancho Jesúza' yabana' ladj beḻ yi'na' kon anjl c̱he'ka', beṉ'ka' nap yeḻ' wak xen,
kwenc̱he wsak'zi'e beṉ'ka' bi bembia'gake' Chioza' ni bi bzenaggake' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he X̱ancho Jesúza'.
Beṉ'kin sakzi'gake' zejḻi kaṉi na' bi yillingake' gana' chṉabia' X̱anchona' kon yeḻ' wak choo yeḻ' wak xen c̱he'na'.
Ka' gak c̱hegake' kat' yila' X̱ancho Jesucrístona' kwenc̱he beṉ'ka' nak lall' nee koogake'ne' balaaṉ na' yibachgayi yog' beṉ'ka' wyajḻe' c̱he', na' lenle, daa wyajḻe'le xtilleena' be'lento' le'.
Daan, toshiizi chṉabnto' c̱hele kwenc̱he Chioza' ile'shiile' le' ḻega beṉ' gox wṉabe', na' gaklene' le' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he'na' kwenc̱he yiyoll gonle yog' dii wenna' ba yoo yic̱hjle na' bichlə dii wenka' cheenile' gonle daa nonḻilall'lene'
kwenc̱he X̱ancho Jesúza' sho'e balaaṉ ni c̱he daa chonle, na' ḻekzka' kwee le' balaaṉ. Na' Chios c̱hechona' na' X̱ancho Jesucrístona' gaklengake' le' gak ka'.
Na' ṉaa, le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', ka nak daa ziza' X̱ancho Jesucrístona' na' daa yidi'a yillagcho yiyakchone' txen, chṉabinto' le'
bi gakllejile ni bi illeble kat' yenile iṉagake' ba bila'lə X̱anchona'. Ax̱t iṉateḻzgake': “Ki ba wna Chioza'”, wa iṉazgake': “Ki wna Páblona'”, wa, “Ki bene'n yish nan ba bila'lə X̱anchona'.”
Bi we'le latj no siye'zə le' ka nak diiki. Ḻa' aga wiyedzie' shi beṉ'ka' chwiyi Chioza' biṉ' yizoshyi'gake'ne', na' shi biṉ' ichej beena' nak beṉ' mal wal, beena' ba nakten kwiayee.
Beenin gon kwine' ḻiizelozi beṉ' choo beṉ' xen na' wsej wllone' we'la'o beṉ' Chioza' wa bittezə dii nonḻilall'gake'. Na' lljc̱hi'e ḻoo yoodo' c̱he Chioza' gon kwine' ka Chios.
¿Abi chjadinile bshaljlen' le' c̱heyi dga kana' zoalen' le'?
Ṉaa ba ṉezile non ni nkwez beeni kwenc̱he bi yobile' wli'lawe'.
Do ngash'zə ba wzolokzə chak dii mala' daa ba yoo xṉezin gakə. Stozə chyallj ikwas beena' ni nzague'n kwenc̱he wli'lawin.
Na'ch wli'lao beṉ' mal wala', na' wit X̱ancho Jesúza'ne' kon bishbe c̱he'na' na' wlliayeene' ka ziza'lene' yeḻ' chey cheeni' c̱he'na'.
Ka nak beṉ' mal wala', dii x̱iwaan gaklenan ḻe' gone' biya yeḻ' wak diika' gon ka yibani beṉ' kwenc̱he siyee ḻegake'.
Na' wc̱hine' yog' de wxiye' kwenc̱he siyee beṉ'ka' ba nakan kwiayi' daa bi goklall'gake' wlebgake' daa nak dii ḻi kwenc̱he yilagake'.
Daan, Chioza'kzə cho'e latj shajḻe'gake' c̱he de wxiye'ka',
kwenc̱he kwiayi' yog'ḻoḻte beṉ'ka' bi wyajḻe'gake' c̱he daa nak dii ḻi, san bibachgakile' daa nak dii mal.
Na' neto' ṉaa, toshiizi chiyaḻ' we'nto' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken ni c̱hele, le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', beṉ' chaki Chioza'. Ḻa' dii nechte Chioza' wleje' le' kwenc̱he yilale bi kwiayi'le daa ba bix̱is biyib Espíritu Sánto c̱he'na' le' na' daa chajḻe'le dill' ḻi c̱he'na'.
Ni c̱heyi dgan, gox wṉab Chioza' le' ka be'lennto' le' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he'na', kwenc̱he idoḻ'le sho'lenle X̱ancho Jesucrístona' balaaṉ.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', ḻi soac̱hec̱h na' ḻi kooshao' diika' bli' bsedinto' le' ka be'lennto' le' dill' na' ka bzejnto' le'.
Na' kwin X̱ancho Jesucrístona' na' X̱acho Chioza', beena' ba gokile' cho' na' lo yeḻ' beṉ' wen c̱he'na' ba beṉe' cho' yeḻ' chxenlall' zejḻi kaṉi na' to dii wen dii shao' dii goncho lez,
wtipshgagake' lall'le na' wzoac̱hec̱hgake' le' kwenc̱he toshiizi gonle wen na' we'le dill' wen dill' shao'.
Dii zeelo nanto' le', beṉ' bish' na' le', beṉ' zan', ḻi iṉabshayi X̱anchona' c̱hento' kwenc̱he cho'a xtilleena' choe'lennto' beṉ' illiljan tolbe'zə na' wlebgake'n ḻega dii zakii, kon ka benle le',
na' kwenc̱he yisle' neto' lo ṉi'a na' beṉ' malka', beṉ'ka' chon dii bi yejni'alallii. Ḻa' aga yog' beṉ' chajḻe'gake' c̱he X̱anchona'.
Per ṉezicho X̱anchona' chone' ka ne', na' gone' ka soac̱hec̱hchle na' gap wwie' le' lao dii mala'.
Na' nx̱enlall'nto' X̱anchona' chaklene' le' chonle ka ba wnanto', na' toshiizi gonlen.
Na' X̱anchona' gaklene' le' gakile' beṉ', ka chon Chioza' chakile' cho', na' so sakile gaple yeḻ' chxenlall' lao yog' daa yen ile'ile ka ben Crístona'.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', kon yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he X̱ancho Jesucrístona' nanto' le' bi gonle txen nottezə beṉ' bish'choka' chdaliazə, ḻa' aga kan' bsedinto' le'.
Ḻa' ṉezkzile ka chonnto', na' kan' chiyaḻ' gonle. Neto' biga wzoaznto' ka beṉ' lia ladjlena'.
Ni biga wdaoznto' yeḻ' wao c̱he beṉ' na' bi wdixjnto'n, san ka tella ka waḻ bilaḻ bizodinto' bennto' llinna' kwenc̱he ni tole bi beninto' zed.
Na' dii ḻicha, zak'kzə wṉabnto' yeḻ' goklen c̱helena', sheḻ'ka', per bennto' llin kweṉche ble'ile, na' kan' gonle.
Kana' zoalennto' le' wnanto': “Beena' bi cheenile' gone' llin, ḻekzka' bi gawe'.”
Na' ba beninto' baḻ-le kon chdale to ni to na', ni bi chonle llin, na' chlalltezi c̱hele ga bi chiyaḻ'.
Na' beṉ'ki chon ka', chṉabinto' ḻegake' kon yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he X̱ancho Jesucrístona' bich tazgake' ka'z, san gongake' llin kwenc̱he yeej gaogake'.
Na' le' ṉaa beṉ' bish', na' le' beṉ' zan', bi lljx̱akile gonle dii wenna'.
Shi no bi chzoa dill' ka nanto' ḻee yishi, ḻi wwia no beena' na' bi gonlene' txen kwenc̱he yido'ile'.
Bi nia' gakzbanilene', san wzajniile'ne' ka beṉ' bish'le.
Na' kwin X̱anchona', beena' chzoa cho' mbalaz, gone' ka soale mbalaz toshiizi bittezə dii chak c̱hele. X̱anchona' soalenshgue' yog'ḻoḻtele.
Nad' Pablo, kwin' chzej' to c̱hop cho'a ḻee yishi chwap' le' chiox, kan' chzej' ḻee yog' yishka' chseḻaa laolena' kwenc̱he iṉezile nad'kzan chseḻaan.
X̱ancho Jesucrístona' gaklenshgue' yog'ḻoḻtele.
Nad' Pablo, nak' postl c̱he Jesucrístona' kwenc̱he wi'a xtilleena', ḻa' Chioza', beena' bisla cho' kwenc̱he bi kwiayi'cho, len Cristo Jesúza', beena' noncho lez gone' wen c̱hecho, bzoagake' nad'.
Chzej' li', Timoteo, nako' ka dowalj bi' c̱ha' daa nakcho txen chonḻilall'cho Jesucrístona'. X̱acho Chioza' len X̱ancho Cristo Jesúza' gaklenshgagake' li', na' yiyesh'lall'gakile' li', na' gongake' ka so' mbalaz.
Kana' ba zoa shaa Macedóniana', wṉabid' li' yigaaṉo' Éfesona' kwenc̱he yoo beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi daa bi nak dii ḻi bi gongake' ka',
na' bi segake' wṉeyi c̱he dill' golka' wdiljlall' beṉ' na' c̱he diika' ben dii x̱ozxtoe'ka' daa bi chiyoll chido. Ḻa' dill'ka' chonan ka chakgued beṉ' na' bi chaklenan gombia'gake' daa cheeni Chioza' goncho daa nonḻilall'chone'.
Ye'gako'ne' ka' kwenc̱he gapgake' yeḻ' chaki ka daa chalj ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beena' ba bixi biyech na' bibi de chao chdian ḻe' daa ṉezile' chone' ka chazlall' Chioza' na' nonḻilalleene' do lallee.
Baḻgake' lwaa segake' wṉeyi c̱heyi diiki, ba lenzgake' choe'gake' dill' c̱heyi diika' bi zakii.
Cheenzgakile' gakgake' beṉ' wli' wsedi ley c̱he Chioza', per ni ḻekzgake' bi chajni'gakile' daa chli' chsedgakile' ḻa'kzi nazgake' kayeṉ'nan nakan.
Ṉezicho ley c̱he Chioza' nakan wen, shi wc̱hinchon ka chiyaḻi.
Ḻa' ṉezicho aga ben Chioza' leya' ni c̱he beṉ'ka' chon wen, san ni c̱he beṉ'ka' chyishj xtilleena' len beṉ'ka' bi chzenag, beṉ'ka' bi chall chlleb Chioza', beṉ' saaxyaka', beṉ'ka' chiyit x̱axṉa'yin, yog' beṉ'ka' nak wen xya,
beṉ'ka' chṉelen xiiṉ xool beṉ', beṉ'ka' nak beṉ' xej, beṉ'ka' chit' chde beṉ', beṉ'ka' chziye', beṉ'ka' ax̱t chzoagake' Chioza' de tasc̱hiw kat' chziye'gake', na' nottez beṉ' bi chone' daa na cho'a xtill' Chioza'
kon ka chzajnii dill' wen dill' kob c̱he'na' daa nak dii zakii nlleb. Na' Chioza', beena' chidoḻ' we'la'ocho, ba bene'n lall' na' wi'an dill'.
Cho'a X̱ancho Cristo Jesúza' yeḻ' chox̱ken chone' nad' wal, na' nx̱enlallee nad' wak gon xshine'na', na' bzoe' nad' gona'n.
Ḻa'kzi biya dii ben wṉia' c̱he', na' bc̱hi' bsakaa beṉ'ka' benḻilall'gake'ne' na' bshagdiḻ' ḻegake', Chioza' biyesh'lallile' nad' daa bi wṉezid' bin chon' kana' biṉ' shajḻi'a c̱he Jesúza'.
Na' dii xen goklene' nad', bene' ka chonḻilall'chee na' beṉe' nad' yeḻ' chakina' daa nak' txen Cristo Jesúza'.
Dillii nakan dii wx̱enlall'cho, na' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' chiyaḻ' shajḻi'en: Cristo Jesúza' bide' yell-lioni kwenc̱he yisle' beṉ' saaxyaka', na' nad'yeṉ' goklikz' beṉ' saaxya wal.
Per Chioza' biyesh'lallile' nad' kwenc̱he wli' Jesucrístona' do ka nak yeḻ' chxenḻall' xen c̱he'na' na' ile'i beṉ'ka' zi' shajḻe' c̱he' na' gapgake' yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi.
Toshiizi shajla'oshga beena' chṉabia' zejḻi kaṉi, beena' biga llia te c̱he', beena' zoakz ḻa'kzi bi chle'ichone', na' sho'shgue' balaaṉ. Zeelo ḻen' nake' Chios. Kan' gakshgan.
Timoteo, xiiṉdawaa, nia' li' chiyaḻ' gono' ka wdix̱je'i beṉ'ka' li' daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' c̱ho' dii nechte, kwenc̱he daa wnagake' c̱ho' gaklenan li' gono' ga zeelo yizoilo' gono' xshin Chioza' daa nak lall' no'.
Toshiizi so' gonḻilalloo Jesucrístona' na' tlizi gono' wen kwenc̱he bibi gao idian li' daa ṉezilo' chono' ka chazlallee. Ḻa' baḻ beṉ' dii shao'tekzə chongake' daa bi chiyaḻ' gongake' na' bich chonḻilall'gake'ne'.
Ka gok c̱he Himenewa' len Alejándrona', na' wṉabid' Chioza' gakgake' lall' na' Satanáza' kwenc̱he wsedgake' bich bi gon iṉazgake' c̱he Chioza'.
Ṉaa nia' li' daa llialote gonle: chiyaḻ' we'ḻwill-le Chioza' na' iṉabilene' daa chyallj chc̱hinile na' daa chyallj chc̱hini beṉ' yoblə, na' gat'yoile'ne' gaklene' yog'ḻoḻte beṉ', na' we'lene' yeḻ' chox̱ken ka nak daa chone' c̱he yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' yell-lioni.
Chiyaḻ' iṉabicho Chioza' gaklene' beṉ' wṉabia'ka' na' yog'ḻoḻte beṉ' nak josc̱his, kwenc̱he soacho mbalaz na' kono wsej wllon we'la'ocho Chioza' na' goncho daa cheenile'.
Ḻa' dgan nakan wen na' chazlalli Chiozan', beena' bisla cho' kwenc̱he bi kwiayi'cho,
na' cheenile' yog'ḻoḻte beṉ' yell-lioki yilagake' na' gombia'gake' daa nak dii ḻi.
Ḻa' toz Chiozan' zoa, na' toz beena' chizoa beṉ' yell-lioni wen kon Chioza', ḻen' Cristo Jesúza',
beena' bzani kwine' wite' kwenc̱he wdixje' xtoḻ' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' yell-lioni. Na' dga gokə, gokan llana' bllia Chioza' bia', na' bli'e cheenile' yisle' cho'.
Na' kwenc̱he iṉezi yog' beṉ' dga, bzoe' nad' nak' postl c̱he' na' bene' lall' na' chyix̱ji'a xtilleena'. Na' bene' lall' na' wli' wsedid' beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel, kwenc̱he shajḻe'gake' dill' ḻi c̱he'na'. Na' dga cho'a dill' nakan dii ḻi, na' bi chziyaa.
Cheenid' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' byoka' we'ḻwillgake' Chioza' gattezə zoagake', na' chiyaḻ' gakgake' beṉ' lall'do' nxi nyech, beṉ' bi yoo daa nak yeḻ' chllaa yeḻ' chlok na' yeḻ' wishagdiḻ kat' wḻis neeka' lawe'na' we'ḻwillgake'ne'.
Na' ka nak noolka', chiyaḻ' wsak'gake' gakw xagake', na' bi tezgake' lawin yiyiljlall'gake' naklə yipaa yic̱hje'ka', ni bi wc̱hingake' no or wa lech' zakii inlleb.
San gonləgake' to dii byen seyi c̱hegake' chongake' wen ḻega beṉ' choe'la'o Chios.
Chiyaḻ' kwe' noolka' llizə wzenaggake' c̱he beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi cho'a xtill' Chioza' na' wzoagake' xtilleeka'.
Bi cho'a latj wli' wsedzi noolka' beṉ' byoka', ni bi iṉabia'zgake' ḻegake', san chiyaḻ' kwe'gake' llizə wzenaggake'.
Ḻa' Chioza' bene' zigaate Adánna', na'techlə bene' Évana'.
Na' aga Adánnan' wxiye' dii xiwaa, san noolan' wxiye'n na' bxope' lao saaxyana'.
Na' noolka' chzoa xiiṉin, bi tegake' lao yeḻ' zi'na' shi toshiizi nx̱enilall'gake' Chioza', na' segake' wṉeyi gakgakile' beṉ', na' soagake' gongake' ka cheeni Chioza' ḻega beṉ' nyeeṉ nyeeniyi.
Dillii nakan dii wx̱enlall'cho: shi no cheeni koo lall' nee gap wwie' beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' na' wli' wsedile' ḻegake', llin wen inlleban llialallee gone'.
To beṉ' ngoo ḻoo nee chli' chsedile' beṉ', chiyaḻ' gake' beṉ' zoa do yic̱hj do lallee, beṉ' bibi cho'a xtillee de. Chiyaḻ' soa toz xoole', na' gake' beṉ' nsa' c̱heyin wen, na' gake' beṉ' nyeeṉ nyeeniyi, na' beṉ' chidoḻee gap beṉ' ḻe' balaaṉ. Na' chiyaḻ' yiyeshile beṉ' wi'e ga yigaaṉe', na' gakte wli' wsedile' beṉ'.
Bi chiyaḻ' gake' beṉ' weezo, ni bi gake' beṉ' wishagdiḻ, ni bi selall'chgaile' mech, san gake' beṉ' wen, beṉ' gax̱jlall'.
Chiyaḻ' gak kwee xṉez xḻatji dii chak ḻoo yoo lille', na' gone' byen wzenag xiiṉe'ka' c̱he' na' soagakb' gongakb' daa nak wen.
Ḻa' shi to beṉ' bi chak kwee xṉez xḻatji dii chak ḻoo yoo lille', ¿nakra gone' kwee xṉezi c̱he beṉ'ka' nx̱enilall' Chioza'?
To beṉ' shinzə wzolo chonḻilallee Crístona' bi chiyaḻ' gak lall' nee gap wwie' beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona', kwenc̱he ki gakze' beṉ' chep cha'lall' na' wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he' ka ba nc̱hogloe' c̱he dii x̱iwaa.
Ḻekzka' chiyaḻ' seyi c̱he' chone' wen lao beṉ'ka' bi nonḻilall' Crístona' kwenc̱he kono biz gon iṉa c̱he' na' gonzə dii x̱iwaa gan wchix̱an ḻe'.
Ḻekzka' beṉ'ka' gak lo na'gake' gaklengake' wwiagake' bin chyallj chc̱hini beṉ'ka' nakgake' txen nonlill'gake' Crístona', chiyaḻ' gakgake' beṉ' chidoḻ' gap beṉ' ḻegake' balaaṉ, beṉ' chda do lallee, na' bi sollgakile', ni bi gakzgake' beṉ' wzelall'.
Chiyaḻ' soac̱hec̱hgake' shajḻe'gake' dii ḻi daa ba bzajnii Chioza' cho' daa kono wṉezi kana'. Na' chiyaḻ' soagake' do yic̱hj do lall'gake' na' bibi de gao idian yic̱hjlall'do'eka' daa ṉezgakile' chongake' ka cheeni Chioza'.
Na' ḻekzka' kat' kwejle beṉ'ki, chiyaḻ' wwiayeṉ'le nak nsa' c̱hegake'. Na' shi bibi de dii chao xya c̱hegake', wak gak lo na'gake' wwiagake' bin chyallj chc̱hini beṉ'ka' nakgake' txen nonlill'gake' Crístona'.
Na' noolka' ḻekzka' chiyaḻ' gakgake' beṉ' chidoḻ' gap beṉ' ḻegake' balaaṉ, na' bi gakgake' beṉ' wic̱hitj dill', san gakgake' beṉ' nsa' c̱heyin wen, na' gakgake' beṉ' gak wx̱enlall'cho toshiizi gongake' wen.
To beṉ' gak lo nee wwie' bin chyallj chc̱hini beṉ'ka' nake' txen nonlill'gake' Crístona' chiyaḻ' soa toz xoole', na' chiyaḻ' gap wwie' xiiṉe'ka' kwenc̱he gongakb' wen, na' kwe' xṉez xḻatji dii chak ḻoo yoo lille'.
Beṉ'ka' chak chgoogake' xṉezi c̱he diika' chyallj chc̱hini beṉ'ka' nakgake' txen nonlill'gake' Crístona' chidoḻ'gake' to balaaṉ, na' soachgagake' mbalaz daa nonḻilall'gake' Cristo Jesúza'.
Ḻa'kzi ba non' lez yobzə yidwia' li', chzej' dga
kwenc̱he shi bi chyobzid' yid', na' ba ṉezilo' nakan chiyaḻ' soa beṉ'ka' nak xiiṉ Chioza', ḻa' cho' chdop chllagcho choe'la'ochone' nakcho xiiṉ Chios yaa Chios banna'. Na' nak lo na'cho goncho ka gombia' beṉ' dill' ḻi c̱he'na'.
Dii ḻi dga chzajniin cho' c̱he Crístona' daa kono wṉezi nakan dii zakii nlleb, na' nan: Bide' golje' ka cho' beṉ' yell-lio, na' Espíritu c̱he Chioza' bli'e nan nake' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao'. Na' ble'i anjlka' ḻe', na' wda beṉ' be'gake' cho'a xtilleena' lao beṉ' yell-lioki, na' benḻilall'gake'ne'. Na' biyepe' yabana' gana' yo'e to balaaṉ xen.
Espíritu c̱he Chioza' cho'e dill' kwasḻoḻ, ne' kat' ba zoa te c̱he yell-lioni, baḻ beṉ'ka' ba nonḻilall'gake' Crístona' bich gonḻilall'gake'ne', na' wzenaggake' c̱he dii x̱iw'ka' na' diika' chli' chsedi beṉ' c̱hegakin.
Na' wzenaggake' c̱he beṉ' wxiye'ka', beṉ'ka' bichbi chao chdian ḻegake' daa ba nḻantekzgake' yeḻ' wxiye'na'.
Na' chllongake' wshagna' beṉ', na' chllontegake' yeej gaogake' baḻ yeḻ' wao ḻa'kzi Chioza' wlo'e yeḻ' waoka' kwenc̱he cho' nonḻi'lall'chone' na' nombia'cho dill' ḻi c̱he'na' gaochon na' we'chone' yeḻ' chox̱ken.
Ḻa' yog'ḻoḻ daa bx̱e bsil Chioza' nakan wen, na' bibi de dii iṉacho bi gak gaocho kon shi we'chone' yeḻ' chox̱ken kat' yeej gaochon.
Ḻa' daa chajḻe'cho cho'a xtill' Chioza' na' daa choe'ḻwillchone', chonḻeeye' yeḻ' wao c̱hechona'.
Shi dga wli' wsedilo' bish' ljwellchoka', na' gako' to wen llin wen c̱he Jesucrístona', na' tolla' ba nono' cho'a xtill' Chioza' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'na' len dii wenna' daa bsedo' na' zej chono'n.
Na' bi wzenago' bizə dill' gol dii chsees' beṉ', diika' wdiljlall'gake' daa bi nak ka dii shajḻe'cho, san bsed gono' ka cheeni Chioza'.
Ṉezicho kat' chc̱hitj ṉi'a na'choki chaklenan kwerp c̱hechoni. Per daa choncho ka cheeni Chioza', dii xentechlə chaklenan cho' ṉaa zoacho yell-lioni na' ḻekzka' kat' illin lla lljazoalenchone'.
Dillii nakan dii wx̱enlall'cho, na' yog' beṉ' chiyaḻ' shajḻi'en.
Na' ni c̱heyinnan' chonnto' to dii byen chilaḻinto' chonnto' xshin Chioza' daa ba nonnto' lez Chios yaa Chios banna', beena' cheeni yisle' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ', na' beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'yeṉ' ḻen' yisle'.
Diikin chiyaḻ' yoo beṉ' gongake' na' wli' wsedilo' ḻegake'.
Bi weezo' latj no ile'zi li' nakzi daa nako' bi' wew', san ben wen lao beṉ'ka' nonḻi'lall' Crístona', ka de cho'a dill', na' yeḻ' nsa' c̱heyin wen, na' yeḻ' chaki beṉ', na' yeḻ' nonḻilallii Crístona', ni bibi dii mal sa'lalloo, kwenc̱he lengake' gongake' ka'.
Shlak yid', ben ka dii le blab Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' lao beṉ'ka' chdop chllag, bli' bsedgakile', na' btip lall'gake'.
Bi guetlalloo daa ben Chioza' lall' no' kana' beṉ'ka' ngoo lall' na'gake' beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' bx̱oa neeka' yic̱hjo'na' bengake' li' lall' na' Chioza', na' bchej beena' wdix̱jee nan Chioza' ba wleje' li' gono' xshine'na'.
Ben to dii byen ben diiki wloo Chioza' lo no' gono', na' benyeṉaan kwasḻoḻ kwenc̱he gakbe'i yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' ba zejch chono' wen.
Wze wṉeyi c̱he kwino' na' c̱heyi daa chli' chsedilo' beṉ', na' toshiizi wno'n. Na' shi gono' ka nan, na' yisla kwino' len beṉ'ka' chzenaggake' daa chli' chsedilo'.
Bi iṉezo' zibia' beṉ' golka', san be'lengake' dill' xochi ka beṉ' chshaljlen x̱ayin. Na' goni beṉ' bishoo beṉ' xkwid'ka'.
Na' goni xṉoo noolka' ba ngolch ka li', na' goni beṉ' zano' nool xkwid'ka', na' bibi dii mal sa'lalloo.
Goklen nool wizebka', beṉ'ka' kono zoa c̱hegake'.
Per shi zoa xiiṉ xsoagake', chonan byen iṉezgakib' chiyaḻ' gap wwiagakb' ḻe', ḻa' ḻen' bisgole' ḻegakb'. Ḻa' kan' chazlall' Chioza' goncho.
Nool wizeba', beena' kono zoakz c̱heyin, beena' bgaaṉ tlish' tyaj, chx̱enilallee Chioza' na' ka tella ka waḻ choe'ḻwille'ne' na' chat'yoile'ne' gaklene'ne'.
Per nool wizeba', beena' choe' cho'a xbayi beli chen c̱he'na', nake' ka beṉ' net lao Chioza' ḻa'kzi mbane'.
Bzajni'gakile' dga kwenc̱he bibi gon iṉaz beṉ' c̱hegake'.
Ḻa' beena' bibi wṉeyi ze c̱he no dialla c̱he' na' c̱he beṉ'ka' nakyeṉee txen ḻoo yoo lille'na', ba wlej yic̱hje' daa nak c̱he Chios, shi ka' chone', na' ba nxiṉjtechlə yic̱hjlall'do'ena' aga ka beena' biṉ' shajḻe' c̱he Chioza'.
Ḻee yisha' gana' da' le nool wizebka' chiyaḻ' ta' le beṉ'ka' ba wdeli guiyon yiz, beṉ'ka' ben banez kochno bikaagake'.
Chiyaḻ' seyi c̱hegake' chongake' wen: daa gok bisgol xiiṉe'ka', daa chiyesh'lall'gakile' beṉ' choe'gake' ga yigaaṉgake', daa chongake' bittez dii gaklenan beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Chioza', ax̱t chyibgake' ṉi'eka', na' daa chaklengake' beṉ'ka' chzak'zi', na' daa chongake' ka dii le chongake' yog' daa nak wen.
Na' bi wdoo le nool wizebka' ḻee yisha' shi biṉ' gakgakile' guiyon yiz. Ḻa' zoa kat' we'gake' cho'a xbayi beli chen c̱he'ka' na' yikaa c̱hegake' na' bich gongake' kwasḻoḻ xshin Crístona',
na' gapgake' doḻ' lao Chioza' daa bi sakgakile' gongake' ka ba bc̱hebgake'.
Na' leyi chiyakgake' noolə lia na' chdagake' to to yoo. Na' aga toz daa, san ḻekzka' chc̱hitjgake' dill', na' chjalaalli c̱hegake' dii chak c̱he beṉ' yoblə, na' choe'gake' dill' dii bi chiyaḻ' we'gake'.
Daan nool wizebka' ni zoa xḻatjin, cheenid' yikaa c̱hegake' na' yizoa xiiṉgake', na' koogake' xṉezi dii chak ḻoo yoo lillgake', kwenc̱he bi wx̱a'gake' cho'alao beṉ'ka' bi chonḻilall' Chioza'.
Ḻa' baḻ nool wizebka' ba bichejgake' lo xṉez Chioza' na' ba zjanogake' Satanáza'lə.
Shi to beṉ' nonḻilall' Chioza' zoa to dialla c̱he' nool wizeb, chiyaḻ' gaklene'ne' kwenc̱he bi gake' to dii zii dii zshab c̱he beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona', na' gak we'gake' daa chyallj chc̱hini nool wizebka' kono zoa c̱hegake'.
Ka nak beṉ'ka' ngoo lall' na'gake' beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona', na' chak chgoogake' xṉezin wen, chidoḻ'gake' balaaṉ xen. Na' beṉ'ka' noni xshingake' choe'gake' cho'a xtill' Chioza' na' chli' chsedgakile', balaaṉ xentechlə chidoḻ'gake'.
Ḻa' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' nan: “Ka nak gooṉa' bana' chilaḻi chlej chshoshjb trígona' kwenc̱he ichej xayinna', bi wllinle yix̱ja' cho'aba' kwenc̱he gak koyob to c̱hop cho'a.” Na' ḻekzka' nan: “Beena' chon llinna' chidoḻee ikaa laxje'.”
Shi no chao xya c̱he to beṉ' ngoo lall' na' beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona', bi wzenago'n shi bi zoa c̱hop shoṉ beṉ' yizi' cho'agake'n.
Na' shi ga zoa beṉ'ka' bi chsankzgake' dii mala', chiyaḻ' wsheshleno' ḻegake' kat' ndop nllagle kwenc̱he yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' nakle txen illebgake' na' bi gongake' ka'.
Chat'yoid' li' lao Chioza', na' lao Jesucrístona' na' lao anjl c̱he'ka', toshiizi gono' diiki ba wnia'. Na' toz ka gonilo' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ', aga baḻze' gakilo'.
Bi wx̱oazə noona' yic̱hj beena' cheeni gon xshin Chioza' shi bi ṉezilo' nak nsa' c̱he', kwenc̱he ki gako'ne' txen shi chone' dii mala'. Wdapshii kwino' kwenc̱he ki ta' icheno' dii mala'.
Daa chak ḻi'ona' na' daa zekizezi bi shawoo, bich yeejteko' toz nisa', san weej lat'do' wej vinona'.
Baḻ dii malka' chon beṉ' chli'lawin ka zi' gaolə beṉ' xya c̱hegake'. Na' zi baḻan, zi' chila' chiṉezli beṉaan.
Na' ka'kzə, dii wenna' daa chon beṉ' nḻa'xejgakan, na' ḻa'kzi de dii wenna' daa ngash', wllin lla wli'lawin.
Yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' ndoo lla yel chongake' xshin beṉ' na' ba chonḻilall'gake' Crístona', chiyaḻ' sho' yic̱hjgake' gapgake' x̱ane'ka' balaaṉ kwenc̱he bibi gon iṉaz beṉ' c̱he Chioza' na' c̱heyi daa chli' chsedicho.
Na' shi x̱ane'ka' nonḻill'gake' Crístona', ḻa'kzi ba nakgake' beṉ' bish'gake' daa chonḻilall'gake' Crístona', chiyaḻ'kz gapgake' ḻegake' balaaṉ, na' chiyaḻ' gonchləgake' xshine'ka' do yic̱hj do lall'gake' daa chakgakile' ḻegake' na' ṉezgakile' beṉ'ka' si' banez xshine'ka' nakgake' beṉ' nonḻilall' Crístona'. Dgan chiyaḻ' wli' wsedilo' ḻegake' na' ye'gako'ne' gongake'n.
Shi no chli' chsedi dii nak nlla'lə na' bi chidiḻin daa bli' bsedi X̱ancho Jesucrístona', na' bi chidiḻtein daa chsedi cho' goncho ka cheeni Chioza',
beena' chon ka' nake' beṉ' chep cha'lall', beṉ' bibi ṉezi. Na' daa ḻe chibaile' gakdiḻ-lene' beṉ', chx̱ie' daa nak yeḻ' xe', yeḻ' wishagdiḻ, yeḻ' chbell chṉe c̱he beṉ', na' yeḻ' chza'lall' mal c̱he beṉ'.
Na' biga yiyoll yido gakdiḻ-lene' beṉ' daa ba nxiṉj yic̱hlall'do'ena', na' bi nombi'e daa nak dii ḻi. Na' chakile' daa chonze' ka chli' chsedi c̱he Chioza' gatile' mech xen.
Dii ḻi, ḻe mbalaz soacho shi goncho ka cheeni Chioza' na' goncho banez ka'k' to dii de c̱hecho.
Ḻa' to ka cha'zchon goljcho yell-lioni, na' to ka cha'zchon yiza'cho.
Shi de dii cheej chaocho na' de xalaancho, chiyaḻ' goncho banez.
Na' beṉ'ka' cheeni gak beṉ' wni'a, chxopgake' lawi daa nak yeḻ' wzelall' na' llialall'gake' biya dii bi yejni'alallii daa chx̱iṉj chḻenan ḻegake', na' chtakw chc̱hejan ḻegake' na' chbiayi'lengake'n.
Lo yeḻ' wzelall' mecha' chalj chxe biya dii bi yejni'alallii. Baḻ beṉ', yeḻ' wzelall' c̱he'ka', ba bilaagake' lo xṉez Chioza' na' ba chile'gakile' zan yeḻ' zi'.
Per li' chono' xshin Chioza', biga gono' ka chon beṉ'ka', san ben daa nak dii ḻicha, ben ka cheeni Chioza', wzoatezi wzoa benḻilallee, wdap yeḻ' chaki, gok wal lao yog'ḻoḻ dii idiḻ illago', na' gok beṉ' gax̱jlall'.
Btiplalloo na' ben to dii byen gono' daa cheeni Chioza', beena' nonḻilalloo. Na' be'ḻ-lall' beni c̱ho' daa nak yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi. Ḻa' ni c̱heyinnan' gox wṉab Chioza' li' na' bi'o dill' lao beṉ' zan nan nonḻilalloo Crístona'.
Na' ṉaa, lao Chioza', beena' choe' yeḻ' mban c̱he yog'te dii de yell-lioni, na' lao Jesucrístona', beena' be' dill' kon ka nakan lao Poncio Pilátona', chon' byen
wzo' dill' dga nia' li', na' seyi c̱ho' chono' wen na' bibi dii mal ta' icheno' ax̱t ni ka yila' X̱ancho Jesucrístona'.
Ḻa' wllin lla yiyede' ka bllia Chioza' bia', Chios, beena' chidoḻ' we'la'ocho, beena' zeelo chṉabia'. Zeelo ḻen' nake' X̱an yog'ḻoḻ beṉ', na' chṉabi'e lao yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'.
Toze' ḻen' biga llia te c̱he', na' zoe' lo beeni' xen wala' daa kono chzoi wwia. Ni tlish' beṉec̱h biṉ' ile'ile'ne' ni bi gak ile'gakile'ne'. Ḻen' chidoḻee sho'e balaaṉ zejḻi kaṉi na' biga llia te yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he'na'. Kan' nakan.
Beṉ'ka' chle'i yeḻ' wni'ana' yell-lioni, gollgake' bi gakgake' beṉ' cha'sibə, ni bi gongake' lez yeḻ' wni'a c̱he'ka'. Ḻa' yeḻ' wni'ana' bi nakan lez. San chiyaḻ' gongake' lez Chios yaa Chios banna'. Ḻen' chone' zoayaa zoallin yog'ḻoḻ daa chyallj chc̱hinicho kwenc̱he si'chon banez.
Gollgake' gongake' wen, na' koo yic̱hjgake' wzanchgake' dii wenka' chongake', na' segake' wṉeyi izangakile' we'gake' beṉ' dii de c̱hegake'.
Na' daa gongake' ka', na'chan saki gongake' lez daa zi' za', na' idoḻ'gakile' yeḻ' mban daa nak dowalj.
Timoteo, wlooshosh yic̱hjo' dga ba wnia' li'. Bi wzenago' dill'ka' bi yejni'alallii na' bibi zakaan, ni bi wzenago' xtill' beṉ'ka' chonzə ka nap yeḻ' sin'.
Baḻ beṉ' ba wyajḻe'gake' cho'a xtilleeka' na' ba bilaagake' lo xṉez Chioza'. Chioza' gaklenshgue' le' na' gone' ka gak wen c̱hele.
Nad' Pablo nak' postl c̱he Jesucrístona' kon ka chaklall' Chioza', kwenc̱he wi'a dill' nan ba bc̱hebe' wi'e yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi c̱he nottezə beṉ'ka' nak Crístona' txen.
Chzej' li', Timoteo, nako' ka dowalj bi' c̱ha'. X̱acho Chioza' na' X̱ancho Jesucrístona' gaklenshgagake' li', na' yiyesh'lall'gakile' li', na' gongake' ka so' mbalaz.
Tlizi choe'ḻwill' Chioza', beena' chonḻilallaa do yic̱hj do lallaa, ka ben dii beṉ' gol c̱ha'ka'. Ka tella ka waḻ chṉab' gaklene' li' na' cho'ane' yeḻ' chox̱ken ni c̱ho'.
Chjadinid' ka wchello' kana' zeelo bshaljcho, na' cheenid' ile'id' li' kwenc̱he yiba yizakid'.
Chjadinid' ka nonḻilalloo Chioza' do yic̱hj do lalloo, ka ben xṉa'golo' Lóidana' na' xṉoo, Eunícena'. Na' ṉezyeṉid' ḻekzka' li' nonḻilalloone' do yic̱hj do lalloo.
Na' daan, chisa'lalloo chiyaḻ' we'ḻ-lall'cho gono' xshin Chioza' kon ka nak yeḻ' waka' daa bene' lall' no' kana' bx̱oa' na'na' yic̱hjo'na'.
Ḻa' Chioza' beṉe' cho' Espíritu c̱he'na', na' Espíritu c̱he'na' chaklene' cho' kwenc̱he bi gall illebcho, na' choṉe' cho' yeḻ' wak len yeḻ' chaki, na' chaklene' cho' gakcho beṉ' nyeeṉ nyeeniyi.
Daan, bi yiyii yido'ilo' wi'o cho'a xtill' X̱anchona', ni bi yido'ilo' ni c̱ha' daa dia' lillyani daa chon' xshin Chioza'. San chiyaḻ' gono' nad' txen illaglocho yeḻ' zak'zi'ka' ni c̱he cho'a xtill' Crístona', ḻa' Chioza' chaklene' cho' len yeḻ' wak c̱he'na'.
Chioza' bisle' cho' na' gox wṉabe' cho' kwenc̱he gakcho lall' nee, aga yeḻ' chon wen c̱hechonan', san kon ka goklallile' gone'n daa nake' beṉ' wen. Na' daa biyesh'lallile' cho' wlo'e xṉezin wseḻee Jesucrístona' kana' zi' wx̱e wsiltie' yell-lioni.
Na' ṉaa, ba bli'lawi yeḻ' chiyesh'lallii c̱he'na' daa bid Jesucrístona', beena' bisla cho', na' blliayee yeḻ' wak c̱he yeḻ' wita', na' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he'na' chzajniin cho' nan de to yeḻ' mban daa bi te c̱heyin.
